Soo 'udechoo whe'whudit'en whe Yak'usda (Elohim) ndi yun 'ink'ez yak'uz 'et 'uhóonla.
Yun, ba ndo hoonli lhiloh 'ink'ez 'aw ook'ut 'et hooloh inle', yatoo k'ut tsaholhgus za hoonli inle'. Yak'usda (Elohim) ooyughi too k'ut nudults'ut.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en 'utni, “'Et njan be hoot'en-i hole'.” 'Et hoot'en whuzdli'.
'Ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) be hoot'en-i yunilh'en, unzoo whe 'unt'oh 'ink'ez be hoot'en-i 'ink'ez tsaholhgus bulh lhulcho 'uyinla.
Yak'usda (Elohim) ndi be hoot'en 'i dzin yulhni, 'ink'ez ndi tsalhgus, 'i 'ulhdzis yulhni, 'et whe hulhgha 'ink'ez bundada' 'et soo 'udechoo dzin whuzdli'.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) ndutni, “Too toh yat hole' 'ink'ez ndo whutoo' 'ink'ez yun k'ut too cha lhulcho oole'.”
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) yat 'uhoonla, 'ink'ez ndi too lhk'eyalhdzo njan too 'ink'ez ndo yat cha, 'et ndúhooja.
'Ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) ndo yat 'et yak'uz whulhni. 'Et hulhgha 'ink'ez bundada' 'et whulh nat dzin whuzdli'.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'utni, “Ndi too yak'uz ba nyo 'i 'ilho oole', 'ink'ez 'et yun dizgi hahoolts'it.” 'Et nduhóoja.
'Ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) ndi yun dizgi 'i yun k'ut whulhni, 'ink'ez ndi too 'ilhoh nedimbun 'i yatoo' yulhni. 'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) ooba hoonzoo.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'utni, “Ndi yun k'ut 'et tl'o, ndai 'ut'an hanuyeh ootse whulih. Mai chun oomai' whulih ts'iyawh dich'oh ooch'e' nawhudlih, 'i oole',” ni 'et whe nduhóoja.
'Et ndi yun k'ut tl'o, ndai 'ut'an hanuyeh ootse whulih whuk'un'a, 'ink'ez mai chun oomai' whulih ts'iyawh dich'oh ootse nawhudlih. 'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) ooba hoonzoo.
'Et hulhgha 'ink'ez bundada' 'et whulh tat dzin.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'utni, “Ndo yak'uz hoot'en oole', 'i be lhulhcho lhts'e hozit whe dzin 'ink'ez 'ulhdzis, 'i be nts'oh hoozulh, dzin 'ink'ez naoodizulh 'et cha.
'Ink'ez 'et ndi yak'uz be hoot'en, 'i yun k'ut be hoot'en oole',” 'et nduhóoja.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en nanki be hoot'en-i cho whulhtsi. 'Et ndi tube be hoot'en-i, 'i dzin huba suli' 'ink'ez dzohyaz be hoot'en-i, 'i 'ulhdzis huba suli'. 'Ink'ez ndi sum 'i cha 'uyinla.
Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en ndo yak'uz ndi be hoot'en-i whulhtsi, 'i ndi yun k'ut hukw'edodi huba.
'Ink'ez 'owhi dzin 'ink'ez 'ulhdzis bulh k'une' hool'en ha. 'Ink'ez lhulcho 'uhoonla be hoot'en-i 'ink'ez tsalhgus yo. 'Ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) whunilh'en 'ink'ez ooba hoonzoo.
'Et hulhgha 'ink'ez bundada' 'et whulh did dzin whuzdli'.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'utni, “Too toh lhai cho lho ndunt'oh-i hole', 'ink'ez dut'ai yun ando yat ndulcho dut'ai be nuhoot'o”.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) toot lho cho 'ink'ez usjiz-i nuhutnah-i lhelhdoh didoh toot nuyeh-i 'ink'ez nut'o-i lhelhdoh didoh-i 'inla. 'Ink'ez 'owhi yunilh'en, unzoo whe 'unt'oh. 'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) ooba hoonzoo suli'.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) soo hoonzoo-un hubúlhni, 'ink'ez njan ndutni, “Lhk'uz whe lhai oohle' ndi too doolhbun yatoo' tuz, 'ink'ez dut'ai cha ndi yun k'ut lhk'uz teh lhai oole'.”
'Et hulhgha 'ink'ez bundada' 'et kwulat dzin suli'.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'utni, “Ndai la khuna-i dich'oh didoh-i, khuna-i, musdoos te, yun nulh'as-i, 'uyoo khuna-i, ts'iyawh didutch'oh dudun dot'en, yun ts'u halh'as,” 'et whuz un'a 'uhooja.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) khuna-i yun k'ut nulh'as 'ilhoh didoh-i, musdoos 'ilhoh didoh-i 'ink'ez ts'iya-i yun nulh'as-i, 'ilhoh didoh-i 'ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) yan'en, unzoo whe 'unt'oh.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'utni, “Dune 'uts'ooleh, neundot'en-un, nek'un'a 'unt'oh-un, yatoo k'ut, lho, dut'ai ndo nudilh-i, musdoos, yun k'ut cha, yun k'ut nulh'as-i cha, 'owhi ts'iyawh yumoodih oole' sih”.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) dune 'inla, duk'un'a Yak'usda (Elohim) ndot'e', 'en dune 'ink'ez ts'ekoo cha 'en 'ubinla.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) soo hoonzoo-un 'ubulhni 'ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) njan ndubulhni, “Lhane cho nohuzkeh oole', ndi yun doolhbun 'ink'ez oomoodih uhli, lho, dut'ai, nudilh-i cha 'ink'ez ndi yun k'ut usjiz-i cha ts'iyawh”.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'utni, “Whunulh'en, yun hanuyeh-i oomai' hoonli-i, 'ananukat-i yun k'ut hooni-i, duchun oomai' 'ananukat-i, nohni nohba ut'alh-i tileh.
'Ink'ez cha ndi yun k'ut usjiz-i, dut'ai ndo nudilh-i, 'ink'ez yun k'ut nulh'as-i cha, ndi yun k'ut hanuyeh-i yuti'ulh huba bugha ínus'ai,” 'ink'ez whuz un'a 'uhooja.
Yak'usda (Elohim) yane'yalh'en-i yunilh'en, ts'iyawh 'uyinla-i 'ink'ez 'alha tube unzoo. 'Et hulhgha 'ink'ez bundada' 'et bulh lhk'utat dzin. 'Et ts'iyawh whunalh'en whe tube ooba hoonzoo. 'Et hulhgha 'ink'ez bundada' 'et whulh lhk'utat dzin suli'.
'Awet yak'uz, yun k'ut, 'ink'ez ndai ts'iyawh 'uhoonla, 'i lhaoodinla.
'Et whulh lht'ak'ant'it dzin suli', 'et Yak'usda (Elohim) be 'ut'en, 'i lhaidinla 'ink'ez whulh lht'ak'ant'it dzin 'et nalyiz. Ndi be 'ut'en 'i ts'iyawh lhaoodinla.
'Ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) whulh lht'ak'ant'it dzin 'et soo hoonzoo-un whulhtsi 'ink'ez 'udun duba neooninla. Njan whulh lht'ak'ant'it dzin 'et nalyiz be 'ut'en 'i ts'iyawh lhaoodinla 'et huwa, Yak'usda (Elohim) ndi 'uyinla 'i lhaoodinla.
Njan 'et soo 'udechoo whe'whudit'en hukw'elh'az yak'uz 'ink'ez yun k'ut njan dzin Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) 'en ndi yak'uz 'ink'ez yun k'ut 'uhoonla,
'awhuz yun whut'an 'ink'ez oomai' hooni-i, 'ink'ez dilht'an-i cha yun k'ut halhusye whe, Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) nawhulhtih-un 'ink'ez dune yun gha oona' ha hooloh.
'Et hoonts'i tootsul whuzdli' 'i be yun k'ut naooniltsul.
'Ink'ez Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) yun lez 'i dune yulhtsi 'ink'ez be ts'uhuna bulh yuni 'ainyulh 'ink'ez dune khuna suli'.
Eden huwun ndaz de 'et Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) 'en ha'nuyeh k'et newhunin'ai. 'Et 'a'nule ink'ez ndun dune yulhtsi, 'en 'et neinilhti.
Njan yun k'ut Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) ts'iya-i duchun nul'en huba nzoo-i 'ink'ez ut'alh huba nzoo-i 'ainanla. Duchun oogha ts'ukhuna-i cha whuniz hanuyeh yun 'et 'uyinla. 'Ink'ez ndi duchun be t'eoonudzun ndet hoonzoo 'ink'ez ndet hoontsi' 'et cha.
'Et ndi took'oh Eden whuts'u hainli, 'i hanuyeh k'et be nawhunultsul, 'et 'ukoh didun lhk'einli whuzdli'.
Soo 'udechoo whuts'u hainli, 'i Pishon huyulhni, ndi 'i yun k'ut Havilah ndul cho whunadizdli, 'et gold hooni.
'Ink'ez njan yun k'ut gold 'i unzoo. Bdellium 'ink'ez onyx tse 'i 'et hooni.
Njan whulhnat took'oh ye dinli, 'i Gihon hiyulhni, 'i 'unt'oh. Yun k'ut Cush, 'et ndulcho whunasuli.
Bulh ta-i 'ukoh 'i Hiddekel huyulhni, 'i Assyria whanda' ts'e wheinli. Bulh dunghi 'ukoh 'i Euphrates 'unt'oh.
'Et Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) hanuyeh k'et Eden 'et dune neninilhti, yughole' 'ink'ez yot'e' ha.
'Ink'ez Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) ndun dune khuni yutl'a dan'ai whe nduyulhni, “Ndi duchun ts'iyawh njan hanuyeh 'i on'alh ndet hukwa' ninzin totsuk.
“Ndi duchun be t'eoonudzun-i, ndet hoonzoo-un, 'ink'ez ndet hoontsi'-un, 'i oomai 'aw lhuzon'al. Ndet dzin in'al-un, 'alha datantsah.”
'Et Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) 'utni, “Dune dich'oh 'uhint'oh de 'aw lhe'hoozoo' whe' hoont'oh, yula' tit'elh-un yundult'oh-un ooba 'oosleh si.”
Ndi yun k'ut 'et Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) ts'iyai khuna-i, dut'ai ndo yat nudilh, 'i ts'iyawh Adam ts'un nebuninla, 'et nts'en'a hubootazih ha. 'Ink'ez nts'en'a hubonzi', 'i huboozi suli'.
'Et Adam 'en ndi mudoos, dut'ai ndo yat nudilh, 'ink'ez tl'o k'ut khuna-i, 'i ts'iyawh huboozi' whulhtsi. 'Et 'ink'ez Adam yulh ndult'oh 'en yula 'oot'en hooloh.
'Ink'ez 'et Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) Adam bulh cho yuk'edin'ai, 'et Adam nanisti 'ink'ez oocha 'ilhoghi Yak'usda yuts'u haídantan 'ink'ez yutsung lhts'un be naíyunilhni.
Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) ndi 'ucha dune ts'u haidantan, 'i ts'eke yulhtsi 'ink'ez dune yughi nilhti.
'Et Adam 'utni, “Ndi 'andit sts'un oots'un 'unt'oh 'ink'ez stsung ootsung 'unt'oh, ts'eke boozi' oole' si, dune ts'u halti 'et huwa”.
'Et huwa dune dubá 'ink'ez duloo bulh bula dootnih 'ink'ez du'at bulh 'oot'e 'ink'ez 'ilho yust'e hoole'.
'Ink'ez nahult'oh 'ust'et, dune 'ink'ez du'at bulh whe 'aw yooya cha lhuhiloh.
'Et tl'ughus 'i lhelhdoh didoh-i Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) 'uyinla-i unli 'ink'ez ts'eke 'ulhni, “Duchun yun k'ut whuduchun 'aw ts'iyawh lhuzooh'al, ni eh?”
'Et ts'eke nyoon tl'ughus 'uyulhni, “Nyoo duchun mai' hanuyeh-i, 'i ts'oo'alh huba' hoont'oh,
'Et hoonts'i hanuyeh k'et whuduchun whuniz nadan'a-i, 'i Yak'usda (Elohim) 'utni, ‘Nyoo duchun mai' 'aw lhuzooh'al, k'us oot'aoohnalh junih, khun si daoohtsah,’” ni.
'Et ndi tl'ughus, ts'eke 'en 'uyulhni, “'Alha 'aw daoontsah ait'oh.
Yak'usda (Elohim) t'eooninzun ndet dzin uh'alh-un, hooh'en tihleh 'ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) bundutilh'elh, hoonzoo-un 'ink'ez hoontsi'-un cha t'ewhuntahzin.”
'Et ts'eke duchun ts'u'alh huba unzoo, nul'en huba cha unzoo, duchun ts'uwhunih netilhtselh huba ooka' whuninzun, oomai' yilhchoot 'ink'ez yan'al, duki cha yuloh yutl'a nan'ai 'ink'ez 'en cha yan'al.
'Et nahult'oh duna be huhon'en suli', 'ink'ez nahult'oh 'ust'et 'uhint'oh t'ehonanzin, mai “fig” huyulhni 'i oot'an lhuna' hidunilhka' 'i be be k'e'uzdla 'uhududulhtsi.
'Et nawhudunik'az whe Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) hanuyeh k'et 'oh nuya whe hidits'o 'ink'ez Adam du'at bulh hanuyeh k'et duchun toh Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) hich'a untilh'i.
'Et Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) Adam hahizya 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Nts'e 'int'oh”.
'Et 'utni, “Hanuyeh k'ez nyudasts'o 'ink'ez whenuzjut, 'ust'et 'ust'oh 'et huwa untiz'i.”
'Ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Mbe 'unyulhni 'ust'et 'int'oh, duchun oomai' uh'alh junih nohdusni-i eh uh'al?”
'Et dune 'utni, “Ts'eke sgha nilht'i-un duchun oomai' sgha inin'ai 'ink'ez 'i us'al.”
'Ink'ez Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) ts'eke 'ulhni, “Dahoont'oh-un dainja?” 'Ink'ez ts'eke 'utni, “Tl'ughus nasunan'a 'ink'ez us'al.”
'Et Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) tl'ughus 'ulhni, “'Et ndinja huwa 'uyoo khuna-i anus nk'ehida whe 'int'oh, 'ink'ez 'uyoo khuna-i chuntoh nulh'as-i anus, mbut tl'ah whe nukedutanzut, 'ink'ez lhez za tan'ulh, yunka tandalh nduwhulyiz whe.
'Ink'ez nyun 'ink'ez ts'eke bulh lhazdatni nohtiselh, 'ink'ez nyuzkeh 'ink'ez buzkeh. Ntsi yayindunta'us 'ink'ez ookentsul duntalhdah.”
'Et ts'eke 'ulhni, “Ndzi unduda-un 'ink'ez datant'elh-un 'onus 'uwhulcho whutiselh, nyulh 'ults'ulh whe nyuzkeh whutaleh, nki ooka' untanzilh 'ink'ez nyumoodih tileh.”
'Et Adam 'ulhni, “N'at oozalhts'ai' 'et huwa 'ink'ez ndi duchun oomai', ‘'On'alh junih,’ nyudusni, in'al 'et huwa, nyun mba ndi yun 'i ookehida, 'ut'en be oots'u huyukat-i tan'ulh yun ka tandalh ndwhulyiz whe.”
Whuscho 'ink'ez whusyaz bulh nankilt'oh ook'ut mba hantiyeh, 'ink'ez yun hanuyeh-i tan'ulh.
Nyunin ts'u halhdzilh whe ut'alh-i on'alh, yun natandleh whuts'un. 'I oots'u hainzut. Lhez 'int'oh 'ink'ez lhez 'i ts'un natandleh.”
'Ink'ez Adam du'at Eve be yoozi, khunane ts'iyawh buloo 'et huwa.
'Ink'ez Adam oo'at bulh Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) 'en ndi zuz 'i buba 'uyinla hiye óoke' ha.
'Et Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) 'utni, “Nulh'en, dune Neundult'oh suli', hoonzoo-un 'ink'ez hoontsi'-un t'ewhunozin ha. 'Ink'ez 'andit doo ka si dula be ndi duchun oomai' yolhchoot 'ink'ez yoo'alh 'ink'ez 'ilhiz whutinalh.”
'Et huwa Moodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) njan hanuyeh k'et, Eden, 'et tenabunilh'a', 'ink'ez njan yun whut'as tileh 'i oots'u haits'alhti 'et, oot'e' ha.
'Et dune teininyoot 'ink'ez Eden ndaz ts'e 'et lizasne, Cherubne hubulhni, 'et nebunilhti, 'ink'ez saluzti kwun dunukw dot'en lhelhts'un nadighus-i duchun oogha ts'ukhuna-i yughole' ha.
'Et Adam du'at Eve, t'einanzin 'ink'ez oo'at ulchan 'ink'ez Cain 'en yulhtsi 'ink'ez 'utni, “Moodihti (Yahweh) ts'un dune sgha ninzut.”
'Et doo cha Eve 'ulhtsi, 'andit 'et bulhutsin Abel 'en 'usbai ghunli unli, 'et Cain 'en yun ghana-un suli'.
'Et whudizulh whutoh Cain yun whumai', Moodihti (Yahweh) gha italelh ha yughi ninla.
Abel cha 'usbai 'udechoo whuzdli-i nilhk'a whe whuz wheyanla 'ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) Abel yudilhti' 'ink'ez yuba soo 'uja.
'Et hoonts'i Cain yuba whusayanla-i ooba lhe' yizoo' 'ink'ez Cain tube hunilch'e 'ink'ez oonin ts'e 'uts'un un'a 'uja.
'Et huwa Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en Cain 'uyulhni, “Ndet huwa hunilch'e 'ink'ez nyunin ts'e 'uts'un un'a 'inja?”
“Soo 'ant'en, 'aw lakw 'uyoo neba lhe'hootazoo'? 'Et 'aw soo lhe'zint'en de, 'ut'en untsi'-i dati us'ai whe 'unt'oh. 'Ink'ez nka' ninzun whe 'unt'oh, 'et hoonts'i whuch'a whumoodih onle'.”
'Et Cain dudulhutsin Abel yulh yailhduk, 'et 'uhooja nus tl'o k'ut 'uhint'oh whe, Cain dudulhutsin Abel yuch'az nedinja 'ink'ez yuzilhghi.
'Et whe Moodihti (Yahweh) Cain 'uyulhni, “Nyulhutsin Abel daja?” Cain 'utni, “T'eoonuzuszun, si eh sulhutsin ghusli?”
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Nts'en'a dainja?” Yun whuts'un nyulhutsin buzkai' sts'un huyih.
'Andit 'awet ndi yun mba whutátsi'. Yun dizts'o nla k'ez nyulhutsin buzkai' ook'eijul 'et huwa.
Yun gha itanelh te, daltus la hukw'un'a mba ook'ut halhe'untizye. Ndi yun k'ut tandalh whut'oh nunul'i-un 'ink'ez yoh lhuhoot'i'-un tanleh.”
'Et Cain 'en Moodihti (Yahweh) 'uyúlhni, “Be sba nahisda-i 'onus sba hoondaz k'et 'aw whulh 'oost'e' ait'oh.
'Alha 'andit dzin whuts'un ndi yun k'ut suntinyoot nyunin ba whu'iz 'utist'elh, ndi yun k'ut nunul'i'-un 'ink'ez yoh lhuhoot'i'-un tisleh, 'ink'ez mbe nasilhti-un sutuzilhghelh whe 'unt'oh”.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) 'uyulhni, “Et huwa, mbe Cain silhghi-un lhtak'ant'it 'uwhultsuk-un ooba k'utitnelh.” Doo ka si Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en Cain ye hoodalh'en khun nahiyilhti 'ink'ez hizoolhghelh whuch'a.
'Et Cain Moodihti (Yahweh) ch'a suya 'ink'ez yun k'ut Nod huwhutni-un 'et nenina, ha'nuyeh k'et Eden 'on daz ts'e.
'Ink'ez Cain du'at t'einanzin, ulchan 'ink'ez Enoch ooyaz whuzdli. 'Ink'ez keyoh whuti 'uhoonla 'ink'ez duye' boozi', Enoch be hoozi.
Irad 'en Enoch ooye' suli' 'ink'ez Irad, Mehujael ooye' suli' 'ink'ez Mehujail 'en Methushael, 'ink'ez Methushael, Lamech ooye' suli'.
'Et Lamech nane ts'ekoo ilhchoot, du'atke eni, 'ilhoghun oo'at, Adah boozi' 'ink'ez 'on 'at-un 'en Zillah huyulhni.
'Ink'ez Adah, 'en Jabal ooyaz suli'. 'En buzkehkene nimbali bet huwhut'i 'ink'ez khuna-i 'i nulhyeh.
Bulhutsin boozi' Jubal, 'en ndi harp 'ink'ez flute hiyulhni 'i be hujun, 'enne ts'iyawh hube 'abá.
Zillah, 'en cha buzke hooni. 'Ilhoghun 'en Tubal-Cain hiyulhni. 'En mbe ndi 'utes 'ink'ez dulk'un te 'ink'ez lhuztih bulh yugha khuna 'enne ts'iyawh hubodulh'eh. 'Ink'ez Tubal-Cain bulhtus 'en Naamah ts'utni.
'Et Lamech du'atke 'ubulhni, “Adah 'ink'ez Zillah, soo zulhts'ai, dune ka sulhtsi huwa sisghi, chilh hoonts'i sundilhda' hukwa sisghi”.
Cain k'utitnelh te, lhtak'ant'it tighan, 'et de Lamech lhtak'ant'it whunizyat 'on 'at lhtak'ant'it 'uwhultsuk-un.
Adam doo cha du'at t'enanzin whe ooyaz dune suli', 'en Seth yulhni. Eve 'utni, “Yak'usda (Elohim) 'uye' sgha nilhti, 'en Abel yuk'e naidalhti, Cain yuzilhghi-un.”
Seth cha ooye' whuzdli', Enosh yulhni. 'Et ndoh dzin dunene Moodihti (Yahweh) boozi' be ka whehuninyih.
Ndi 'udustl'us, Adam ts'u haindene ghun 'unt'oh. Yak'usda (Elohim) ndet dzin 'uyinla dzin, Yak'usda (Elohim) ndot'en yulhtsi.
Dune 'ink'ez ts'eke bulh 'ubinla 'ink'ez soo hoonzoo-un hubulhni 'ink'ez yun ka dune'ne 'ubinla, dzin 'ubinla-un.
'Ink'ez Adam 'ilho whunizyat whunizyat 'on 'at tat whunizyat (130) yus k'ut khuna' 'ink'ez ooye' yundot'en-un ooye' suli', Seth yulhni.
Seth ooye' suli' hukw'elh'az, Adam lhk'udit whunizyat whunizyai (800) be yus k'ut hukw'elh'az 'ink'ez ooye'ke, ootse'ke cha whuzdli.
Adam khuna' 'uwhuldzoh hana'-un 'ilho hooloh whunizyat whunizyai 'on 'at tat whunizyat (930) yus k'ut khuna' 'et dazsai.
Seth 'en 'ilhoh whunizyat whunizyai 'ink'ez kwulat be yus k'ut (105) khuna' whe Enosh ooye' suli'.
Enosh ooye' suli' hukw'elh'az, Seth lhk'udit whunizyai lhk'udit 'on 'at lhtak'ant'it (807) be yus k'ut whe ooye'ke 'ink'ez ootse'ke cha whuzdli'.
Seth 'ilho hooloh whunizyat whunizyai 'on 'at 'ilho hooloh 'ink'ez 'on 'at nat be yus k'ut (912) whe dazsai.
Enosh 'ilho hooloh whunizyat (90) 'ink'ez Cainan ooye' suli'.
Cainan ooye' suli' hukw'elh'az lhk'udit whunizyat whunizyai 'on 'at whunizyat 'on 'at kwulat (815) be yus k'ut 'ink'ez ooye'ke 'ink'ez ootse'ke cha whuzdli'.
Enosh yinka inda' 'uwhulyiz-un 'ilho hooloh whunizyat whunizyai 'ink'ez kwulai' (905) be yus k'ut whe dazsai.
Cainan lhtak'antit whunizyat (70) khana' 'ink'ez Mahaleel ooye' suli'.
Maheleel whuzdli hukw'elh'az, Cainan lhk'udit whunizyat whunizyai 'on 'at dit whunizyat (840) be yus k'ut 'ink'ez ooye'ke 'ink'ez ootse'ke cha whuzdli'.
'Et Cainan 'ilho hooloh whunizyat whunizyai 'ink'ez whunizyat (910) be yus k'ut 'et dazsai.
Mahaleel lhk'utat whunizyat 'on 'at kwulat (65) be yus k'ut, 'ink'ez Jared ooye' suli'.
Jared whuzdli hukw'elh'az Mahaleel lhk'udit whunizyat whunizyai 'ink'ez tat whunizyai (830) be yus k'ut 'ink'ez ooye'ke 'ink'ez ootse'ke cha whuzdli'.
'Et Mahaleel be yus k'ut lhk'udit whunizyat whunizyai 'ink'ez 'ilho hooloh 'ink'ez kwulat (895) be yus k'ut 'et dazsai.
Jared yunka inda' 'ilho whunizyat whunizyai 'ink'ez lhk'utat whunizyat (162) be yus k'ut 'ink'ez nanki Enoch ooye' suli'.
Enoch whuzdli hukw'elh'az Jared lhk'udit whunizyat whunizyai (800) be yus k'ut nahitna' 'ink'ez ooye'ke 'ink'ez oots'eke cha whuhuzdli'.
Jared be yus k'ut 'ilho hooloh whunizyat whunizyai 'ink'ez lhk'utat 'ink'ez nat (962) be yus k'ut khana' 'ink'ez dazsai.
Enoch lhk'utat whunizyat 'ink'ez kwulat (65) be yus k'ut khana' 'ink'ez Methuselah ooye' suli'.
Methuselah whuzdli hukw'elh'az Enoch Yak'usda (Elohim) bulh nusa'az tat whunizyat whunizyai (300) be yus k'ut 'ink'ez ooye'ke 'ink'ez ootse'ke cha whuzdli'.
Enoch yun ka inda'-un tat whunizyat whunizyai 'on 'at kwulat (365) be yus k'ut 'et khana'.
'Ink'ez Enoch Yak'usda (Elohim) bulh nusa'az 'ink'ez hoolel, Yak'usda (Elohim) nayilhchoot huwa.
Methuselah 'ilho hooloh whunizyai whunizyat 'ink'ez lhk'udit whunizyat 'on 'at lhtak'ant'it (187) be yus k'ut khuna 'et Lamech ooye' whuzdli'.
Lamech whuzdli hukw'elh'az, Methuselah lhtak'ant'it whunizyai whunizyat 'ink'ez lhk'udit whunizyat 'on 'at nanki (782) be yus k'ut whe khuna 'ink'ez ooye'ke 'ink'ez ootse'ke cha whuzdli'.
'Et Methuselah 'ilho hooloh whunizyat whunizyai 'ink'ez lhk'utat whunizyat whunizyai 'ink'ez lhk'utat whunizyai 'on 'at 'ilho hooloh (969) be yus k'ut whe dazsai.
Lamech 'en 'ilhoh whunizyai whunizyat 'ink'ez lhk'udit whunizyat 'on 'at nanki (182) be yus k'ut suli' 'ink'ez 'ilhoghun ooye' suli'.
'Ink'ez, Nowe be yoozi 'ink'ez 'utni, “Ndun 'en si k'unenunoo'ah neye 'ut'en ha 'ink'ez neba be oogha ts'ana-i, yun Moodihti (Yahweh) ye k'ehanya 'et huwa”.
Nowe yun ka neninya hukw'elh'az kwulat whunizyat whunizyai 'ink'ez 'ilho hooloh whunizyai 'ink'ez kwulat (595) be yus k'ut suli' 'et ooye'ke 'ink'ez ootse'ke cha whuhuzdli.
Lamech khana' nduwhulyiz-un lhtak'ant'it whunizyai whunizyat 'ink'ez lhtak'ant'it whunizyat 'on 'at lhtak'ant'it (777) be yus k'ut 'et dazsai.
'Ink'ez Nowe kwulat whunizyai whunizyat (500) be yus k'ut whe Shem, Ham 'ink'ez Japheth 'enne ooye'ke suli'.
'Et 'uhooja, ndi yun k'ut dune 'awet nus za 'uhuniltsuk whe 'ink'ez ts'ekoo bubuzkeh suli'.
Yak'usda (Elohim) ooye'ke 'enne ndunne ts'ekoo dune ootse'kene huhinzooo hubo nilh'en. 'Ink'ez mbene la buka' huninzunne 'enne ts'ekoo bubu hilhchoot, bu'atke hole' ha.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) 'utni, “Syoghi 'aw 'ilhiz when dune bulh buch'az dotni ait'oh. 'Alha ndi yun k'ut dune unli 'et hoonts'i whunizyat whunizyai 'ink'ez nat whunizyai (120) be yus k'ut tileh whe ndi yun k'ut tidalh.”
'Et 'oh da' njan yun k'ut dunechone hanle'. 'Et hukw'elh'az Yak'usda (Elohim) ooye'ke 'enne ndi yun k'ut dune butse'ke buzisda 'ink'ez bubuzkehke yahonle'. 'Et ndunne dune whuzdli'ne, 'enne dune lhtuscho 'ink'ez nchane 'uhint'oh.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) bunilh'en ndi yun k'ut dune huye untsi' tube ncha suli'. Ts'iyawh 'ahoolhyiz wheni ndune bubeni untsi', 'et whunilh'en.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) tube huwu dzin unduda ndi yun k'ut dune 'inla-un, oodzi yo tube whunduda suli'.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) 'utni, “Mbene la dune ndi yun k'ut wheni 'ubuslane, soo ts'iyawh gak hubutiselh. Ndi dune 'ink'ez khuna-i, yun k'ut nulh'as-i 'ink'ez ndo dut'ai nudilh-i cha, 'i ts'iyawh. 'Et tube huwu sdzi unduda 'ubusdla 'et huwa.”
'Et hoonts'i Nowe 'en Moodihti (Yahweh) oonalh ndi ye nets'un unzoo-i 'et nahoon'ai.
Nowe ts'u haindene hukw'eguz 'et 'uhoont'oh. Nowe 'en ts'ih'un dune unli, khuna da' whe 'aw ook'eholts'it hooloh. Nowe 'en Yak'usda (Elohim) bulh nuya inle'.
Nowe tane ooye'ke suli': Shem, Ham, 'ink'ez Japheth.
Yak'usda (Elohim) oonalh ndi yun k'ut ndulcho dune ninta' honilh'en 'ink'ez dune lhezudla-un, dulcho whe whudizbun.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) njan yun k'ut 'et whunilh'en whe 'alha tube ninta' whunt'en. Dunene, 'enne ts'iyawh soo ts'ih'un 'ants'i halhjut le'hint'oh suli'.
Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en Nowe 'uyulhni, “Njan ts'iyawh ndai la usjiz-i, 'awet sba whulatoh suli'. Dunene 'enne bulagha ts'e ndi yun k'ut ts'iyawh be lhezudla-i be hodilhbun. 'Et whunilh'en, ndi yun ndulcho whe ndi khuna ts'iyawh yun k'ut husjiz-i, ts'iyawh bulh gak whutiselh.
Ndi duchun gopher hiyulhni, 'i be ts'i cho 'ónleh. 'Ink'ez bez ts'e 'et lhelhdun whulai holhtselh. Dzeh 'i be bez ts'e 'ink'ez yoo'az ts'e cha be ondzeh.
'Ink'ez 'et ndiz un'a ndi ts'i cho 'i 'onleh: 450 feet 'et 'uhoolhyiz, 'ink'ez 75 feet 'et 'uhooltel, 'ink'ez 45 feet naoodalhza'.
Dadint'az cho ooba 'onleh. 'Ilho cubit ndo ooban whuts'un, 'et nenin'a holhtselh. Oozih k'ut 'et dati-un 'onleh. 'Udeyo-un yun cha 'onleh 'ink'ez 'on do cha 'udun 'uhoonleh, 'ink'ez bulh tad-un yun 'et 'uhonleh.
'Et whunilh'en 'et si 'utisnelh, yun k'ut ndulhcho too hatadutisbilh. Yat whutah 'et gak whutiselh. Ts'iyawh ndai ndi usjiz be ts'ukhuna bulh 'unt'oh, 'i gak tileh. Ndi yun k'ut 'et ts'iyai yatadlah.
'Et hoonts'i nyun nts'un sghuni ntl'adutis'alh. 'Ink'ez ndi ts'i cho bez tonya', nyun, nye'keh, n'at, 'ink'ez nye'keh bu'atkeh cha, 'en dulh 'úbolneh.
'Ink'ez ndai la ndi yun k'ut usjiz-i, lhawh didoh 'ilho whe nawh didoh-i, 'i ndi 'i ts'i cho be onlelh. 'Et ts'iyawh khutinalh wheni ts'eke cha 'ink'ez dune cha unli-i didoh-i ts'iyawh.
Ndai la ndo nudilh-i dundult'oh-i, yun nulh'as-i dundult'oh-i cha, 'ink'ez yun nuts'eh-i dundult'oh-i cha, nanki dundult'oh-i ts'iyawh nts'un tidulh, khutinalh wheni.
'Ink'ez ndai la 'ut'alh-i ts'iyawh, tan'ulh-i ts'iyawh be 'onlelh, 'i ts'iyawh 'ulhonlelh. 'I la ooh'alh nyun 'ink'ez ndi khuna-i cha.”
'Et Nowe 'et nduja, nts'en'a Yak'usda (Elohim) yuba nahizya, 'et ts'iyawh nduja.
'Et whe Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en Nowe 'uyulhni, “Nyuzkeh cha, nyunch'oh cha, mbene la nyoh whut'ine ts'iyawh ndi ts'i cho behdilh, daint'oh la ts'ih'un dune inli, ndi 'andit dune toh ndoh whuya hoozulh dune toh daint'oh la ts'ih-un dune inli-un 'et whunus'en.
Ndi yun k'ut khuna-i ootsun hooloh-i, lhtak'ant'i dune 'ink'ez ts'eke bulh 'ilhoh didoh-i nanki whe khuna-i tsiyawh. Ndi khuna-i dutsun-i cha, dune cha ts'eke cha, 'ohwhi 'i ts'iyawh olhchoot.
'Ink'ez ndi yun k'ut ndai la nudilh-i dut'ai ts'iyawh cha lhtak'ant'i dune 'ink'ez ts'eke bulh cha, 'ohwhi ts'iyawh ndi yun k'ut khuna-i ndai la khutinalh-i.
Lhtak'ant'i dzin hukw'elh'az 'et ndi yun k'ut dit whunizyat (40) dzin 'ink'ez dit whunizyat 'ulhdzis whuts'un nawhutilhtilh. Ndai usla ndi yun k'ut usjiz-i ts'iyawh hooloh whutilhtselh.”
'Et Nowe nts'en'a Moodihti (Yahweh) yuba nahizya, ts'iyawh 'et nduja.
Nowe 'en 600 be nawhudizut yun k'ut inda whe ndi yun k'ut 'et dutadilt'o.
'Et Nowe ooye'ke oo'at cha, 'ink'ez ooye'ke bu'atke cha ts'iyawh 'i nyoo ts'i cho huyeindil 'awet too ndo 'utinelh 'et huwa.
Ndai la khuna-i lhditsun-i 'ink'ez khuna-i dutsun 'i cha, dut'ai cha 'ink'ez ndi yun k'ut nulh'az-i ts'iyawh.
Nanki hinli whe ndi ts'i cho bez Nowe ts'un dahunilh'az, dune 'ink'ez ts'eke cha. 'Et nts'en'a Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en Nowe yuba nahizya, 'et nduhuja.
'Et hukw'elh'az lhtak'ant'i dzin inle' 'et 'awet ndi yun k'ut too whuzdli'.
Nowe be yus k'ut-un, whunizyat lhk'utat whunizyat (600) 'et 'uhooja whulh nanki sanun (2) whunizyat 'on 'at lhtak'ant'it dzin (17) 'et 'uhooja ndi yun k'ut too ts'iyawh oodaha'dilts'ut, 'ink'ez ndo yak'uz whudadint'az cha whudaha'dankat.
Dit whunizyat dzin 'ink'ez dit whunizyat 'ulhdzis 'et ndi yun k'ut yun chan honle'.
Soo 'et dzin za Nowe ooye'ke cha, Shem, Ham 'ink'ez Japheth, 'ink'ez Nowe oo'at, 'ink'ez ooyas'atke cha ts'iyawh ndi ts'i cho huyeindil.
'Enne cha 'ink'ez ts'iyawh khuna-i lhelhts'un didoh, ts'iyawh musdoos lhelhts'un didoh, ts'iyai yun nulh'as lhelhts'un didoh, 'ink'ez yat whudut'ai lhelhts'un didoh cha, ts'iyai didoh lhelhch'a 'uwhut'en.
Nanki whe ts'iyawh Nowe bulh ndi ts'i cho huyeindil. Ndai la khuna-i ndi yun k'ut ooyiz hoonli-i ts'iyawh.
Et ndowhi ts'iyawh ts'ek'e dune tubulh. Ndi yun k'ut hoonli-i Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en yuba nahizya, whuz un'a ndi ts'i huye indil 'ink'ez buch'az na'din'ai.
Ndi hatadilt'o-i too dit whunizyat dzin (40) 'et 'ant'e' too ndo za lhe'inelh 'ink'ez ndi ts'i cho dudinlat yun ando ts'e whuz dudinlat.
Too 'et za ndut'en 'ink'ez nus za lhe'itus ndi yun k'ut, 'ink'ez ndi ts'i cho 'oh nulat.
'Et ndi yun k'ut too tube takhulh suli'. Dzulh 'owhi cha ts'iyawh ba ndo hatadilt'o.
Ndo za 'ut'en (15 cubits) 'ink'ez ndi too dzulh ba ndo hatadilt'o.
'Et ndi yun k'ut khuna-i nuhutnah-i, dut'ai cha, 'ink'ez musdoos ndunt'i-i cha, yun nulh'as-i cha, ts'iyawh dune cha ts'iyawh hooloh huzdli'.
Mbene la ooyiz hoonline husjizne, 'ink'ez hoonli husjiz-i 'ohwhi ts'iyawh yun k'ut 'unt'oh-i, ts'iyawh yaidla.
'Et ndi yun k'ut hoonli khuna-i ts'iyawh gak whulhtsi. Yun nulh'as-i cha, dune cha, 'ink'ez khuna-i cha, dut'ai cha, ts'iyawh gak whulhtsi. Nowe 'ink'ez yulh 'ut'enne 'enne za ndi ts'i cho bet hukhuna.
'Et whunizyat whunizyat 'ink'ez kwulat whunizyat dzin (150) 'et 'uwhulhyiz whe ndi yun k'ut too honle'.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) Nowe 'ink'ez khuna-i ndai la usjiz-i ts'i bet ts'iyawh yulh 'unt'ohne whunalnih, 'ink'ez Yak'usda nilhts'i 'i 'uyinla 'i ndi yun k'ut nalhts'i, 'et too yo 'uja.
Ndi yun k'ut too ts'iyawh 'ink'ez ndo yak'uz whudadint'az cha ts'iyawh yudana'dinla 'ink'ez yak'uz ts'un chan 'etsul 'uyinla.
'Ink'ez too ts'iyawh yo whe'ninle', whunizyat whunizyat 'ink'ez 'on 'at kwulat whunizyat dzin (150) 'et too yo 'uja.
'Et ndi ts'i 'i nts'e ndi dzulh Ararat huyulhni 'unt'oh, 'i lhtak'ant'it sanun 'ink'ez whunizyat 'on 'at lhtak'ant'it dzin (17), 'i k'ut neninkez.
'Ink'ez too yo 'uja 'ink'ez yo za lhe'inelh whunizyat sanun whuts'un, 'udechoo dzin 'et dzulh oolatoh hooltsai.
''Et 'uhooja dit whunizyat dzin (40) 'etsul 'uhooja whe Nowe dadint'az 'i daha'idantan.
Datsancho 'i yula ditni 'az ndulcho 'awh nut'o za ut'en, too gak tileh whuts'un.
'Et doo cha dut'aiyaz, 'imbin huyulhni, 'i yula ditni 'awet tila too yo 'uja ha.
'Et ndi 'imbin 'aw noot'ah-un hooloh, 'et ka ndi ts'i cho yuts'un naoost'o, 'awhuz ndi yun ndulcho too hoonli. 'Et huwa Nowe dula be yuba tedilni 'ink'ez 'et danainilhti.
'Et doo cha lhtak'ant'i dzin 'et whubailh'e'. 'Et doo cha ndi 'imbin yuladitni.
'Et hulhgha 'et ndi 'imbin whusanat'o 'ink'ez duchun, olive hiyulhni, oot'an 'andit hanalhyai, 'i ooze yudiztan. 'Et 'awet Nowe t'eooninzin ndi yun k'ut 'awet too hooloh suli'.
'Et doo cha lhtak'ant'i dzin 'et huba ilh'e', 'et doo cha ndi 'imbin, 'i yuladitni 'ink'ez 'aw whusanalhit'oh.
'Et 'uhooja lhk'utat whunizyat yus k'ut 'ink'ez 'et 'udechoo yus k'ut (601), 'ink'ez 'udechoo sanun 'udechoo dzin sanun 'et yun k'ut naoodisgih. 'Ink'ez Nowe ndi ts'i ndo yudaha'dantan 'ink'ez whunilh'en ndulcho yun naoodisgih.
'Et whulh nanki sanun nat whunizyat dzin 'on 'at lhtak'ant'i dzin sanun (27), 'et yun naoodisgih.
Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en Nowe yulh yailhduk 'uyulhni,
“Nyoo ts'i tenanindaih ndai la n'at cha 'ink'ez nyuzkehke, du'atke tubulh tenanuhdilh
Ndai la tsi bet dalts'i'-i khuna-i usjiz-i ts'iyawh tenaninle, dut'ai cha 'ink'ez khuna-i 'ink'ez yun nulh'as-i cha, 'et si ndi yun k'ut lhai hoole'.
'Et Nowe teninya 'ink'ez buzke cha oo'at cha 'ink'ez bu'atke cha ts'iyawh bubulh.
Khuna-i ndai la yun nulh'as-i cha, dut'ai cha, ts'iyawh lhulhdidoh-i, 'i ts'iyawh ndi ts'i huye haindil.
'Et Nowe 'en Moodihti (Yahweh) ts'un loodel 'uzdilhk'un k'ut, 'i 'inla, 'ink'ez ndai la khuna-i 'aw lhditsun-i, 'ink'ez ndai la dut'ai 'aw lhditsun-i cha, 'ohwhi 'i k'ut yudalhk'un.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) ndi sooltsun-i yunahoolhtsun. 'Ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) didutch'oh dudzi yo 'utni, “'Aw 'on 'at ndi yun dune gha 'aw ook'ehoosyih ait'oh. Dahint'oh la dune budzi ntsi' hintsool whuts'un, 'et hoonts'i 'aw doo cha 'on 'at khuna-i ndi yun k'ut gak hooselh ait'oh.
Ndi yun hoonli whut'oh 'a' nukat-un 'ink'ez ha' nukat-un, whuzk'uz 'ink'ez whunulwus-un cha, khit cha 'ink'ez shin cha. 'Ink'ez dzenis cha 'ink'ez 'ulhdzis cha hoonli-un, 'aw 'etsul lhe'whutasnel.”
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en Nowe 'ink'ez ooye'ke tucha ts'iyawh soo hoonzoo-un hubúlhni whe 'ubulhni, “Lhane cho oole' ndi yun doolhbun hubulhni.
Ndi yun k'ut khuna-i ts'iyai huye ntiljut, dut'ai cha ndi yun nuhutnah-i 'ink'ez lho cha ts'iyawh nohla k'ez be huwant'ai.
Dant'i ts'iyawh usjiz 'i nukhutnah, 'i ut'alh-i nohba oole'. 'Et ndai ts'iyawh nohgha nusla, 'ut'an hanuyeh ts'u'alh-i hoonts'i.
'Et hoonts'i ndi khuna-i 'awhuz buzkai be khuna bulh 'unt'oh, 'i 'aw lhuzon'al. Ndi “be khutna”, 'i buzkai 'unt'oh ni whe 'utni.
'Alha dune nyuzkai' hawhulhtsi de sbut hutiyin whe' hoont'oh. Khuna-i dune silhghi 'i hoonts'i whuz un'a za 'uhoont'oh. Dune 'uyoon dune silhghi-un mbe 'uja-un buzkai' ooka' nuszun.
Mbe dune 'uyoon buzkai' whulhtsi-un, 'uyoon dune ndun dune 'uja-un yuzkai' whutilhtselh whe' hoont'oh, Yak'usda (Elohim) dune yulh ndult'oh yulhtsi 'et huwa.
'Ink'ez nohni, lhane cho nohuzkeh oole'. Lhan'un cho ndi yun k'ut whut'enne lhane cho nohhuzke' hoole'.”
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) Nowe 'ink'ez ooye'ke te 'enne 'ubulhni,
“'Et si whunulh'en sghuni 'i bulh 'i nohbulh lhadusla. Mbene la nohts'u haindene nohk'elh'az 'enne cha.
'Ink'ez khuna-i ts'iyawh nohbulh 'unt'oh-i, dut'ai cha, musdoos cha, 'ink'ez khuna-i ts'iyawh ndi yun k'ut hoonli-i nohbulh 'unt'oh-i, 'i ts'iyawh ts'i cho be nohbulh dehailh'az, yun k'ut khuna-i ts'iyawh.
Whuz un'a sghuni 'i bulh 'i nohbulh lhadusla. 'Aw doo cha za ndi yun k'ut ndai la khuna-i ts'iyawh usjiz-i, ts'iyawh 'aw too be 'aw huboosghan ait'oh. 'Aw doo cha za dutadilt'o whe ndi yun gak ooselh ait'oh.”
'Ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) 'utni, “Njan 'et si whehoodalh'eh khuni nohts'un lhadusla-i, si 'ink'ez nohni nohbulh, ndai ndi yun k'ut usjiz-i hoonli-i ts'iyawh 'ilhiz wheni khuni 'unt'oh.
Ditni na'anguz kw'us toh 'i 'usla. 'I gha whehoodat'en tileh si 'ink'ez ndi yun k'ut-i bulh khuna-i 'usla-i.
'Et 'uhot'e, ndet yun k'ut, kw'us whulhlih teh, 'et ditni na'anguz 'i ts'unoolh'en kw'us toh 'et.
Ndai la nohni cha 'ink'ez khuna-i cha ts'iyawh 'i oonatiznih khuni nohts'un lhadusla-i, ts'iyawh 'aw doo cha 'on 'at too ndo hatadilt'o, yun k'ut hoonli-i gak ooselh ait'oh.
Ditni kwun 'i kw'us toh hoonli de 'i nus'en de 'et whunatiznih, 'ilhiz wheni ndi khuni Yak'usda (Elohim) 'ink'ez ndi yun k'ut hoonli-i usjiz-i ts'iyawh khuni nohba lhadúsla, oonatiznih.”
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) Nowe 'ulhnni, “Njan whehoodat'en-un 'uhoont'oh, 'uwhusla-un, njan khuni nohba lhadúsla 'uhoont'oh, Si 'ink'ez ndi yun k'ut hoonli ts'iyawh usjiz-i bulh lhet'o khuni.”
'Andit 'et Nowe ooye'ke 'en ndi ts'i cho be hahandil, 'en Shem, Ham, 'ink'ez Japheth. 'Ink'ez Ham, 'en Canaan be oobá 'unt'oh.
Ndunne tane 'enne Nowe ooye'ke hinle, 'enne buts'u haidene. 'Enne bugha ndi yun k'ut whudizbun.
'Ink'ez Nowe hanuyeh-i ghana-un suli', duchun oomai' hoonli-i 'et 'uhoonla.
'Et ndi ts'ekoo too' 'uyinla-i yitnai' whe tanisnai' 'ink'ez ook'e'tizkat nimbali t'ah.
'Et Ham Canaan oobá 'en dubá ye 'ust'et yan'en 'ink'ez nane dulhusinke 'enne budani' 'az.
'Et Shem 'ink'ez Japheth bulh naih hilhchoot 'ink'ez dut'a ts'e k'ehuyilhbal duwus k'ut 'ink'ez k'oh un'a hi'us whe dubá hik'ehuyin'oh 'aw dubá lhuhinilh'el, ye 'ust'et lhuhuyi'el.
'Et Nowe ts'ekoo too' utnai' whe ts'eninzut, 'udek'oh-un duye' 'en dadudinla la 'et teoonanzin.
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Canaan ook'ehidih. Dune ba 'ut'en-un 'enne buba' tit'elh 'et la dudulhutsinke cha buba' titelh.”
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Moodihti (Yahweh) soo hoonzoo-un unli. Shem ooYak'usda (Elohim) 'unt'oh. 'Ink'ez Canaan yunat ne'ut'en-un oole'.
Yak'usda (Elohim) Japheth ncha yoolhts'elh, Shem oonimbali t'ah 'oh hoot'e', 'ink'ez Canaan yunat ne'oot'en.”
'Inkez Nowe butadilt'o hukw'elh'az 'et whunizyat tat whunizyat 'ink'ez kwulat whunizyat yus k'ut (350) 'et nakhitna'.
'Et Nowe 'alhgoh ndi yun k'ut inda'-un whunizyat 'ilho hooloh whunizyat 'ink'ez kwulat whunizyai yus k'ut (950) whe dazsai.
Ndunne 'enne Nowe ooye'ke ts'u haindene Shem, Ham 'ink'ez Japheth, ts'iyawh buye'ke whuzdli' dutadilt'o hukw'elh'az.
Japheth buzk'eh dunene, Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Meshech 'ink'ez Tiras.
Gomaer buzkeh dunene, Ashkenaz, Riphath, 'ink'ez Togarmah.
Javan buzkeh dunene, Elishah, Tarshish, Kittim, 'ink'ez Dodanim.
Ndunne 'enne yatooba 'udun keyoh whut'enne buch'oh nehunindil didutch'oh duyun mbene la 'ilho khuni be za yalhdukne 'ink'ez dahint'oh la lhelhdoh hudidoh 'enne 'oh huwhut'i.
Ham buzkeh 'enne dunene, Cush, Misraim, Put, 'ink'ez Canaan 'uhant'e.
Cush buzkeh 'enne dunene, Seba, Havilah, Sabtah, Raamah, 'ink'ez Sabtechah. Raamah buzkeh 'enne dunene, Sheba 'ink'ez Dedan 'uhant'e.
Cush 'en Nimrod ooye' suli', 'ink'ez Nimrod tube ulhtus ndi yun k'ut neninya.
'En 'unt'oh Moodihti (Yahweh) bunalh soo tube cho 'uka 'ut'en-un unli. 'Et huwa 'uwhutni, “Nimrod k'un'a Moodihti (Yahweh) bunalh soo tube cho 'uka 'ut'en-un unli.”
'Udechoo whu Lerwe suli'-un, 'en Babel, Erech, Accad 'ink'ez Calneh, Shinar yun k'ut.
'Et yun whuts'un Assyria 'ink'ez Nineveh huwhutni-un 'et cha 'uhoonla, Rehoboth Ir 'ink'ez Calah.
'Ink'ez Resen, Nineveh 'ink'ez Calah whulh eguz, 'et 'udechoo keyoh whuti.
Mizraim buye'ke, 'enne Lud whut'enne, Anam whut'enne, Lehob whut'enne, Naphtuh whut'enne,
Pathrus whut'enne, 'ink'ez Casluh whut'enne, 'enne Philistinene 'ink'ez Caphtor whut'enne hahande.
Canaan 'en Sidon, 'udechoo ooye' yuzdli', 'ink'ez Heth;
Jebus whut'enne, Armor whut'enne, 'ink'ez Girgash whut'enne cha,
ndunne Hiv whut'enne, Ark whut'enne, 'ink'ez Sin whut'enne cha,
ndunne Arvad whut'enne, Zemar whut'enne, 'ink'ez Hanath whut'enne cha. 'Et hukw'elh'az Canaan ts'u haindene 'enne lhelhts'un yahandil.
Canaan whut'enne whukeyoh whuban 'et Sidam, Girard ts'uwheti-un Gaza 'uwhuldzoh, Sodom ts'uwheti-un Gomorrah, Admah, Zeboim, Lasha ts'e 'uwhuldzoh.
Ndunne, 'enne Ham ooye'ke ts'u haindene cha 'ilho khuni be yahulhduk 'ink'ez duyun 'ink'ez 'ilhoh hudidoh.
Shem 'en cha oobuzkeh whuzdli', Eber buzkeh, 'en ooba. Bulhutsin Japheth 'udetso whudilhdzulh-un.
Shem ooye'ke, 'enne Elam, Assur, Arphaxad, Lud, 'ink'ez Aram.
Aram ooye'ke, 'enne Uz, Hul, Gether, 'ink'ez Mash.
Arphaxad 'en Shelah ooye' 'unt'oh, 'ink'ez Shelah 'en ooye' Eber 'unt'oh.
Eber ooye'ke nane hinli. 'Ilhoghun boozi 'en Peleg. 'En khuna da' ndi yun k'ut lhts'e hoolts'ut 'et huwa. 'Ink'ez bulhutsin, 'en Joktan ts'utni.
Joktan ooye'ke 'enne Almodad, Sheleph, Hazarmaveth, Jerah,
Hadoram, Uzal, Diklah,
Obal, Abimael, Sheba,
Ophir, Havilah, 'ink'ez Jobab. 'En ts'iyawh Joktan ooye'ke 'uhint'oh.
Ndet la huwhut'i-un, Mesha, Sephar ts'uwheti-un nda' dzulh hoonli 'et huwhut'i.
'Enne Shem ooye'ke ts'u haindene cha, 'ilho khuni yahulhduk. 'ilho hudidoh whe 'ilhoh huwhut'i.
Ndunne 'enne Nowe ooye'ke ts'u haindene 'enne ts'iyawh lhk'ehidil ndi yun k'ut too whuzdli' hukw'elh'az. 'Ink'ez 'ilhoh huwhut'i ndi yun k'ut lhelhdoh 'uhoont'oh.
Ndi yun k'ut 'oh da' 'ilho khuni za hoonli ts'iyanne lhk'un'a yahulhduk.
'Et 'uhooja nda' ndaz de hutizdil whe yun, Shiner huyulhni, 'i hik'eindil 'et 'uhoont'oh duchun hooloh-un nahuhoon'ai 'et nehunina.
'Et lhgha 'uhudutni, “'Anih, tse tl'us 'i 'uts'ooleh, 'ink'ez soo cho whe ts'oolht'es.” Tse tl'us 'i tse ba huyut'i 'ink'ez be ts'uwhudzeh, 'i hiye whutl'us ba.
'Et 'uhutni, “'Anih njan keyoh whuti 'uts'odoolneh 'ink'ez ndo yak'uz nain'a-i nyiz-i cho 'i 'uts'ooleh. 'Et wheni si neoozi' hoonli hole', ndi 'uts'inla da, doo ka si ndulcho whe ndi yun k'ut yats'odilh.”
'Et whe Moodihti (Yahweh) ndus de hainya 'ink'ez nyo keyoh whunilh'en 'ink'ez nyoo nain'a-i cho yoh huyulhtsi, 'i cha 'uhuyinla-i yunalh'en.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) 'utni, “A 'ilhune za hinli dune 'ink'ez lhk'un'a za yahulhduk. 'Et njan 'et azi whe'honilh'en ndai la 'uhitilelh hukwa' huninzun-un ts'iyawh si 'uhuhooleh.
'Anih buts'un ts'utoodilh, 'ink'ez bughuni 'i buch'a lhtats'uholelh. 'Et si lhulh hoodosts'o.”
'Et whe Moodihti (Yahweh) lhch'a buninla, 'ink'ez njan yun k'ut ndulhcho nehunindil. 'Et whe dune whut'i whucho nehonin'ai 'et 'etsul 'uhuja.
'Et huwa nyo nain'a-i cho, 'i Babal huyulhni, ndai la huye yalhduk-i cha ts'iyawh Moodihti (Yahweh) lhelhts'un un'a yahulhduk hubulhtsi 'ink'ez ndulcho yahandil.
Shem huyulhni-un, 'en oots'u hayandene ndi 'i 'unt'oh: whunizyat whunizyai 'et be yus k'ut (100) whe ooye' Arphaxad huyulhni, 'en ooye' suli' dutadilt'o hukw'elh'az nat yus k'ut 'et whuzdli'.
Arphaxad ookelh'az whudli-un 'et Shem 500 yus k'ut 'et nahinda' whe 'et ooye'ke cha 'ink'ez ootse'ke cha nahodle'.
Arphaxad 'en tat whunizyai 'on 'at kwulat be yus k'ut whe 'et Shelah huyulhni, 'en ooyaz suli'.
Shelah whuzdli hukw'elh'az Arphaxad 403 be yus k'ut whe dune cha 'ink'ez ts'ekoo cha 'enne buzkeh nasdli'.
Shelah 'en tat whunizyat be yus k'ut (30) whe 'et ooye', Eber huyulhni, 'en ooye' suli'.
Eber hukw'elh'az 'et Shelah 403 yus k'ut whe 'et 'uyoonne dune cha 'ink'ez ts'ekoo cha buzkeh nasdli'.
Eber tat whunizyat 'on 'at dit be yus k'ut (34) whe 'et Peleg huyulhni, 'en ooye' suli'.
'Et Peleg ook'elh'az 'et Eber 430 yus k'ut 'uyoonne dune cha, ts'ekoo cha buzkeh nasdli'.
Peleg tat whunizyat be yus k'ut (30) whe 'et Reu huyulhni 'en ooye' suli'.
Reu whuzdli hukw'elh'az whe 'et Peleg nat whunizyat nat 'ink'ez 'ilho hooloh be yus k'ut (209) whe 'et 'uyoonne dune cha 'ink'ez ts'ekoo cha nawhusdli'.
Reu tat whunizyat 'on 'at nat be yus k'ut (32) whe 'et ooye', Serug huyulhni, 'en ooye' suli'.
Serug whuzdli hukw'elh'az Reu 207 be yus k'ut whe 'et 'uyoonne, dune cha ts'ekoo cha buzkeh nawhusdli'.
Serug tat whunizyat be yus k'ut (32) whe 'et Nahor huyulhni-un, 'en ooye' suli'.
Nahor whuzdli hukw'elh'az Serug 200 be yus k'ut 'et 'uyoonne dune cha ootse'ke cha nawhusdli'.
Nahor nat whunizyat 'on 'at 'ilhohooloh be yus k'ut (29) whe 'et Terah huyulhni-un 'en ooye' suli'.
Terah hukw'elh'az, Nahor 119 be yus k'ut ooye'ke 'ink'ez ootse'ke cha nawhuzdli'.
'Et Terah lhtak'ant'it whunizyat be yus k'ut (75) whe 'et Abram huyulhni-un, Nahor 'ink'ez Haran 'enne buzkeh suli'.
'Et Terah ts'u haindene: 'enne Abram, Nahor 'ink'ez Haran. Haran 'en Lot ooye' suli'.
'Ink'ez Haran 'en dubá yutso dazsai, didutch'oh dukeyoh 'et Chaldeanne bukeyoh 'et.
'Et Abram 'ink'ez Nahor bulh bu'at whuzdli'. Abram oo'at, 'en Sarai huyulhni, 'ink'ez Nahor oo'at, 'en Milcah huyulhni, Haran ootse', Milcah oobá 'ink'ez Iscah oobá.
'Et Sarai 'en oochan danáwhudilts'ut, oobuzkeh hooloh.
'Ink'ez Terah duye' Abraham, duchai Lot te, Haran ooye' 'ink'ez duyas'at, Sarai duye', Abram oo'at cha. Ur, Chaldean bukeyoh, 'et Canaan ts'e whehandil, keyoh Haran highu nindil 'ink'ez 'et huhoot'e'.
'Et whe Terah oodzin 'et 205 be yus k'ut yinka inda', 'ink'ez Terah 'en Haran keyoh ts'uwhutni, 'et dazsai.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) Abram 'ulhni, “Nkeyoh cha whuch'a sinyai', nyunatneke cha whuch'a sinyai', 'ink'ez mbá ooyoh cha teninyai', 'ink'ez yun whununtistun-un hoonli.
Tube didoh-un ncha-un nyutiselh, soo hoonzoon-un nts'un tiszoo' 'ink'ez nyoozi' cha ncha tiselh. 'Ink'ez 'uyoonne ba soo hoonzoo-un bugha hóotalts'ulh 'int'oh nyutiselh.
Mbene la mba soo hoonzoo-un ngha hóotalts'ulh, 'enne cha soo hoonzoo-un bugha hóotalts'ulh, 'ink'ez mbe la nk'ehiyihne cha buk'ehutisyih, ndi yun k'ut dilhts'ine 'enne ts'iyawh nyun ngha soo hoonzoo-un bugha hóotalts'ulh.”
'Et Abram Moodihti (Yahweh) daja la 'et nduja whe tizya Lot 'en yulh tiz'az 'ink'ez Abram 'en lhtak'ant'it whunizyat 'on 'at kwulat be yus k'ut (75) whe 'et njan Haran huwutizya.
'Et Abram du'at yilhchoot 'ink'ez Lot oo'at cha hubilhchoot 'ink'ez ndai la huyut'i-i cha ts'iyawh nahuyalhdzoo 'ink'ez mbe la dune bugha nindene 'enne cha Haran, Canaan ts'e yun k'uz whehandil 'ink'ez Canaan nehunindil.
Abram 'oh whuya keyoh lhusuya 'ink'ez keyoh Shechem huwhutni-un Moreh duchun Terabim huyulhni, 'i nadan'a 'et whuts'un 'ink'ez Canaan whut'enne 'enne nyo yun k'ut hudilhts'i.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) Abram yunalh ts'et hainya 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Mbene la nts'u haindene 'enne ndi yun bugha ítas'alh.” 'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) yunalh ts'et hainya-un 'en yuts'un loodel 'inla.
'Et whuts'un Bethel huwhutni-un dzulh hoonli 'on da' whuz wheinya, 'et nimbali nenin'ai ba noo' 'et. Bethel 'ink'ez 'on da' 'et Ai 'et loodel nenin'ai. Moodiht (Yahweh) ts'un 'ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) yoozi' 'i yuka'dani'.
Abram 'et nyan za Negev lhoyalh.
'Et 'uhooja nyo keyoh dai whuzdli' 'inka Abram Egypt ts'e wheinya tube dai whuzdli' 'et huwa.
'Et 'uhooja 'awet Egypt wheinghoh whe du'at Sarai 'uyulhni, “T'eoonuszun tube ts'eke inzoo' whe 'int'oh.
'Et huwa 'et la 'uhoneh Egypt nenit'az de nyo nilh'en whe 'et la 'uhudooni', ‘Ndun oo'at 'unt'oh,’ 'ink'ez la sozoolhghelh nyun 'aw nyozoolhghelh ait'oh.
'Et soo cho 'udoni' ndun 'en sulhutsin 'unt'oh 'et de la soo 'oost'e' nyun gha. 'Ink'ez la nyulh khoosna'.”
'Et Abram Egypt neninya whe nyoonne Egypt whut'enne ts'eke hitilh'en whe tube ts'ekezoo'.
Lerwe ooye'ke Pharaoh 'enne cha hinilh'en 'ink'ez dubá 'en hidani', “Ndun 'en tube ts'ekezoo',” 'ink'ez nyoon ts'eke 'en Pharaoh ooyoh ts'e huyoolhti.
Abram soo cho ne'huyulh'en nyoon oo'at 'en gha. 'Usbai cha musdoos dune cha donkey huyulhni, dune cha, ts'ekoo 'ink'ez dune cha hinat ne'ut'enne. Donkey ts'ekoo cha 'ink'ez camel huyulhni, 'i higha hininla.
'Et hoontsi Pharaoh tube dada untsi'-i Pharaoh ooyoh cha 'et dinzut whulhtsi Sarai, Abram oo'at, 'en gha.
'Et Pharaoh Abram 'anih yudani', “Daneinla whe ne'inla? 'Et di ha lhunedinelh, ndun ts'eke n'at 'unt'oh?
'Et di ha 'une'dini, ‘Ndun sulht'us 'unt'oh?’ Nedini s'at eni da' 'oschoot oole'. 'Et huwa ndun n'at nailhchoot 'ink'ez nts'e tanyalh ts'e inyalh.”
'Et Pharaoh dudune'ne 'ubulhni 'inka whenahuyalh'a' oo'at cha 'ink'ez ndai ts'iyawh yut'i cha.
'Et Abram Egypt whuch'a huzdil, oo'at cha 'ink'ez Lot cha bubulh tiz'az whe ts'iyawh huyut'i-i tubulh nda' hutizdil.
Abram tube hoonzoo' 'unt'oh, khuna-i cha lhai yut'i 'ink'ez silver ink'ez gold tubulh lhai yut'i.
'Et hutizdil Bethel whuts'un hutizdil ndet da' 'uda' nimbali nenin'ai inle' 'et 'udechoo whuts'un Bethel 'ink'ez Ai whulhetoh whuz hoozdil.
'Udechoo loodel nenin'ai inle' 'et whuts'un 'et whuz hoozdil. 'Et Abram Moodihti (Yahweh) yuts'un tenadidli.
Lot 'en cha Abram bubulh tizya, khuna-i cha, musdoos cha, 'ink'ez nimbali cha, lhai cha ut'i.
Ndi yun 'aw soo lhe'ilcho hik'oh hutinalh huba 'aw lhzih huhoot'e' ait'oh, tube lhai hoonli ts'iyai hut'i k'et.
'Et Abram bughunai' ghunline 'ink'ez Lot bughunai' ghunline 'enne 'aw 'ulhuholdzin ait'oh. 'Oh da' ndunne Canaan whut'enne 'ink'ez Periz whut'enne, 'enne cha njan yun k'ut huwhut'i.
'Et Abram, Lot yulhni, “'Aw hoonli huwun nyun 'ink'ez si bulh lhdulhyoh 'udotni' ait'oh. 'Ink'ez si skhunai-i ghunline, 'ink'ez nyun nghunai-i ghunline, lhulh dulhyoh hudotni ait'oh. Lhulhlhutsinke ts'inli 'et huwa.
Nyoo yun lhe'ulcho-i nilh'en. Sch'a sinyai' 'intl'us ts'e whuz inyalh 'ink'ez si cha nailhni' ts'e toosya', k'us nyun nailhni' ts'e inyalh 'ink'ez si 'intl'us ts'e si toosya'.”
'Et Lot whunilh'en Jordon keyoh duchun hooloh-un ts'iyawh yunilh'en. Too cha lhai whe' hoont'oh, (Moodihti (Yahweh) Sodom 'ink'ez Gomorrah bulh gak whutilhtselh whuts'o), Moodihti (Yahweh) hanuyeh k'et 'et nduhoont'oh inle', Egypt dahoont'oh la Zoar ts'u wheti ts'e, 'et nduhoont'oh.
'Et Lot nyo yun k'ut Jordan whunat ts'iyawh 'et 'utahaoodit'ai, 'ink'ez nda' wheinya 'et 'ink'ez 'et lhch'a hust'az.
Abram 'en Canaan keyoh 'et nenina 'ink'ez Lot 'en keyoh whuti duchun hooloh-un 'ink'ez 'et nimbali nenin'ai Sodom whuts'un.
'Et hoonts'i nyoonne Sodom dunene tubeh hintsi', 'ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) ch'az lubeshi 'uhulh'en.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en Abram 'uyulhni Lot bulh lhch'a hust'az hukw'elh'az whe, “Whunilh'en ndet sinyin 'et whuts'un whunilh'en, no cha, nyan cha, nda' cha, 'ink'ez noo' cha.
Ndai la yun nilh'en-i 'ilhiz wheni ts'iyawh nts'u haindene tubulh 'i nohgha nus'ai.
'Ink'ez nts'u hahande 'enne yun k'ut lhez k'un'a butiselh. 'Et whe dune yun k'ut lhez hodutilhto de, 'et si nts'u haindene 'enne cha si bulh olto.
Dudinyaih 'ink'ez yun k'inyaih inyalh, dawhulhyiz la 'ink'ez dawhulhtel la ndi yun 'i ngha tis'alh 'et huwa.”
'Et Abram dunimbali nanayan'ai 'ink'ez ndun Mamre ooduchun, Terabinth huyulhni, 'et nenina. Keyoh Hebron 'uhoont'oh 'ink'ez 'et loodel 'inla Yak'usda ts'un.
'Et 'uhooja Amraphel huyulhni, yun k'ut Shinar whulerwe Arioch, keyoh Ellasar whulerwe, Chedorlaomer, yun k'ut Elam whulerwe 'ink'ez Tidal Goiim whut'enne whulerwe.
Bera huyulhni, Sodom whulerwe, Birsha huyulhni Gomorrah whulerwe, Shinab Admah whulerwe, Shemeber Zeboiim whulerwe, 'ink'ez Bela whulerwe, 'enne bubulh lhuwhehunigan.
Ndunne ts'iyawh lhts'u nehudindil 'ink'ez Siddim wheguz ('et 'uhoont'oh, lisel yatoo').
Whunizyat 'on 'at nat yus k'ut (12) 'et ndun Chedorlaomer huyulhni 'en ba' hit'en 'ink'ez whulh whinizyat 'on 'at tat yus k'ut (13) 'et hich'az nedindil.
Whulh whunizyat 'on 'at dunghi be yus k'ut (14) whe Chedorlaomer 'ink'ez nyoonne lerwe yulh 'ut'enne, 'enne hubulh whelhonigan, nyoonne Reph whut'enne, keyoh Ashteroth-Karnaim hudilhts'i, 'ink'ez nyoonne Zuz whut'enne, ndunne keyoh Ham hudilhts'i, 'ink'ez nyoonne Em whut'enne, 'enne keyoh Shaveh Kiriathaim hudilhts'i,
'ink'ez ndunne Hor whut'enne, 'enne dudzulh k'ut dzulh Seir 'et El Paran whuts'un 'uhoolhdzoh, chunt'oh 'uhoont'oh whenghoh 'et whuts'un.
'Et lht'anahunisdil 'ink'ez keyoh En-mishpat (Kadesh 'uhoont'oh) whuz hutizdil Amalek whut'enne bukeyoh 'ink'ez Amor whut'enne bukeyoh 'enne Hazazon-tamar huwhut'en, 'enne bubulh whelhonigan.
'Ink'ez Sodom whulerwe, Gomorrah whulerwe, Admah whulerwe 'ink'ez Zeboi whulerwe 'ink'ez Bela whulerwe, Zoar huwhutni 'enne ts'iyawh lhts'u nehudindil 'ink'ez Sidom dzulh eguz whuz'ai-un 'et whelhonigan.
'Et Chedorlaomer, Elam whulerwe, Tidal, 'udun keyoh whut'enne bulerwe, Amraphel, Shinar whulerwe, 'ink'ez Arioch, Ellasar whulerwe, dine lerwe 'enne kwulane lerwe buch'az nehudindil.
'Et njan Sidom dzulh eguz whuz'ai-un, asphalt huyulhni, lhai 'oh dunt'i 'ink'ez Sodom whulerwe 'ink'ez Gomorrah whulerwe bulh whe tse halhdil. Whulohne 'et yahadla, 'et mbene la lhch'u tizkatne 'enne ndo dzulh tuz whe tse halhdil.
'Et ndunne dine lerwene, 'enne Sodom 'ink'ez Gomorrah keyoh whuch'e' ts'iyawh huyilhchoot, ndai la hik'uhuna-i cha 'ink'ez whenahidil.
Lot 'en cha huyilhchoot, Abram bulhutsin ooye' 'unt'oh. Sodom 'et whut'i, ndai la yut'i-i cha 'ink'ez ts'iyawh hiyulh whenadil.
'Et 'ilhoghun nintanalgai-un whe Abram, Hebrew whut'en-un, ghu ninya 'ink'ez yulhni. Abram 'en njan duchun, oak hiyulhni, 'et whut'i. Ndi duchun 'i ndun Amor whut'en, Mamre 'int'oh, 'en ye 'unt'oh-i 'unt'oh. Boono Eshcol 'ink'ez boono Aner 'en, Abram hits'u dutni 'uhint'oh.
'Et Abram bulhutsin Lot huyulhna huyulhni whe dudune'ne 318 'enne hodil'e'ne yuba 'ut'enne, Abram hiyoh whuzdline, 'enne buba untizyoot keyoh Dan whuts'un.
'Enne ts'iyawh lhk'ebanla 'ink'ez 'ulhdzis whe yuba 'ut'enne tubulh ndunne bubulh whelhonigan Hobah whuts'un whenabonanyoot Damascus whano 'et 'uhoont'oh.
'Et ndai la huyilhchoot-i cha 'ink'ez bulhutsin Lot cha, highu huyilhchoot-i cha, ts'ekoo cha 'ink'ez dunene ts'iyawh nabuhilhchoot.
'Et Sodom whulerwe, Shaveh wheguz 'et, 'en Abram yududizya (Lerwe wheguz whuz'ai huwhutni), Chedorlaomer hich'a' nilhde hukw'elh'az 'ink'ez lerwe hiyulh 'ut'enne tubulh.
'Et Melchizedek Salem whulerwe, ut'alh-i cha 'ink'ez ts'ekoo too' cha 'i bubut neininla, 'en Yak'usda 'uk'enus dizti'-un (El Elyon) 'en oolubret 'unt'oh.
Soo hoonzoo-un ubulh yalhduk whe 'utni “Yak'usda 'uk'enus dizti'-un (El Elyon) yak'uz 'ink'ez ndi yun k'ut cha ooch'e' hoonli-un 'en gha Abram soo hoonzoo-un oogha hootalts'ulh.
Yak'usda 'uk'enus dizti'-un (El Elyon) 'en soo hoonzoo-un 'unt'oh, nch'az ditnine nla k'ebanla.” 'Ink'ez 1/10th yut'i ts'iyawh yugha ininla.
'Et Sodom whulerwe Abram yulhni, “Dune 'enne sgha buninle 'ink'ez ndai la hoonli-i, 'i nyunch'oh ilhchoot.”.
'Et hoonts'i Abram Sodom whulerwe yulhni, “Ndi sla 'unt'oh usla Moodihti (Yahweh) Yak'usda 'uk'enus yoodo 'unt'oh (El Elyon) 'en oots'un duduzni, 'en yak'uz cha ndi yun k'ut cha ooch'e' hoonli.
Aw hoonli lhituzaschulh 'ughabats'e' ntsool-i yaz k'us kenatl'oolh hoonts'i ndai la nch'e' 'aw hoschoot ait'oh, doo ka la 'udoni' ‘Abram hoonzoo' 'unt'oh susi doni' la,’.
Ndai la chilke hiyan'al-i 'ink'ez dune sulh tizdilne Aner, Eshcol 'ink'ez Mamre 'enne ooch'e' huyolhchoot dulhni.”
'Et nduhooja hukw'elh'az Moodihti (Yahweh) ooghuni Abram hon'en whe nduyulhni, “Abram, wheniljut ilhoh. Nyun mba kelatun usli, soo 'uk'enus mba k'elha whutale'-un.
'Et hoonts'i Abram 'utni, “Moodihti Yak'usda (Adonai Yahweh) di sgha tan'alh? 'Aw suzkeh cha hooloh mbe la sk'edutiyalh 'en Eliezer Damascus whut'en-un eh 'unt'oh?”
'Et Abram 'utni, “Whunilh'en 'aw suzkeh sghalhinlel. Mbe la syoh whuzdli-un 'en sk'edutiyalh-un tileh.”
'Et whunilh'en, Moodihti (Yahweh) ooghuni weidilts'ut 'utni, “Ndun 'aw nk'elhdutisyal whe 'unt'oh nyunch'oh nyust'e ts'u hainzut-un 'en nk'edutiyalh.”
'Et n'az teinilhti 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Ndo yak'uz ts'e whunilh'en sum hoolhto hukwa soo tila holhto.” 'Ink'ez 'et 'uyulhni, “Mbene la nts'u haindene 'et 'uhutiltsuk.”
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) yuba 'alha 'udija, 'ink'ez ‘Ts'ih'un dune unli,’ 'uyulhni.
'Et 'uyulhni, “Si, Moodihti (Yahweh) 'ust'oh. Ndunne Chaldea whut'en, 'et buyun k'ut Ur, 'et whuch'a njan yun k'ut nch'e' whutileh ha.”
'Et 'uyulhni, “SMoodihti Yak'usda (Adonai Yahweh), nts'en'a t'ewhuntazin stl'awhutikulh 'et?”
'Et nduyulhni, “Tat be yus k'ut-i musdoos ts'ekeyaz cha, tat be yus k'ut-i ts'eke 'usbai cha, 'ink'ez tat be yus k'ut-i dúbe cha, dut'ai 'imbin cha, turtle dove huyulhni, 'ink'ez dut'aiyaz cha, pigeon huyulhni, 'i ndiz sts'inlelh.”
'Et ndokhi ts'iyawh yughi ninla, ts'iyawh lhk'eyant'az lhzih neininla, 'et nyoo dut'ai 'i 'aw yut'alhanal.
'Et whe dut'ai cho, vulture huyúlhni, 'i ndi khuna-i huyanghan, 'i yuk'endil whe Abram whenabunanyoot.
'Et hulhgha sa nain'ai whe soo bulh cho 'i Abram ookw'eidilts'ut 'ink'ez whunulh'en soo wheioonujut-un 'ink'ez tsaholhgus-un 'et ookw'eoodilts'ut.
'Et whe Yak'usda (Elohim) Abram 'uyulhni, “Soo soo cho t'eoononzeh, nts'u hainde 'en 'uyoo yun k'ut 'et 'aw t'elhonizun 'ink'ez 'aw hube' hoolhdzun chaíloh. 'Et ndunne yun k'ut whut'en, 'en dzoh ne'bulh'en 'ink'ez bunat ne'hoot'en whe 400 nawhudizut whuts'un buba' hutit'elh.
'Et mbene la buba' hit'enne hukw'elh'az buba nahutisyeh soo lhai hut'i whe whusahutidulh.
'Et hoonts'i, nyun mbákene soo ts'ih'un mba oodizghel le'hoont'oh 'et buts'un tanyalh. Soo yoo'un inzulh whe 'et 'anyotilhtelh.
'Et whulh dit dune nawhusdli-un, 'et ndiz nahutidulh. Amor whut'enne tank'us un'a 'uhut'en-un 'awhuz lhalhodusne.”
'Et 'uhooja, hulhgha sa yo whein'ai whe tsaholhgus whuzdli'. Whunulh'en lhes utes-un lhut oots'a hadan'a 'ink'ez dalt'ai bulh 'i ndi khuna-i lhts'elt'az-i beguz lhuyuzkat.
'Et dzin za Moodihti (Yahweh) Abram ts'un khuni ooba lhaidinla whe njan ndutni, “Nts'u haindene 'enne ndi yun bugha óonus'ai, Egypt whedinli ts'un 'ink'ez ndi 'uk'oh whucho, 'et Euphrates 'uk'oh whucho 'et.
Ken whut'enne cha, Kenez whut'enne cha, 'ink'ez Kadmon whut'enne cha.
Hitt whut'enne cha, Periz whut'enne cha 'ink'ez Reph whut'enne cha.
Amor whut'enne cha, Canaan whut'enne cha, Girgash whut'enne cha 'ink'ez Jebus whut'enne, 'enne cha.”
'Et Sarai, Abram oo'at 'aw buzkeh holoh inle', Egypt whut'en ts'eke yunatne'ut'en-un Hagar huyulhni 'en yut'i.
'Et Sarai Abram 'uyulhni, “Whunilh'en Moodihti (Yahweh) 'aw suzkeh hooloh sulhtsi, ndun sba ne'ut'en-un 'en 'inleh 'ink'ez 'et de tila ts'oodunne oost'e'.” 'Et Abram, Sarai yuk'un'a 'uja.
'Et Sarai, Abram oo'at yuba ne'ut'en-un Hagar ilhchoot, Egypt whut'en-un unli 'ink'ez duki yugha inilhti, yu'at oole' ha. 'Et Abram whunizyat yus k'ut (10) 'et nyo Canaan keyoh inda'.
'Et Hagar t'einanzin 'ink'ez ulchan. 'Et ulchan t'eoonanzin, nyoon ts'eke yuba 'ut'en-un ooba yintsi' suli'.
'Et Sarai, Abram 'uyulhni, “Whe ninta' nust'en-un nk'eholts'it! Ndun ts'eke ngha nusti 'ink'ez ulchan t'eoonanzin whe, oosts'u dutni suli'. Moodihti (Yahweh) nyun, si bulh neba nahutiyeh.”
'Et Abram, Sarai 'uyulhni, “A, 'alha nyun mba 'ut'en-un nyun nlak'et 'uhoont'oh, nts'en'a hukwa' ninzun-un k'un'a 'inleh.” 'Ink'ez Sarai yuba 'ut'en-un tubeh dzoh nayulhdzut, 'ink'ez Hagar yughu wheitselhya.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) oolizas nyo too naindli-un, chuntoh 'et whuzih, 'et nayilhti, nyo too naindli-un whuzih, Shur ts'u wheti-un.
'Ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Hagar, Sarai ba 'ut'en-un, nts'ez de hainya 'ink'ez nts'e tinya whe 'int'en?” 'Et 'utni, “Sarai smoodih ooba 'ust'en-un ooch'a ts'e tisya whe ust'en.”
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) oolizas 'uyulhni, “Ooba 'int'en-un oots'un naindalh 'ink'ez nts'e hukwa' ninzun-un k'un'a ne'nyoolh'en si.”
'Et Yak'usda (Yahweh) oolizas 'uyulhni, “Nts'u haindene lhane ngha tislelh. Huldlai k'et 'aw boots'olhto ait'oh tileh.”
'Ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) oolizas, cha yulhni, “Whunilh'en 'awet ts'oodun bulh 'int'oh suli'. Dune nyaz tileh 'ink'ez boozi' Ishmael dutanelh. Njan tene'nilhdzun Moodihti (Yahweh) nyudants'o.
Tube dune nzoodil'i-un tileh, ts'iyanne dune buch'az ditni tileh 'ink'ez ts'iyanne dune hich'az ditni tileh, 'ink'ez dulhutsinke butoh 'et dune tileh.”
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) yuts'u huyih whe 'en dulh yailhduk, “Nyun 'int'oh, ndun Yak'usda-Ndun-Sunilh'en (El Roi)” 'Ink'ez 'utni, “Mbe la si'en-un, si cha tila 'us'en eh?”
'Et huwa njan too diz'ai-un 'et 'uwhuhutni Beer-La-Hai-Roi. Whunulh'en Kadesh 'ink'ez Bered bulh whetoh 'uhoont'oh.
'Et Hagar duneyaz 'en Abram yughu sulhtsi 'ink'ez Abram duye' yoozi Ishmael yulhni.
'Et 'oh whuya whudizulh Abram 'en lhk'udit whunizyat 'on 'at lhk'utat be yus k'ut (86) whe Ishmael yughu yulhtsi.
'Et Abram 'en 99 nawhudizut whe, Moodihti (Yahweh) yunalhts'et hainya 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Yak'usda 'Uk'enus 'Ultus-un (El Shaddai) ust'oh, stso inyalh 'ink'ez 'aw hoonli nk'elhuholhts'it.
'Ink'ez sghuni nyun, si bulh lhadutalneh 'ink'ez 'onus lhane cha tihleh.”
'Et Abram yubut nachanitno 'ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en yulh yalhduk, njan 'uyulhni,
“'Et si whunilh'en, khuni nts'un lhadasla-i 'udun keyoh whut'enne dune lhane 'enne bubá tanleh.
'Aw 'on 'un Abram lhunyodutasnelh, nyoozi' Abraham nyo dutanelh, lhelhts'un whut'enne didoh lhane 'enne bubá nyuzusi 'et huwa.
Soo ts'ih'un lhane nts'u hakedande nyutiselh, lhelhdoh didohne dune nyutiselh, lerwene 'enne hoonts'i nts'u hahande tileh.
'Ink'ez khuni nyun bulh lhadilya-i, 'i 'et duta'alh nts'u haindene 'enne lhan'un te, ilhiz wheni ndi khuni lhadutalneh, Nyak'usda (Elohim) tisleh 'ink'ez nts'u haindene cha.
'Ink'ez cha nyun cha 'ink'ez nts'u haindene nk'elh'az, ndi yun nohgha nus'ai, 'awhuz 'et t'enyuzinzun, Canaan yun ts'iyawh nohch'e' oole' 'ilhiz wheni, 'ink'ez buYak'usda tisleh.”
'Ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) Abraham 'uyulhni, “Nyun ndi khuni nts'un lhadasla-i ootahtun, nts'u haindene tubulh lhan'un te ndi khuni ootahtun.
Ndi 'i khuni nts'un lhadasla-i, 'i ootahtun, nyun 'ink'ez si bulh 'ink'ez nts'u haindene nk'elh'azne. Dune ts'oodunne whuzdline nohtoh 'enne ts'iyawh hika dune unli-un hubuhootat'us.
Nyun ch'oh cha ooka dune inli-i nyo tit'us, 'et huwa t'entihdzeh ndi khuni lhadilya-i nyun, si bulh.
Mbe la lhk'udidzin be yus k'ut suli'-un, 'en cha hitit'us. Duneyaz 'andit whuzdline nyoh whuzdline, k'us sooniya be dune t'enuzuhzun ts'un ohket-un ts'oodun nts'u hainde lhilohne, 'en cha.
Mbe la nyoh whuzdline 'ink'ez mbe la sooniya be ohketne, ts'iyawh ka dune unli-un hubotit'us, ndi sghuni nts'un lhadusla-i nus whe lhk'elh'az te 'et ndi 'i gha 'ilhiz wheni be hoodutaht'en.
'Ink'ez dune ts'oodun 'aw lhuhuyit'us-un 'en 'udun nehuyolhtelh ndi khuni nts'un lhadasla-i k'eininyuz 'et huwa.”
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) Abraham 'uyulhni, “N'at Sarai dini-un 'et 'etsul 'udonih 'ink'ez Sarah 'i boozi' tileh.
'Ink'ez soo hoonzoo-un ooba whutiselh 'ink'ez duneyaz 'en mba nyaz tileh. 'Ink'ez 'en soo hoonzoo-un ooba whutiselh 'ink'ez ndoh hidoh 'enne buloo tileh, 'ink'ez lerwene cha hits'u hatidoh.”
'Et Abraham yubut nachanitno 'ink'ez udloh 'ink'ez dudzi yo ts'e 'utni, “Dune 100 be yus k'ut soo toleh ooye' whutaleh? 'Ink'ez Sarah 'en cha 90 be yus k'ut soo tilah ooyaz hole'?”
'Ink'ez Abraham Yakusda 'uyulhni, “Ishmael soo nyun ba khuna oole?”
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'utni, “'Awundooh Sarah n'at nye' nghu tilhtsi 'ink'ez Isaac dutanelh. Sghuni lhadusla-i 'ilhiz wheni 'en cha oots'un lhadutisleh, mbene la oots'u haindene hukw'elh'az 'enne cha.
'Ink'ez Ishmael 'en ghun nyudasts'o. Whunilh'en soo hoonzoo-un oogha whults'ut, 'ink'ez lhane oots'u hainde tileh. Whunizyane 'on 'at nane lerwe ye'ke oots'u hatidoh 'ink'ez 'en didoh-un ncha tíselh.
'Et hoonts'i ndi sghuni Isaac ts'un lhadutisleh. Sarah ndo whuya whudizulh nat de, 'et nye' tileh.”
'Et yulh yalhduk-un 'etsul 'udija 'ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) ndo whenaja.
'Et Abraham duye' Ishmael yilhchoot 'ink'ez mbene la yuyoh whuzdline 'ink'ez mbene la sooniya k'elha bubonketne, dune ts'iyawh Abrahm ooyoh dilhts'ine 'et dzin za yuka dune unli-un hubuhuzt'us Yak'usda (Elohim) yulhni hukw'un'a.
Abraham 'et 99 be yus k'ut whe yuka dune unli-un huyuzt'us.
'Et ooye' Ishmael whunizyat 'on 'at tat be yus k'ut whe ooka dune unli-un huyuzt'us.
'Et dzin za Abraham ooye' Ishmael 'en bulh hika dune unline hubuhuzt'us.
'Ink'ez mbene la ooyoh dune 'et whut'ine, 'ink'ez sooniya be bubonketne, 'enne cha hika dune unli-un ts'iyawh hubuhuzt'us.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en Abraham yunalh hainya, njan ndun Mamre, duchun tah terebinth, oak huyulhni, whu'iz whunilghaz whe nimbali dati 'et usda.
Ndo yutan'en 'ink'ez yutilh'en, tane dune yuzih nudilhya whe butilh'en. Nimbali dati ts'e dudilgai 'ink'ez bududilhgai 'ink'ez soo yun ts'e bubut nachaniti.
'Ink'ez 'utni, “SMoodih (Adonai) tube sba uszoo whe la 'usinla, 'andit khun te mba 'ut'en-un senghonya' junih.
Sla'ineh whe tooyaz ntsool-iyaz whusaooskalh 'ink'ez sih nohke be tunaoohgus, 'ink'ez nyo duchun sa whus'ih 'et sih naoolhyis.
'Ink'ez 'et ut'alh-iyaz nohba haóoslelh, 'et sih nohyust'e naóolhyis. 'Et hukw'elh'az sih 'oya lhohdilh. Nts'en'a nohba 'ut'en-un ts'un hahya 'et.” 'Et 'uhuyulhni, “Daja datanelh-un, 'et dineh.”
'Et Abraham nimbali t'ah ts'e Sarah yughulgai 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Soo 'a tawh 'ultsuk-i lhes, 'i lhadinleh 'ink'ez nilhtlus 'ink'ez ilht'es.”
'Et Abraham khuna-i yughulgai 'ink'ez musdoosyaz soo unzoo-i yilhchoot 'ink'ez chilhyaz 'en yutl'ayalhti 'ink'ez soo 'ahoh lhaidutileh ha yilhchoot.
'Et butter cha 'ink'ez lilet cha 'ink'ez musdoosyaz lhadutja-i, 'i bubut neininla 'ink'ez buzih usyin whe nahuyit'al.
'Et 'uyulhni, “N'at Sarah nts'e 'ut'en?” 'Ink'ez 'utni, “Nyo nimbali t'ah usda.”
'Ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Soo 'alha-i be ndo whuya whudizulh-un 'ink'ez 'et Sarah n'at dune ooyaz tileh.” 'Ink'ez Sarah nimbali dati usyin 'ink'ez yoozilhts'ai.
'Andit 'et Abraham 'ink'ez Sarah 'en tube hoonyan huzdli'. Yoo'un hizulh 'ink'ez Sarah en buzkeh whutaleh 'et tube 'on 'un hainzut.
'Et huwa Sarah duyo ts'e udloh 'ink'ez 'utni, “Nisjan hukw'elh'az 'ink'ez smoodih cha nisjan, 'et de sba hoonzoo whutaleh?”
'Ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) Abraham 'uyulhni, “Di ha 'utni Sarah udloh, 'ink'ez 'utni, 'alha eh syaz whutaleh tube nisjan hoonts'i?’
'Aw hoonli hoonts'i eh Moodihti (Yahweh) 'aw ooba hoolhtus eh? Ndet la 'et newhudizut-un 'et la nohghu naoosja' 'ink'ez Sarah dune ooyaz tileh.”
'Et Sarah 'awundooh ni, “'Aw lhuzusdloh,” whenuljut. 'Ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) 'uyulhni, “'Awundooh, indloh inle'!”
'Et dune dunahudidil 'ink'ez Sodom keyoh ts'e whuz hunilh'en, 'ink'ez Abraham 'on 'un bubulh nunatit'us ha bubulh tiz'az.
'Ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) 'utni, “Abraham ooch'a whuntis'ih eh datisnelh-un?
Alha Abraham 'en didoh-un ncha 'ink'ez tube ulhtus tileh. 'Ink'ez 'en gha ts'iyawh didohne 'enne soo hoonzoo-un bugha hóotalts'ulh.
T'eniszin duduzkeh buk'unuhilhye', yoh whut'ine cha buk'elh'az Moodihti (Yahweh) ookw'un'a huhoontun za' hint'oh ts'ih'un ne'hut'en, 'et de la Moodihti (Yahweh) Abraham daja yulhni-un 'et yugha whutalelh.”
'Ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) 'utni, “Sodom 'ink'ez Gomorrah bulh tube huwu yaduk hooni, hiye tank'us-i tube ntsi'.
Whuz buts'un tisyalh 'andit 'ink'ez whuntis'elh daja hutni la sdabe cha hintsi'. 'Alha tila 'uhutni khuni sghu dinkat, 'et 'awundooh de la, 'et t'eoonooszeh.”
'Et nyoonne dune lht'anahunist'az 'ink'ez Sodom ts'e hutiz'az, 'et Abraham 'awhuz Moodihti (Yahweh) yubut usyin.
'Ink'ez Abraham yenghun neninya 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “'Et whe eh ndunne ts'ih'un dune hinli 'ink'ez lubeshi 'uhulh'en bulh ts'iyawh gak butilhtselh?
Khun te kwulat whunizyane (50) dune, 'enne ts'ih'un dune hinli njan keyoh whutoh 'et. 'Et cha eh ts'iyawh gak butalhtselh 'ink'ez buyun k'ut 'et cha eh gak whutalhtselh? Kwulat whunizyane 'et hudilhts'i hoonts'i?
Tube 'aw ndoneh ait'oh dune nzoone 'ink'ez ntsi'ne tubulh gak butalhtselh huba, ts'iyawh lhgha 'uhoot'e'! 'Aw ndi yun k'ut huwun nahiyilh-un, 'en ts'iyawh iloh lakw ts'ih'un un'a 'uhutit'elh?”
'Et whe Moodihti (Yahweh) 'utni, “Sodom kwulat whunizyane ts'ih'un 'unt'ohne keyoh hoonli de, 'et de 'aw dalhubutuzislel.”
'Et Abraham 'uyulhni, “Si 'ants'i yun lhez usli whe 'ust'oh, 'et hoonts'i Moodihti (Adonai) bulh yatisduk.
'Et te kwulai' hukw'elh'ih whe whunizyane 'on 'at kwulane (50) ts'ih'un dune hooni te, 'et whe eh ts'ayawh gak whutalhts'elh ts'uwhut'i whucho 'et?” 'Et 'utni, “Dit whunizyai 'on 'at kwulane (45) nabinla te, 'aw ts'iyawh huboolhts'elh ait'oh.”
'Et doo cha za yulh yatilhduk 'ink'ez 'utni, “Dit whunizyane nabinla de?” 'Et 'utni, “'Enne bugha daboosleh ait'oh.”
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Moodihti (Adonai) khun te hunolch'eh junih, 'ink'ez yatisduk. Tat whunizyane 'enne ts'ih'un 'unt'ohne nainlane, 'et do'?” 'Et 'uyulhni, “'Et de 'aw gak lhubutuzissel tat whunizyane 'enne bugha.”
'Et 'uyulhni, “'Ants'i sich'oh khanaoonust'ai whe 'udusni, Moodihti (Adonai) bulh yasduk, nat whunizyane 'enne nabinlane ts'ih'un 'unt'ohne?” 'Et 'utni, “'Et 'aw gak hubooselh ait'oh ndunne nat whunizyane 'enne bugha.”
'Et 'utni, “Khun te Moodihti (Adonai) hunolch'eh junih 'ink'ez doo cha za yatisduk. Whunizyane nainla de 'et do'?” 'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) 'utni, “Whunizyane nasla de, 'enne bugha 'aw dalhubutuzislel.”
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) Abraham yalhduk-un 'etsul 'udija whe 'et 'awet yughu whenaja 'ink'ez Abraham dunimbali bez whenaja.
'Et hulhgha nyoonne lizas nane Sodom ts'e hooz'az. Lot Sodom dati-un 'et usda, Lot hubutilh'en dudinya 'ink'ez bubut nachaniti.
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Njan whunulh'en smoodihne nohba 'ut'en-un ooyoh ts'e uh'us 'ink'ez 'ulhdzis 'et oohtez sih 'ink'ez nohke tunaoohgus 'ink'ez bundada' 'uda' cho duduh'az 'ink'ez sih tooh'as.” 'Et 'uhuyulhni, “'Awundooh 'et hoonts'i 'andit 'ulhdzis 'et 'az uztitez.”
'Et tube cho 'ubulhni, 'et huwa hiyoh highu danin'az 'ink'ez hiyu'alh-i bugha nin'ai ut'alh-i bulh yuntuldoh-i yit 'ink'ez 'i cha buba' yinla 'ink'ez 'uhan'al.
'Et yun nehutilgwulh whuts'o nyo keyoh whudune'ne ts'iyawh dunetine cha 'ink'ez chilke cha ts'iyawh nyo yoh whunahusguz.
'Ink'ez Lot hits'uhuyih 'ink'ez 'uhuyulhni, “Nyoonne dune 'andit nghu danin'azne nts'e 'uhint'oh ndiz t'ebunilhtih 'et 'ink'ez sih t'ebuznoozeh.”
'Et Lot dati buts'u teninya yoh dana'dintan.
'Ink'ez 'utni, “'Awundooh sulhtsinke, tube hoontsi' 'et dohneh junih!
Whunulh'en 'andit nane stse'ke 'aw dune t'enuszunne ust'i, 'enne nohghu tebostelh 'ink'ez nts'e hukwa' nuhzun k'un'a ne'boolh'en sih. 'Ants'i ndunne dune 'enne buts'ahalhuzoh'ai, njan 'et huwa 'andit syoh dahunin'az whe' hint'oh.”
'Et 'uhutni, “'Udun sinyin!” 'Et 'uhutni, “Ndun 'andit 'ants'iya whusainya 'ink'ez 'ants'i nahiyilh-un le' 'utni sih! Nyun 'onus nts'itilelh k'at ndune dune lhabuzdinla de!” 'Ink'ez Lot tube cho n'un hinilht'i 'ankw'us dati dahidanyuz.
'Et hoonts'i nyoonne dune nane 'az tehudilne 'ink'ez Lot danahinilhtsus 'ink'ez dana'hudintan.
'Ink'ez nyoonne 'az dati higha nane ts'iyawh huhoos̱'en hubuhulhtsi nchane 'ink'ez ntsoolne tubulh, nyoo dati nahuyotan ait'oh k'et nehunintsai.
'Ink'ez nyoonne dune Lot 'uhuyulhni, 'Aw eh 'uyoonne cha njan hooloh? Nghundan, nye'ke, ntse'ke 'ink'ez mbe njan keyoh dilhts'i ts'iyawh whusabinle!”
Sdabe cha 'uwhudija njan keyoh hoontsi' huwuyaduk, 'et huwa njan gak ts'otilhtselh. Moodihti (Yahweh) whunilh'en whe, 'en Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en ndiz netilh'a' njan gak ts'otilhtselh ha.”
'Et Lot teninya 'ink'ez dughundankene ootse'ke ghu dilhts'ine, 'ink'ez 'ubulhni, “Duduhdilh, njan whuch'asuhdilh! Moodihti (Yahweh) njan keyoh gak whutilhtselh!” 'Et ooghundankene 'enne buba 'ants'i la 'utni huninzun.
Bundada' yulhkai whe nyoonne lizasne Lot huyulhni, “Soo 'a! Dudinyaih 'ink'ez n'at cha, ntse' nane cha, njan nzih 'unt'ohne, doo ka sih njan nohbulh whudok'un 'ink'ez dzoh notizut!”
'Et sa' ne'ut'en 'et nyoonne dune hila ilhchoot, oo'at cha hila ilhchoot, 'ink'ez ootse'ke nane 'enne cha bula ilhchoot, Moodihti (Yahweh) bugha te'ninzun whe, 'ink'ez teboninla keyoh yoo'az ts'e.
'Et 'uhooja ts'iyawh teboninla hiyulhni, “Soo 'a tulhghas 'ududoolhyih sih! Khun te k'oh naitoht'en junih, k'us njan 'et te dolhts'i' junih, dzulh k'uz ts'e uhdulh doo ka sih gak oohle'!”
'Et Lot 'ubulhni, “Sla'uhneh whe, 'awundooh smoodihne!
'Andit nohba 'ut'en-un nohba unzoo be te'nuhzun-i be 'onus whusunilhtan be khusna-i ba sulhyi', 'et hoonts'i 'aw ndo dzulh k'uz toosya' ait'oh doo ka si hoontsi' sulh 'uhoneh 'ink'ez la daoosah.
'Andit whunulh'en njan keyoh whuyaz 'et nilhdukw whe' hoont'oh, whuz toosya', 'et de la szul khoona'.”
'Ink'ez 'et 'uyulhni, “Whunilh'en tube nla 'usja whe' hoont'oh nja keyoh whuyaz 'aw gak hooselh ait'oh huwu yailhduk-un.
Soo 'a 'ududilyih! 'Aw hoonli 'oosneh ait'oh ndet la keyoh ninya whuts'un.” 'Et huwa nyo keyoh Zoar huwhutni.
'Awet sa hain'ai 'et Lot Zoar ts'e oozya.
''Et Moodihti (Yahweh) tse dunizk'un-i 'ink'ez kwun tubulh 'i Sodom 'ink'ez Gomorrah bulh nayalhtan ndo yak'uz whuts'un, Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en 'uhoonla.
'Et whuz un'a nyo keyoh gak whulhtsi, whunat cha 'et whut'ine cha, yun hanuyeh-i cha.
'Et hoonts'i Lot oo'at k'oh whunalh'en whe lisel tse nain'a-i suli'.
'Ink'ez Abraham bundada' 'uda' 'et nyo whutsoda' Moodihti (Yahweh) yubut inyin-un, whuz oozya.
'Ink'ez Sodom 'ink'ez Gomorrah whulh yun tubulh nyo whulut yun cha oolut 'ants'i dizk'un-i cho le'hoont'oh whe ndo whein'a.
'Et 'uhooja Yak'usda (Elohim) nyo keyoh gak whulhtsi hukw'elh'az 'et Yak'usda (Elohim) Abraham nalnih 'ink'ez Lot nyo hoot'e'-un keyoh gak whulhtsi 'uch'anayulh'a 'ink'ez 'uts'un whe yalh'a'.
'Et Lot Zoar whuch'a nasja 'ink'ez dzulh toh ts'e nenina, ootse'ke nane cha huyulh 'ut'en. Zoar whutit'elh-un whenuljut, 'ink'ez dutse' bulh nyo tse 'an 'et huwhuti.
'Et 'udetso whuzdli-un 'en dulhtus 'uyulhni, “Ndun nebá tube duneti unli 'ink'ez 'aw ndi yun k'ut dune hooloh suli' bubulh 'uts'oot'en-un hooloh, ndi yun huk'une'whuten.
'Anih nebá ts'ekoo too' buts'oolhnai' 'ink'ez sih oozih ts'ootez, 'et de la nets'u haindene hoole'.”
'Et 'ulhdzis dubá ts'ekoo too' higha nilhdzo 'ink'ez 'udetso whuzdli-un 'en dubá yuchant'elget 'aw t'eoonuszun ndet yuchant'elget, 'ink'ez dunadija-un cha t'eoonuszun.
Et 'uhooja 'om bun 'udetso 'udek'oh 'uyulhni, “'Alha sbá 'ulhdzis da' oobulh huste' inle'. Hulhgha doo cha za ts'ekoo too' buts'oolhnai' 'ink'ez nyun bulh hont'e. 'Et de la nets'u haindene hoole'.”
'Et 'ulhdzis dubá doo cha za ts'ekoo too' higha nilhdzo 'ink'ez 'udek'oh-un 'en dubá yuchant'inte', 'aw t'eoonuszun ndet yuchant'elget 'ink'ez dunadija-un cha.
'Et whe Lot ootse'ke nahult'oh dubá higholchan.
'Udechoo whuzdli-un ooyaz dune suli', ink'ez boozi' Moab yulhni. 'En Moab dunene didohne, 'enne 'andit dzin whuts'un bubá unli.
'Ink'ez 'udek'oh-un 'en cha dune ooyaz suli' 'ink'ez boozi' Ben-Ammi yulhni. 'Enne Ammon dunene bubá unli 'andit dzin whuts'un.
'Ink'ez Abraham 'et whedinya whe nyan wheinya, Kadesh 'ink'ez Shur bulh 'et whulh eguz 'et hoot'e', ink'ez Gerar howhutni whuz cha whuloh te whut'i.
'Et Abraham nyoon Sarah du'at, 'en 'ubulhni, “Sulhtus 'unt'oh.” 'Ink'ez Abimelech, Gerar whulerwe, 'en Sarah yilhchoot.
'Et hoonts'i Yak'usda (Elohim) Abimelech 'ulhdzis nute whe yughu ninya 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “A, dune dazsai-un inli whe 'int'oh ndun ts'eke ilhchoot-un uyoon dune 'at 'unt'oh.”
'Et hoonts'i Abimelech 'aw yuzih nulhiyal 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Moodihti (Adonai) dune ts'ih'un 'unt'ohne didohne ts'iyawh eh butanghan?
'Aw lakw sulhdinel, ‘Sulhtus 'unt'oh sulhdinel? 'Ink'ez didutch'oh cha 'utni, ‘Sulhutsin 'unt'oh,’ ni. Sdzi ts'ih'un 'unt'oh 'ink'ez sla cha 'aw lhditsun whe njan 'et dusja.”
'Ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) 'uyulhni nute whe, “A, t'eoonuszun ndzi ts'ih'un 'unt'oh whe 'inja 'ink'ez si cha ninta' tant'elh-un whuch'a nyostun whe 'ust'oh 'et huwa 'aw ootalhanal.
'Andit 'et huwa ndun ts'eke ootl'a nayilhtih, nus hoo'en-un dune 'unt'oh, 'ink'ez si mba tenadoodli 'ink'ez khona'. 'Aw ootl'analhuyilhtel de, 'alha dantantsah whe 'int'oh 'ink'ez mbene la nch'e' unline 'enne cha ts'iyawh.”
'Et 'om bun Abimelech 'uda' dudinya 'ink'ez mbene la yuba 'ut'enne ts'iyawh 'anih budani' 'ink'ez ts'iyawh daja ni la ts'iyawh bubudani', 'ink'ez dune ts'iyawh hunilhjoot.
'Ink'ez Abimelech, Abraham 'anih yudani' 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Dane inla whe 'int'oh? Ndet whe tank'us 'unyusla ha lhe'hoont'oh-un sk'ehoon'ai 'ink'ez njan whulerwe usli-un cha 'ut'en untsi'-i cha? 'Aw ndusonle' huba' lhe'hoot'oh whuz un'a 'usinla.”
'Et Abimelech 'en Abraham 'uyulhni, “Daja ninzun whe 'inja 'et dinja yulhni?”
'Ink'ez Abraham 'utni, “Dune Yak'usda (Elohim) ehunuljut-un njan keyoh 'aw hooloh nuszun, 'et huwa 'usja 'ink'ez s'at en gha tila sozoolhghelh nuszun.
'Et hoonts'i 'alha sulhtus 'unt'oh. Sbá ootse' unt'oh, 'aw sloo ooyaz iloh unt'oh 'ink'ez s'at suli'.
'Ink'ez 'et 'uhooja Yak'usda (Elohim) sbá ooyoh huwutisya whe 'et ndun ts'eke dusni, ‘Njan whe inzoo whe 'et ts'iyants'uk sba 'et doneh ntsoh te nit'as te, sulhutsin 'unt'oh doni'.”’
'Et Abimelech 'usbai 'ink'ez musdoos dune cha, ts'eke 'ink'ez dune bulh, yunatne' 'ut'enne 'enne cha, ts'iyawh Abraham gha buninla, 'ink'ez yu'at cha yutl'anayalhti.
'Ink'ez Abimelech 'utni, “Whunilh'en ndi syun njan mbut whuz'ai, ndet hukwa' ninzun-un, 'et hoont'i.”
'Ink'ez Sarah 'en cha 'uyulhni, “Whunilh'en nyulhutsin 1000 silver nukat-i 'i cha oogha inusla. 'I gha mbene la nyulh 'ut'enne cha 'ink'ez 'uyoonne nalh cha, 'awet ts'ih'un mba nawhúsdli' whe' hoont'oh!” 'Et whe hukwa' yudani'.
'Et Abraham Yak'usda (Elohim) ts'un tenadidli 'ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) Abimelech soo na'yinla, yu'at cha 'ink'ez ts'ekoo yunat ne'ut'enne cha, 'ink'ez bubuzke' whuzdli'.
'Et whe Moodihti (Yahweh) ndunne Abimelech ooyoh dilhtsine ts'ekoo ts'iyawh buchan whudana'dinla, ndun Sarah 'en gha.
'Ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en Sarah yughu ninya 'et whe ndutínelh ni da', 'ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en Sarah ba nduja, nts'e datni 'et.
Sarah 'en ba Abraham ba ooye' tit'elh 'en duneyaz tileh. Hoonyan whe 'et ndet Yak'usda (Elohim) yuba yulhni-un 'et nduhooja.
'Ink'ez Abraham ndun ts'oodun yughu yulhtsi-un, duneyaz, Sarah yulhtsi, Isaac yulhni.
'Ink'ez Abraham duye' Isaac hukwa dune unli-un yuzt'us lhk'udit dzin be, be inle' whe daja ni la Yak'usda (Elohim) ndoneh yulhni 'et nduja.
'Et Abraham whunizyat whunizyat be yus k'ut (100) whe 'et Isaac yughu yulhtsi.
'Ink'ez Sarah 'utni, “Yak'usda (Elohim) usdlo-un sgha oonin'ai. Mbene la sudits'one ts'iyawh la sulh hoodloh.”
'Ink'ez cha 'utni, “Mbe suba Abraham yudoni' Sarah ts'oodun e'tilhtuk hidoni', duneti unli, 'et whe dune ooyaz ba 'ust'i suli'.”
'Et ts'oodun nuye 'ink'ez 'ulhtuk-un 'etsul 'uja 'et dzin 'et Abraham dune ghu nusuya.
'Et Sarah yunilh'en nyoon ts'eke Egypt whut'en ooye' 'unt'oh, Abraham dune ghu yulhtsi-un, yughudloh.
'Et huwa Abraham 'uyulhni, “Ndun ts'ekoo 'ulhna 'ink'ez buyaz bulh tenabuninyoot. Ndun 'ulhna buyaz 'en 'aw syaz Isaac ts'iyai nk'elh'az yolhchoot ait'oh”
'Ink'ez daja 'utni whe, 'et Abraham ooba nek'e'hoot'oh nyoon ooye' 'en ghun.
'Et hoonts'i Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en Abraham 'uyulhni, “Khun te mba dzoh 'uhoot'e' junih, ndun ts'eke k'us duyaz bulh 'en bughun, Sarah daja nyulhni la oozilhts'ai, Isaac 'en la toh ts'e dune whutaleh 'en, nyun nts'u haindene uhutit'elh.
'Et hoonts'i ndun ts'eke 'ulhna ooyaz, 'en gha didoh-un tiselh, nts'u hainzut 'et huwa.”
'Et Abraham bundada' 'uda' dudinya 'ink'ez ut'alh-i 'ink'ez too cha, duwus k'eyinla 'ink'ez duye', Hagar ooyaz 'en yugha ininla, 'ink'ez whenayalh'a'. 'Ink'ez whenaja ts'eke, Beersheba chunt'oh, dune lhuhóot'ih, 'oh nuya.
'Ink'ez nyoo too cha haidalhde, 'ink'ez nyoon duyaz dune 'ilhoghun duchun sa whus'ih-un 'et neinilhti.
'Ink'ez yanch'az ts'ihyan natl'adida', k'aza be 'uhututsoh-un 'et 'uwhuldzoh, 'ink'ez didutch'oh 'ududutni, “Ndun syaz datitsah-un 'aw lhozoos'en.” 'Ink'ez yanch'az netladida' 'ink'ez whenintse.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) ndun ts'oodun utso yuduzts'ai. 'Et whe Yak'usda (Elohim) oolizas 'en Hagar yuts'un huyih yak'uz ts'un, 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Hagar, dainja whe 'udini? 'Aw whenilhjut iloh! Yak'usda (Elohim) ndun duneyaz yudants'o whe 'unt'oh.
Dudinyaih 'ink'ez ts'oodun dudilhtih, 'ink'ez oola oontun, tube dune oots'u hatidoh whutiselh.”
'Ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) ts'eke hoon'en yulhtsi le'yinla 'ink'ez nyo too diz'ai-un ka k'et 'et whutilh'en, 'ink'ez nyoo 'uzuz be too sulhdzo-i nuya'a-i, 'i yudilhbun 'ink'ez duyaz cha too yugha nilhdzo.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) ndun duneyaz yulh 'unt'oh 'ink'ez nizyai. 'Ink'ez nyo chuntoh 'et whut'i 'ink'ez k'aza be' tutsoh suli'.
Keyoh Paran huwhutni-un chuntoh 'et whuti 'ink'ez ooloo Egypt whut'en-un ts'eke 'en yuba yilhchoot oo'at yutaleh ha.
'Et 'uhooja 'owhuya whudizulh Abimelech 'ink'ez Phicol, lhuganne bumoodih, Abraham huyulh yailduk 'ink'ez 'uhuyulhni, “Nts'oh tila ne'int'en-un ts'iyawh Yak'usda (Elohim) nyulh 'unt'oh.
'Et huwa Yak'usda (Elohim) nalh sudini sts'u haindene cha ndun syaz cha, danyusla la ngha te'nuszun whe ne'nyuzus'en whe nyun cha whuz un'a ne'solh'en ndi yun k'ut cha, ookw'ut ninya-i cha.”
'Et Abraham 'utni, “A whuz un'a nahutisyeh.”
'Et Abraham, Abimelech hukwa' yudani', di ha Abimelech oonatne'ut'enne ndi too diz'ai-un ooghu huhoolhchoot.
'Et Abimelech 'utni, “'Aw t'eoonuzuzun njan duhooja-un 'aw sulhdinel, 'andit dzin 'et 'andits'iya t'eooniszin.”
'Et Abraham 'usbai cha, musdoos dune cha, 'i Abimelech gha ininla 'ink'ez nahult'oh lhba khuni be ba lhaoodulya.
'Ink'ez Abraham lhtak'anti 'usbaiyaz, ts'ekoo 'usbaiyaz 'i udun neininla.
'Et Abimelech Abraham yoodulhkut, “Dahoont'oh huwa ndi lhtak'ant'i 'usbaiyaz 'udun neninla?”
'Et 'uyulhni, “Ndi lhtak'ant'i 'usbaiyaz sla k'ez olhchoot 'i gha t'eoonudzun, njan too diz'ai-un si 'uwhusla whe' hoont'oh”
'Et huwa njan 'et Beersheba whulhni nahult'oh lhts'un nahuhisda-un 'et huwa.
'Et njan Beersheba 'et khuni buba lhaoodulya, 'et Abimelech dunadija, Phicol lhuganne bumoodih bulh 'ink'ez Philistinene bukeyoh ts'e whuz whenahit'az.
'Et Abraham nyo Beersheba 'et tamarisk duchun 'i nyoh 'et 'ainanla, 'ink'ez 'et Moodihti (Yahweh Olam) yuka huyih, 'en 'ilhiz wheni Yak'usda (El) unli.
'Ink'ez Abraham nyo Philistine bukeyoh 'et lhat dzin 'et usda.
'Et njan hukw'elh'az 'et 'uhooja, Yak'usda (Elohim), Abraham yoolhdzai 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Abraham!” 'Et Abraham 'utni, “Njan 'ust'en.”
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Nye' ilhchoot, nye' 'aw 'ilhogun Isaac ilhchoot ook'eintsi', 'ink'ez yun k'ut Moriah ts'e whuz ilhtelh. 'Ink'ez dolhk'un nyo dzulh nyu dutasnelh-un, 'et si sts'un dolhk'un sih.”
'Et Abraham 'ombun 'uda' dudinya, donkey hik'e 'inla 'ink'ez nane chilke 'enne cha dudulh hubutilh'az, 'ink'ez ooye' Isaac cha. Tsuz cha lhts'uneidilhnat yudutalhk'un wheni, 'ink'ez dudinya. Whuz Yak'usda (Elohim) whuyuntilhtun-un ts'e whuz whenya.
'Et whulh tat dzin Abraham 'et Abraham ndo yutan'en, 'et nyo nilhdza' 'et whutilh'en.
'Ink'ez Abraham nyoonne chilkeyaz 'ubulhni, “Njan donkey oozih suhke ndun tsoodun 'ink'ez n'un tat'us 'ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) oots'u teni'uznilhdzun, 'ink'ez sih nohghu naoot'as.”
'Et Abraham nyoo tsuz lhts'e nidilhnat-i yilhchoot 'ink'ez Isaac 'en yut'uyuz'ai yutooghe' ha. Didut kwun 'i yutiz'ai 'ink'ez lhuzti' cha 'ink'ez whehan'az.
'Ink'ez Isaac, Abraham dubá yulh yatilhduk 'ink'ez 'utni, “'Ubá!” 'Ink'ez Abaraham 'utni, “Sye', njan si 'ust'oh.” 'Ink'ez Isaac utni, “Whunilh'en! Kwun cha tit'ai 'ink'ez tsuz cha, 'ink'ez 'usbaiyaz dutalhk'un-i daja?”
'Ink'ez Abraham 'utni, “Sye' Yak'usda (Elohim) didutch'oh la ndi 'usbaiyaz netla yoolhtelh,” 'ink'ez nahult'oh whehan'az.
'Et ndet Yak'usda (Elohim) whenilhtan-un 'et nehunin'az 'ink'ez Abraham loodel 'inla 'ink'ez tsuz cha yuk'edinla 'ink'ez duye' Isaac yulhghel 'ink'ez tsuz yuk'eyilhti.
'Ink'ez Abraham lhuztih yilhchoot 'ink'ez duye' yutuzilhghelh ha do dutilhni.
'Et hoonts'i Moodihti (Yahweh) oolizas yak'uz whuts'un yukahizya 'ink'ez 'utni, “Abraham! Abraham!” 'Et Abraham 'utni, “Njan 'ust'oh.”
'Ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Nye' ook'edolnih junih k'us hoonli 'onle' junih! 'Andit t'eooniszin Yak'usda (Elohim) be niljut, nye' 'en hoonts'i ooch'a lhuyoontun 'aw 'ilhoghun nye', si sch'a lhoontun.”
'Et Abraham ndo yutan'en 'ink'ez whunilh'en njan oot'a 'et 'usbai dune whutoh ts'uldílhtan, 'et oode be usdlooh. 'Et Abraham whuz whenya 'ink'ez 'usbai dune yílhchoot 'ink'ez 'i be yuts'e' dalhk'un ooye' yuk'edalhti.
Abraham nyo hoozi' whulhtsi, “Moodihti 'En Negha 'oo'alh (Yahweh-Yireh),” whulhni. 'Et 'andit whuts'un 'i boozi unli, “Moodihti (Yahweh) oodzulh k'ut 'et la negha 'oo'alh.”
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) oolizas 'en ndo yak'uz ts'un whulh nat hikahuyih,
'et 'utni, “Sich'oh ooghu nahizusya,” ni Moodihti (Yahweh), njan 'et dinja-un huwa, 'aw nye' 'en hoonts'i 'aw 'ilhoghun nye' 'en hoonts'i sch'a lhoontun.
Be soo hoonzoo-un 'i 'utisdlilh, mba soo hoonzoo-un tileh. 'Ink'ez nts'u haindene lhane whutaleh, sum k'un'a huldlai tileh, sai taba usdzai-i cha 'et 'ultsuk-i hutileh nts'u haindene, 'ink'ez nch'az ditnine bukeyoh 'i huyootatun.
Nts'u hainde-un ndi yun k'ut dune ts'iyawh soo hoonzoo-un bugha hóotalts'ulh, sk'un'a 'inja 'et huwa.”
'Et Abraham chilkeyaz bughu nahunt'az, dunahudit'az 'ink'ez keyoh Beersheba ts'e whehandil, 'ink'ez Abraham keyoh Beersheba 'et whut'i.
'Et 'uhooja hukw'elh'az Abraham hidani', “'Alha Milkah 'en cha buzkeh hooni Nahor nyulhutsin 'en buzkeh:
'Udetso ooyaz Uz huyulhni, bulhutsin Buz 'ink'ez Aram oobá Kemuel.
Chesed, Hazo, Pildash, Jidlaph, 'ink'ez Bethuel.”
'Ink'ez Bethuel 'en Rebekah ooyaz suli', ndune lhk'udine 'enne Milcah, Nahor bubulhtsi, Abraham bulhutsin.
Nahor ndun oo'at 'en yugha yulhtsi 'unt'oh, 'en boozi' Reumah, 'en cha buzkeh hooni: Tebah, Gaham, Thahash, 'ink'ez Maachah.
Sarah 'en 127 be yus k'ut whe dazsai. 'Et njan duwhuldzoh Sarah khana'.
'Et Sarah 'en keyoh Kirjath Arba, (Hebron 'uhoont'oh) Canaan keyoh 'et dazsai 'ink'ez Abraham whusainya 'ink'ez Sarah yuk'enudleh 'ink'ez yuk'etso.
'Et Abraham ooch'a dazsai-un oobut dudinya 'ink'ez Heth buzkeh 'ubulhni,
“'Udun keyoh whut'en-un usli 'ink'ez ants'i nohtoh nusya. Yun sgha nuh'aih, ts'unk'ut wheni nohtoh sghu yaidlane 'et si 'abooslelh.”
'Ink'ez Heth ooye'ke 'uhuyulhni,
“Nemoodih, neoozilhts'ai, lerwe ye' dune uncha-un inli whe 'int'oh netoh, ndet hukwa' ninzun-un hoonzoo-un 'et nghu yaidlane 'abinle, 'aw nch'a ts'uhotun ait'oh. Dune 'atanlelh-un 'et si nghu yaidlane 'abonlelh.”
''Et Abraham dudinya 'ink'ez Heth buzkeh soo yun bubut nachaniti.
'Ink'ez 'ubulhni, “Hukwa' nahzun de njan snanto 'et 'abuhoolelh, soo zulhts'ai, Ephron, Zohar ooye' 'en bulh yalhduk.
Njan nyun k'ut whuz'ai-un ts'e'an Machpelah ooch'e', 'et sgha ho'alh, ndet 'ultsuk-un 'et la hosket 'ink'ez dune 'atislelh-un.”
'Et Ephron, Heth buye'ke butoh whut'i 'ink'ez Ephron Hitt whut'en-un 'unt'oh, 'en Abraham 'uyulhni. Heth buzkeh bunalh, njan keyoh whuti dati-un dandilhne 'uyulhni,
“'Awundooh smoodih! Soo zilhts'ai, njan yun 'ink'ez tse'an hukw'uh whuz'ai, nduwhulcho ngha oonus'ai ndune sdune'ne buzkeh bunalh ngha oonus'ai 'et nghu yaidlahne 'abinle.”
'Et Abraham ts'iyawh yun k'ut whut'enne bubut nachanitno,
'Ink'ez Ephron bulh yalhduk nyoonne dune bunalh ubulh 'uyulhni, “'Et sgha oonin'aih de soo zilhts'ai, sooniya hukw'elha tiselh njan yun, sooniya ilhchoot 'ink'ez 'et si sghu yaidlane 'abooslelh.”
'Ink'ez Ephron, Abraham 'uyulhni,
“Smoodih soo zilhts'ai, ndi yun dit whunizyat whunizyai (400) 'ultsuk-i silver 'et di whutaleh da' nyun si bulh eguz, 'et nghu yaidlane 'abinle.”
