'Ink'ez Abrham Ephron yoozilhts'ai, 'ink'ez Abraham nyoo silver nuyulhdaz Ephron yuts'iyoozi-i nyoonne Heth buzkeh bunalh, dit whunizyat whunizyai (400) silver 'et 'ultsuk-i, 'oh da' 'i yutl'ayandzai.
'Et Ephron ooyun Machpelah 'uhoont'oh inle', Mamre whuzih, yun 'ink'ez tse'an cha 'ink'ez duchun cha nanudiz'a-i ts'iyawh yuyonket.
'Et Abraham nyoonne Heth buzkeh bunalh, 'ink'ez keyoh whuti dati 'et dandilhne cha, 'enne bunalh 'i oogha ininkat.
'Et hukw'elh'az Abraham du'at Sarah nyo tse'an 'et 'ayalhti, Machpelah ooyun k'ut, Mamre whuzih (Hebron 'unt'oh), Canaan keyoh 'et.
'Et nyo yun k'ut 'ink'ez tse'an cha ook'ut whuz'ai, 'i Abraham yonket, Heth buzkeh 'enne bubuyonket dune 'adutilalh wheni.
Abraham 'awet tube yoo'un uzulh 'ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) ts'iyaitsuk Abraham soo hoonzoo-un ba whulhtsi.
'Et Abraham yuba 'uten-un yoo'un uzulh-un, 'en yoh yuba huwunli-un ts'iyants'uk whumoodih yilh'i-un, 'en 'uyulhni, “'Anih njan swuz t'ah nedilnih.
'Ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) yak'uz whuYak'usda (Elohim), 'ink'ez yun k'ut whuYak'usda (Elohim) cha, 'en nalh sts'un nahitanyeh, 'aw njan Canaan whut'enne, 'enne butoh whust'ine buyaz ts'eke 'en sye' dune 'aw 'enne butoh 'aw oo'at sba tizulalhchulh.
'Et hoonts'i sich'oh skeyoh 'ink'ez sich'oh snatneke 'enne butoh 'et sye' Isaac oo'at ooba yitalhchulh.”
'Et nyoon yuba 'uten-un 'uyulhni, “'Ink'ez nyoon ts'eke 'aw ndiz hukwa lhe'nizun tila, 'et nye' whuz eh tistelh nts'ez de hakedanzut ts'e?”
'Et Abraham 'utni, “Huwinli 'aw sye' whuz tolhte' ait'oh.
Yak'uz whuMoodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) 'en sbá ooyoh 'ink'ez ookeyoh whuz de hasalhti, sulh yailhduk 'ink'ez sts'un nahizya 'usulhni, ‘Mbene la nts'u haindene ndi yun bugha inus'ai.’ 'En la oolizas ntso yutilh'alh 'ink'ez sye' oo'at yutaleh-un 'en whuz de hatalhtelh.
'Et ndun ts'eke 'aw ndiz nyulh natit'us hukwa lhe'nizun de, 'et de ndi khuni be sts'un nahizinya-i gak natidleh, 'et hoonts'i 'aw sye' whuz tolhte' ait'oh.”
'Et nyoon hiba 'uten-un yuwuz t'ah nedilni Abraham 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, yutsu nahizya daja yulhni.
'Et nyoon yuba 'ut'en-un, whunizyai oomoodih ooch'e' khuna-i, camel huyulhni, yilhchoot 'ink'ez whenya. Ndai la oomoodih ooch'e' ts'iyawh didut oola k'et yuzdla whe' hoont'oh 'ink'ez dudinya. 'Ink'ez yun k'ut Mesopotamia, Nahor ookeyoh, 'et whuz whenya.
'Ink'ez nyo keyoh whughu ninya whe tadiz'ai, too k'et whuz'ai, 'et nyoo camel dugwut ts'i be 'et nebuninla, 'owhuya whudizulh 'et ts'ekoo too huhudilh
'Ink'ez 'utni, “O Abraham smoodih ooMoodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim), soo ts'ih-un un'a lhaoodoosleh-un 'et sgha oonin'aih 'ink'ez smoodih Abraham soo te'ninzun-i be ne'olh'en.
Whunilh'en njan too diz'ai-un 'et whuzih susyin, 'ink'ez njan keyoh whudune'ne butse'ke, too huhutidulh 'awet nilhdukw.
'Et lhaoodonleh mbe la ts'ekeyaz 'udutasnelh-un, nyoo too be silhdzo-i yun nenin'aih oosnai' sih dusni-un, 'en sih dooni', ‘Too intnai 'ink'ez nyoo camel 'i cha si oogha taoo'alh,’ sulhni-un, 'en 'oot'e', mba 'ut'en-un Isaac oo'at wheni 'et si t'eoonoszin, 'awet smoodih oogha t'e'ninzun hukw'un'a 'inla.”
'Et 'uhooja 'awhuz yalhduk whe 'et Rebekah huyulhni-un, Bethuel ootse', Milcah ooyaz, Nahor oo'at, Abraham bulhutsin, 'en 'owhuya too ha tizya 'oosa' duwus k'ut yulh'ai.
'Et nyoon t'etyaz, tube ts'ekezoo' 'aw dune yat'alhasnai 'awhuz unli, 'et nyooz too ha tizya nyoo dude 'oosa' yudilhbun 'ink'ez nyus de hanaja.
'Ink'ez nyoon Abraham yuba 'ut'en-un yududilhgai 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Sla 'ineh whe nyoo nye'oosa' be sulhdzo-i, too oosnai'-un sgha oonin'aih.”
'Et ts'ekeyaz 'uyulhni, “Too intnai smoodihti.” 'Ink'ez 'aho dude 'oosa' duwus k'eitiz'ai 'ink'ez dula ts'un ye neinin'ai, 'ink'ez yugha tanilhdzo.
'Et hukw'elh'az too utnai lhadutja whe 'et 'utni, “Nyoon camel 'i cha sih too nahootnai'.”
'Et soo 'aho 'et nyoo huye tatnai-i duchun 'i too huba idilhbun, 'ink'ez too diz'ai-un whuz whenalgih whe ndi camel ts'iyawh hititnelh huba.
'Ink'ez nyoon dune t'edusnih 'et la Moodihti (Yahweh) whusainya-un, ts'iyawh lhaoodutneh tila k'us gak tila.
'Et doo cha nyoo khuna-i camel tanatnai' hukw'elh'az 'et nyoon dune nyoo gwul dult'oh-i bunintsis huba, 'ilho shekel huyulhni, 'ilhudzin dune yuk'elha 'ut'ih-i 'uldaz lhulcho 'ink'ez nanki lachun huyulhya-i, 'i whunizyai shekel, 'i cha ts'iyawh gold 'unt'oh.
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Mbe ootse' inli whe 'int'oh? Sudini, mbá ooyoh neba soo' whulcho tilah 'et uztitez huba.?”
'Et 'uyulhni, “Si Bethuel ootse' Milcah ooyaz, 'en Nahor ooghu yulhtsi-un 'ust'oh.”
'Ink'ez 'on 'un cha 'uyulhni, ‘Tl'o cha lhai ts'ut'i, 'ink'ez tihtez-un cha soo' whulcho.”
'Et dune yo nenint'ai 'ink'ez Modihti (Yahweh) yuts'un teni' nalhdzin.
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Ooba 'ust'en-un Abraham ooYak'usda (Elohim) 'ink'ez ooMoodihti (Yahweh) cha 'en doti'. 'Aw ndun ooba 'ust'en-un ye yugha te'ninzun 'ink'ez ye ts'ih'un 'unt'oh-i cha yulalhditnih. 'Et si 'owhuya usyalh Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en ndun ooba 'ust'en-un oonatneke 'en whusunilhtan, 'et whuz oozusya.”
'Et nyoon t'etyaz yoh ts'u whelgai 'ink'ez duloo ooyoh ts'e hubudani'.
'Et Rebekah bulhutsin, Laban huyulhni, 'ink'ez Laban 'en n'az yuts'un telhgai 'ink'ez nyoon dune too diz'ai-un yuzih usyin-un, 'en yuzih neninya.
'Et 'uhooja nyoo yuni wheni yugha ininla 'ink'ez nyoo lachun wheni gha ininla 'i cha yunilh'en 'ink'ez nyoon dulhtus ooghuni yudants'o 'et 'ink'ez 'utni, ‘Whuz un'a dune sulh yalhduk,’ 'ink'ez nyoon dune yubut neninya 'ink'ez 'et yubut usyin nyoo camel oozih cha too k'et whuzih.
'Et 'uyulhni, “Daninyaih Moodihti (Yahweh) dawhuldzoo'-un oogha whults'ut! Di ha dati sinyin? Yoh lhaoodusla 'ink'ez khuna-i, Camel, cha ba lhaoodusla.”
'Et nyoon dune yoh daninya 'ink'ez nyoo khuna-i camel, 'i cha yuk'e' tizdla 'ink'ez tl'o cha yuti'ulh-i cha yubut neidilhdze. 'Ink'ez too duke ye tunatigus-i cha 'ink'ez nyoonne dune yulh nudilhne, 'enne cha buke huye tunatigus inle' buba 'et neininla.
'Ink'ez ut'alh-i cha bubut nehuninla 'ink'ez 'utni, ‘Ndet huwa njan whusasya-un 'awhuz lhunoduzusnih whe 'oos'alh ait'oh.” 'Ink'ez 'uyulhni, “A, yailhduk!”
'Et 'utni, “Abraham ba 'ut'en-un usli whe 'ust'oh.
Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en smoodih tube soo hoonzoo-un yuba whulhtsi 'ink'ez dune ncha-un suli'. Khuna-i didoh-i ts'iyawh 'ink'ez silver 'ink'ez dizti'-i gold dunt'i-i, 'ink'ez dune cha, ts'ekoo yuba 'ut'enne cha 'ink'ez ndi camel cha 'ink'ez donkey cha lhai yugha ninla.
'Ink'ez Sarah, smoodih oo'at, 'en dune ooyaz suli', tube hoonyan unli, 'et hoonts'i. 'Ink'ez 'en huye ts'iyai ut'i ts'iyawh yugha ininla.
'Et smoodih nahinyeh sulhni, 'inka nahizusya, ‘'Aw Canaan whut'enne buyun k'ut whust'ine 'enne buts'u hainzut-un sye' oo'at olhchoot juni.
'Et hoonts'i sba ooyoh 'ink'ez snatneke butoh 'et sye' ba oo'at olhchoot.’
'Et smoodih 'udusni, ‘Ndun ts'eke 'aw sulh natit'us hukwa lhe'nizun de?’
'Et hoonts'i 'usulhni, ‘Moodihti (Yahweh) mbe la ootso nusya-un, 'en lizas yulh ti'us ha yutl'aitilhtelh 'ink'ez inyalh whe soo' hoont'oh whe sye' ba oo'at snatneke butoh 'ink'ez sbá ooyoh whuts'un, whuz de hainzut-un 'en ooba yutalhchulh.
Ndet la snatneke butoh ninya de, ndun ts'eke 'aw hukwa lhe'hunizun de, be ts'u nahizinya-i gak natidleh.’
'Et 'andit dzin nyo too diz'ai-un 'et nenusya whe 'udusni, ‘O Moodihti (Yahweh), ooba 'ust'en-un Abraham ooYak'usda (Elohim), soo sba lhaoodonleh nts'e usyalh-un.
Nulh'en too diz'ai-un whuzih susyin whe 'et de la 'uhoneh t'et oot'alhe'asnai-un, too ha tiyalh 'ink'ez 'udusni, “Tooyaz sgha nilhdzeh nyoo nye 'oosa' be.”
'Ink'ez 'usudutanelh, “Too intnai 'ink'ez nyoo nghuna', Camel, 'i cha sih too ooba 'oosleh ititnelh-i,” Moodihti (Yahweh), 'en ts'eke 'oot'e' smoodih ooba 'ust'en-un, ooye' 'en ba oot'e'.’
'Et hoonts'i 'awhuz sdzi bez yasduk whe Rebekah 'owhuya uyalh dude 'oosa' duwus k'uyulh'ai 'ink'ez too diz'ai-un ts'e tainkai 'ink'ez 'udusni, ‘Awe' too sgha nilhdzeh tisnelh-i.”
'Ink'ez soo 'ahoh 'et dude 'oosa' duwus k'etiz'ai 'ink'ez 'usulhni, ‘Too intnai 'ink'ez nghuna' 'enne cha sih too buba 'oosleh.’ 'Ink'ez too usnai' 'ink'ez sghuna', 'i cha too yutitnelh-i ba lhaidinla.
'Et ooduskut 'ink'ez 'udusni, ‘Mbe oots'e' inli whe 'int'oh?’ 'Ink'ez 'utni, ‘Bethuel ootse', Nahor ooye' Milcah ghu yulhtsi-un inle'-un.’ 'Et nyo ooni huba cha 'ink'ez lachun huba cha 'i oogha inusla.
'Et stsi be yo 'usja 'ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) ts'un tení' nalhdzin, 'ink'ez smoodih Abraham 'en ooMoodihti Yak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) 'en ooba soo hoonzoo-un whulhtsi, 'en whuz be nts'e ts'ihnus ts'un 'utisnelh whe smoodih be 'ilhoghun 'en ootse', 'en 'utahatálhtelh smoodih ooye' ba.
'Et soo te'nuzun whe ts'ih'un 'un'a smoodih 'utilelh suduhni, 'et 'awundooh de, 'et de natisdalh nailhnih ts'unk'us tila toosya', k'us 'intl'us ts'e tila natooja', 'et sudohni.”
'Et Laban 'ink'ez Bethuel bulh 'uhuyulhni, “Moodihti (Yahweh) ts'u hahoolts'ut whe' hoont'oh, 'aw hoonzoo-un hukw'un'a k'us hoontsi' k'un'a nyulh yats'oolhduk ait'oh.
Njan Rebekah, mbut usyin ilhchoot 'ink'ez naindalh. 'En ooba 'int'en-un ooye', oo'at ooleh sih, Moodihti (Yahweh) yatilhduk hukw'un'a.”
'Et hukw'elh'az Abraham ba ne'ut'en-un ndi khuni yudants'o whe, 'awet yun nachaniti 'ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) yuts'un teni' nalhdzin.
'Et nyoon Abraham yuba 'ut'en-un, dizti'-i khuts'ulhya-i, silver cha, 'ink'ez gold cha 'unt'oh 'ink'ez naih cha, 'i Rebekah yugha ininla, 'ink'ez dizti'-i bulhutsin cha 'ink'ez ooloo cha 'i bugha ininla.
'Et whe didut 'ink'ez dune hiyulh nudilh 'enne 'uhan'alh 'ink'ez tahitnai'. 'Et 'ulhdzis nduhoolhyiz 'et hantez. 'Et whe bundada' duhudindil 'ink'ez 'et 'utni, “Sumoodih ts'un nasalh'alh.”
'Et hoonts'i Rebekah bulhutsin 'ink'ez ooloo cha 'uhutni, “Whute ndet t'et 'atsul nezih naooda' whunizyat dzin at'en, 'et de hukw'elh'az 'et sih nyulh natoo'as.”
'Et 'ubulhni, “Dah sudohni' junih! Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en lhe'whuldzoo'-un sba whulhtsi. Sk'oh ndiz nutisyalh-un, whute nasilh'alh smoodih ts'un natoosja'.”
'Et 'uhuyulhni, “Ndun t'etyaz 'anih ts'udoni' 'ink'ez didutch'oh ts'oodolhkut.”
'Et Rebekah, 'anih, hidani', 'ink'ez 'uhuylhni, “Ndun dune bulh tan'us eh?” 'Et 'utni, “A, whuz toosya' lah.”
'Et 'inka Rebekah dudulhtus 'ink'ez yughunli-un ts'eke, 'ink'ez Abraham yuba 'ut'en-un 'ink'ez dune tubulh ubulh whe huyalh'a'.
'Ink'ez Rebekah soo hoonzoo-un hiba tenadidli 'ink'ez 'uhuyulhni, “Neulhtus, lhez te whunizyai lhk'uz te (100,000,000) dune buloo onle' sih 'ink'ez nts'u haindene mbene la buts'u dutnine hukwuti-un dati 'i himoodih oole'.”
'Et Rebekah 'ink'ez mbene la yuba 'ut'enne ts'ekoo, dodindil 'ink'ez nyoo Camel hik'etl'adiltsi', nyoon dune huyuntizdil 'ink'ez Abraham hiba 'uten-un, Rebekah hubilhchoot 'ink'ez nahutisdil.
'Et Isaac nyan whut'i Beer-lahai-Roi huwhutni, nts'un tsun whuz whut'i.
'Et Isaac hulhgha nus 'a yun k'ut nuninuzut ha whuz oozya. Ndo yutan'en 'ink'ez whunilh'en, 'et nyo camel whuz de nal'us.
'Et Rebekah ndo yutan'en 'ink'ez Isaac yunilh'en whe camel yuk'utizya, nyoo khuna-i k'usda-i.
'Et nyoon ba 'ut'en-un yoodulhkut, “Nyoon dune nets'oyalh-un, mbe whe 'ut'en?” 'Et ndun ba 'ut'en-un 'uyulhni, “Smoodih 'ut'en.” 'Et Rebekah dunin k'e'nilhbal.
'Et nyoon Abraham yuba 'ut'en-un nts'oh tila dat'en-un 'et Isaac yudani'.
'Et Isaac duloo Sarah oonimbali t'ah ts'e Rebekah dainilhti 'ink'ez Rebekah yu'at suli', 'ink'ez yuk'entsi'. 'Et Isaac ooloo dazsai whe tube k'enainin'a.
'Et Abraham oo'at cha, Kuturah huyulhni, 'en yughu nasda.
'En cha yuba buzkeh hooni, Zimran, Jokshan, Medan, Midian, Ishbak, 'ink'ez Shuah.
Jokshan 'en Sheba 'ink'ez Dedan bulh buzkeh suli', 'ink'ez Dedan ooye'ke 'enne Asshurim Lutushim 'ink'ez Leumim.
'Ink'ez Midian ooye'ke, 'enne Ephah, Epher, Hanoch, Abida 'ink'ez Eldaah 'enne ts'iyawh Kuturh buzkeh.
'Ink'ez Abraham ndai la yut'i-i ts'iyawh Isaac gha ininla.
'Et hoonts'i Abraham 'uyoonne ts'ekoo oo'at bugha nyus 'uhint'ohne, 'enne bubuzkeh 'enne cha buts'e'tilhdil, butl'a'andla 'ink'ez ooye' Isaac yuch'az nda' 'uts'un keyoh ts'e whuz whe balh'a'.
Njan duwhultsuk yus k'ut 'et ndi yun k'ut inda' Abraham 175 yus k'ut 'et ndi yun k'ut inda'.
'Et Abraham 'en 'udek'ez hanaji 'ink'ez soo hoonyan suli' whe dazsai. Tube hoonyan 'ink'ez ndi yinka inda' 'et ba whudizbun. 'Et whe dudune' 'enne buts'un whenaja.
'Ink'ez ooye'ke Isaac 'ink'ez Ishmael, 'enne nyo Machpelah tse'an 'et 'ahuyalhti. Mamre whutso Ephron ootl'o k'ut, Zohar Hitt whut'en-un, 'en ooye', 'et nyo tse'an 'et 'ahuyalhti.
Nyoo tl'o k'ut Abraham Heth buzkeh buts'un yonket-i, 'et Sarah oozih 'et Abraham 'ahuyalhti.
'Et whe lhuwhuzut Abraham dazsai hukw'elh'az, 'et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en ooye' Isaac soo hoonzoo-un yuba' hoonla. 'Ink'ez Isaac 'en Beer Lahai Roi 'et whut'i.
Ndunne 'enne Ishmael ts'u haindene: Ishmael 'en Abraham ooye', Hagar Egypt whut'en-un, 'en Sarah yunatne'ut'en-un, 'en ooyaz, 'en Abraham yughulhtsi-un ooye'.
Ndowhi 'i Ishmael ooye'ke buboozi': 'udechoo Nabaioth, 'et hukw'elh'az Kedar, Adbeel 'ink'ez Mibsam,
Mishma, Dumah, Massa,
Hadar, Tema, Jetur, Naphish, 'ink'ez Kedemah.
'Enne Ishmael ooye'ke 'uhint'oh. Ndi 'i buboozi nts'e bukeyoh 'ink'ez hudilhts'i 'et. Whunizyai 'on 'at nanki (12) budayiyaz, 'enne nts'e hahande hukwa sih boozi'.
Ishmael ndi yun k'ut inda-un, 137 be yus k'ut 'et dazai. 'En cha whutsoda' yulh 'unt'ohne buts'un whenya.
Yun k'ut Havilah 'ink'ez Shur 'et 'uwhuldzoh, Egypt whanda', Assyria ts'u wheti, 'oh huwhut'i 'ink'ez Ishmael dunatneke butoh 'et dazsai.
Ndi 'i Abraham ooye' Isaac oots'u hayandene. Abraham 'en Isaac oobá.
Isaac 'en dit whunizyai (40) naoodizut whe oo'at Rebekah 'en yughusda. Bethuel ootse' 'en Syria whut'en, Padan Aram keyoh, 'et Laban, 'en Syria whut'en 'en bulhtus.
'Et Isaac 'en Moodihti (Yahweh) yuts'u tedudlih du'at ba, 'aw buzkeh hole' ait'oh. 'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) 'et yugha oonin'ai 'ink'ez Rebekah ulchan.
'Et nyo oochan ts'e nane nukahulhoh, “Soo 'ust'oh 'et hoonts'i 'et di ha njan dust'oh?” ni, 'ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) yoodalhkut.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en Rebekah 'uyulhni, “Nawh didohne 'enne nchan 'uhint'oh. Nawh didohne 'enne hubutalhtsi, 'ilhoh didoh-un 'en onghun-un hanus 'ulhtus, 'ink'ez 'udetso whutileh-un 'en duk'oh-un yuba ne'tit'en.”
'Et 'awet ooba newhults'ut ooyaz whutaleh ha, 'et nane lht'udinke oochan.
'Udetso whuzdli-un 'en dulk'un 'ink'ez ants'i naih 'ugha unli 'i yesda le'unt'oh ndulcho whe ooyust'e, 'en Esau huyulhni.
'Et hukw'elh'az bulhutsin en whuzdli, 'ink'ez Esau ookentsul 'i yilhchoot. 'En Jacob huyulhni. Isaac lhk'utat whunizyat be yus k'ut (60) 'et nyoon ts'oodunne huwhuzdli.
'Et nyoonne duneyaz huniyilh, Esau 'en tube 'uka 'ut'en-un 'ink'ez chuntoh whudune' whe 'uyoo unli. 'Et hoonts'i Jacob 'en t'edusnih-un dune unli, nimbali t'ah za whut'i.
'Ink'ez Isaac 'en Esau yuk'entsi', ndai yughan-i yu'alh, 'ink'ez Rebekah 'en Jacob yuk'entsi'.
'Aw 'et Jacob tazul inla 'ink'ez Esau 'en chuntoh ts'un hanaja 'ink'ez tube nenintsai.
'Et Esau 'en Jacob 'uyulhni, “Sla'inle whe nyutazul dulk'un, 'i za sunail'alh, tube nenisai 'et huwa.” 'Et huwa boozi' 'i Edom ts'utni.
'Et hoonts'i Jacob utni, “Ndai la mba ootadzilh-i k'at le, 'i 'andit be sts'e 'oonket.”
'Ink'ez Esau 'utni, “Whunilh'en 'awet datisah! Be daoost'e' suba ndi sba huyoozi-i?”
'Et Jacob 'utni, “'Andit dzin sts'un nahinyeh.” 'Et huwa yuts'u nahizya 'ink'ez ndai la k'at le oogha itakulh-i, 'i Jacob 'en ye ts'un 'onket.
'Ink'ez Jacob, Esau ut'alh-i 'ink'ez nyoo yuzdliz-i hanuyeh, 'i yugha ininla 'ink'ez 'i yan'al, 'ink'ez dunadija 'ink'ez 'az whenaja. 'Et Esau ndai la k'at le oogha itakulh-i ts'iyawh 'aw yukalhe'nizun, 'un yutilhdil.
'Et nyo keyoh dai dinzut, whutso da' Abraham khuna whe 'et cha dai dinzut inle' 'ink'ez Isaac, Abimelech huyulhni, Philistine whut'enne buba lerwe, Gerar whut'i, 'en buts'un whenya.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) yunalhts'et hainya 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “'Aw Egypt ts'u tonya' junih. Ndet la yun nyudutasnelh-un 'et sih hont'e'.
Ndi yun 'i k'ut hont'e 'ink'ez nyulh 'utistelh, 'ink'ez mba soo hoonzoo-i ubooselh. Nyun cha 'ink'ez nts'u haindene cha ndi yun bugha inus'ai, ndet la mbá Abraham oots'u nahizusya-i, 'i lhadutisleh 'et huwa.
'Ink'ez nts'u haindene, 'enne yak'uz whusum k'un'a lhk'uz te huldlai hubutilhtselh. 'Ink'ez nts'u hainde 'en ts'iyawh njan yun k'ut bugha óotas'alh. 'Ink'ez nts'u haindene, 'enne bugha ndi yun k'ut dune ts'iyawh huba soo hoonzoo-i 'i butilhtselh.
Abraham 'en sghuni oontun 'ink'ez sk'oh ts'e ant'e, sghuni 'i yuk'une'ust'en, dadusni, 'et cha hont'un, 'ink'ez nts'en'a ba newhunin'ai, 'et huwa.”
'Et Isaac nyo keyoh Gerar howhutni-un 'et hoot'e'.
'Et nyoonne dune 'et whudune'ne hi'at ka huyoodulhkut 'ink'ez 'ubulhni, “Sulhtus 'unt'oh.” “S'at 'unt'oh” hubulhni de, doo ka la sozoolhghelh ninzun 'awhuz ndun Rebekah ts'eke zoo' 'et huwa.
'Et 'uhooja sa' nyo 'et keyoh hoot'e' whe Abimelech, Philistinene bulerwe, dadint'az k'et 'az whunilh'en whe Isaac, Rebekah yughu dzedzi' whe yunulh'en.
'Et Abimelech Isaac, “'Anih!” yudani', “'Alha 'uhoont'oh whe ndun ts'eke n'at 'unt'oh 'ink'ez nts'en'a 'udini ‘Sulhtus 'unt'oh,’ dini?” 'Ink'ez Isaac 'uyulhni, “Doo ka sih ook'uz daoosah 'inka 'udusni.”
'Ink'ez Abimelech 'utni, “'Et dane'inla whe ne'inla? Nyoonne dune 'ilhoghun te da', nyoon n'at yuchan t'eoote' oole'! Njan lhe'hoont'oh-un 'et da' nek'eholts'it oole'.”
'Et Abimelech mbene la dudune'ne 'ubulhni, “Ndun dune k'us oo'at te oot'aizahnai de, datihtsah.”
'Et Isaac nyo yun k'ut 'a' nanla 'ink'ez yus k'ut ha'nanla. Lhai ha'nanla, 100 'et 'uwhultsuk, 'ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) soo hoonzoo-un yuba whulhtsi.
'Et ndun dune 'awet hoonzoo wheninle' 'ink'ez lhk'uz te whe tube hoonzoo suli'.
'Usbai 'i yulh lhai suli', musdoos 'i cha lhai whe yut'i suli', 'ink'ez hinatne'ut'en 'enne cha huldlai. 'Et whe Philistine whut'enne highe 'oolnih huzli'.
'Et nyoonne Philistinene nyo too dizdla-un 'uhuhoonla-un, ts'iyawh lhez buch'a 'ananuhulhkat, Abraham yuba 'ut'enne, 'enne hahuhonkai, Abraham khuna whe, 'ink'ez nyoonne sai dizbun whe 'ananulhkat.
'Ink'ez Abimelech, Isaac 'uyulhni, “Nech'a naindalh! Neanus 'ilhtus whe 'int'oh.”
'Et Isaac nyo huwu natisja 'ink'ez dzulh eguz, Gerar, 'et nimbali nenin'ai 'ink'ez 'et whut'i.
'Ink'ez Isaac doo cha nyo too k'et na'hoonla, mbe la oobá 'ulhuhoonla-un inle'-un. 'Oh da' ts'iyawh nyoonne Philistinene ts'iyawh lhez 'anunahulhkat inle'. 'Ink'ez ndai la nyo too dizdla-un oobá ye honzi'-un, whuz un'a hoozi' nawhulhtsi.
'Ink'ez Isaac yuba 'ut'enne nyo dzulh eguz ha huhonkai, 'et doo cha too unzoo hoonli-un 'et nahuhoon'ai.
'Et hoonts'i nyoonne Gerar whut'enne khuna ghunline, Isaac khuna' ghunline tube hube hududulh. Nyoonne Gerar whut'enne hutni, “Ndi too nech'e' 'unt'oh!” hutni, 'et nyo too k'et, 'et Esek yoozi', hiye dindil 'et huwa.
'Et doo cha 'udun too diz'ai-un 'uhuhoonla. 'Et nyo 'et cha hukwa lhehudindil, 'et cha hoozi' whulhtsi, Sitnah whulhni.
'Et nyo tizna 'ink'ez doo cha 'udun too k'et 'uhuhoonla. 'Et 'aw hukwa lhelhdulhyoh lhe'huditnelh 'et huwa, Rehoboth whulhni. 'Et 'utni, “'Andit njan Moodihti (Yahweh) hooncha neba whulhtsi, soo lhai cho la 'uts'ooleh ndi yun k'ut.”
'Ink'ez 'et whedinya ndo Beersheba ts'un whenya.
'Et 'ulhdzis za Moodihti (Yahweh) yunalhts'et hainya 'ink'ez 'utni, “Mbá Abraham ooYak'usda (Elohim) 'ust'oh. Whenilhjut iloh, nyulh 'ust'en 'ink'ez soo hoonzoo-un mba whutiselh 'ink'ez nts'u haindene cha lhane hutileh, ndun sba 'ut'en-un Abraham 'en gha.
'Et nyo loodel 'inla 'ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) yukahuyih 'ink'ez 'et nimbali nenin'ai. 'Et doo cha Isaac yuba 'ut'enne too k'et hahonkai.
'Et Abimelech yughu ninya keyoh Gerar ts'e hainya, ook'eke 'ilhoghun Ahuzzah huyulhi, 'ink'ez Phichol lhuganne bumoodih 'en tubulh.
'Ink'ez Isaac 'ubulhni, “'Et di ha sghu nuhdil, sts'u duhni 'ink'ez whenasuniyoot inle'?”
'Et hoonts'i uhuyulhni, “Soo ts'ih'un 'alha t'ets'onanzin Moodihti (Yahweh) nyulh 'unt'oh. 'Et' uts'utni, ‘Nats'uhooyeh nyun 'ink'ez wheni tubulh nats'uhooyeh,’ huyulhni.
'Aw hoonli hoontsi' hukw'un'a ne'onleh ait'oh, 'aw nt'alhts'inalh 'et huwa. Hoonzoo-un te za ne'unts'uyulh'en, dalhts'inelh whe za whenants'uyalh'a'. Moodihti (Yahweh) soo hoozoo-un ngha óonin'ai inli.”
'Et bughu nusuya 'ink'ez 'uhan'alh 'ink'ez tahitnai'.
'Et bunda' 'uda' duhudindil 'ink'ez lhts'unahuhisda whe Isaac 'un whenabalh'a 'ink'ez budzi dizghel whe whenahidil.
'Et nyoonne 'et dzin za Isaac yuba 'ut'enne, doo cha za too hoonli hahonkai 'ink'ez highu nindil 'ink'ez 'uhuyulhni, “Too k'et 'et 'uts'uhoonla!”
'Et nyo too k'et 'et Shibah whulhni, 'et huwa nyo keyoh whuti 'andit dzin whuts'un Beersheba huwhutni.
'Et Esau dit whinizyat (40) be yus k'ut whe ts'ekoo nane 'enne bughusda. 'Ilhoghun Judith, Beeri ootse', Hitt whut'en-un 'unt'oh, 'ink'ez Basemath, Elon, Hitt whut'en-un, 'en ootse' bulh.
'Ink'ez nyoonne ts'ekoo, Isaac 'ink'ez Rebekah bulh budzi hundulhda.
'Et 'uhooja Isaac duneti suli' 'ink'ez oona cha 'awet tetsun suli' whe, Esau, ooye' 'udetso-un 'en yuka' dani', “Sye',” yulhni. 'Et 'utni, “Njan 'ust'oh.” yulhni.
'Et 'utni, “Whunilh'en 'andit duneti susli', ndet dzin datisah-un 'aw t'eoonuzuszun.
'Andit whe sla'ineh, be 'uka 'int'en, k'aza zus, 'ink'ez k'aza bulh 'i tonla. 'Et tl'o k'uz ts'e tonya', 'ink'ez khuna-i sba ka' 'ont'en.
'Ink'ez nyoo ndai la oonust'i'-i, 'i sba 'inleh, 'ink'ez sts'u tonka', 'et de sih oos'alh. 'Et de sih szul be soo hoonzoo-un nts'un tizoo' datisah whutso.
'Et Rebekah yoozilhts'ai whe 'utni Esau bulh yalhduk, 'ink'ez Esau whenya 'uka' tit'elh ha 'ink'ez whusaitilelh.
'Et Rebekah 'en duye' Jacob 'uyulhni, “'Ilhiz soo oozolhts'ai' mbá 'en Esau 'uyulhni, njan ndi yulhni,
‘Silhghe-i sts'inlelh 'ink'ez nzoo-i sba 'inleh, tis'ulh ha datisah whutso Moodihti (Yahweh) oonalh 'et sih soo hoonzoo-un nts'un tiszoo'.’
'Et huwa sye' daja nyudusni la 'et soo zilhts'ai.
'Az inyalh 'ink'ez khuna-iyaz toh ts'e nanki dúbe uzkehyaz soo unzoo-i, 'i si mba 'oosleh, mbá oogha itankalh wheni, nts'en'a yoont'i', whuz un'a.
'Ink'ez ndi mbá oogha ininkaih 'ink'ez yoo'alh sih 'ink'ez datitsah whutso 'et 'en gha soo hoonzoo-un ngha hootalts'ulh.”
'Et Jacob ooloo Rebekah 'en 'uyulhni, “Whunilh'en sulhutsin Esau tube dughai whe 'unt'oh 'ink'ez 'aw si ndulhust'oh.
Ndun sbá ndi sla tila yukunudoolnih 'ink'ez nanis'a 'ink'ez sich'oh, sk'e hooyeh tila 'ink'ez 'aw soo hoonzoo-un sgha holts'it ait'oh.”
'Et hoonts'i ooloo 'uyulhni, “Whute ye nk'ehizya-i si sih sk'uz'ooneh! Sye', 'ants'i soo zilhts'ai 'ink'ez ndi khuna-iyaz sba ookainyalh!”
'Ink'ez ndi khuna-iyaz yilhchoot 'ink'ez duloo gha ininla 'ink'ez ooloo yuba yuzdliz, ndai la oobá ooba yinzoo-i.
'Et Rebekah duyaz 'udetso-un Esau, 'en oonaih k'us unzoo-i yoh yuzdla-i, 'i Jacob 'udek'oh-un, 'en ye yalhti.
'Ink'ez nyoo dúbe buzkeh oozuz 'i yula yugha iyozduz, oots'ilchun cha yugha iyozduz.
'Ink'ez nyoo yuzdliz-i 'ink'ez ut'alh-i cha 'i duyaz Jacob yutl'ayanla.
'Ink'ez dubá yuts'u yoozdla 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “'Ubá.” “Njan 'ust'oh. Sye', mbe inli whe 'int'oh?” ni.
'Et Jacob dubá 'uyulhni, “Nye', 'udetso whuzdli-un, Esau 'ust'oh. Daja sudani' la whuz un'a 'usja. Dudinyaih 'ink'ez njan sinda 'ink'ez ndi sisghi-i in'alh, 'et de sih nzul be soo hoonzoo-un sgha hoolts'it.”
'Et hoonts'i Isaac duye' 'uyulhni, “Sye', 'et nts'en'a 'a cho naindla 'i silhghi?” 'Ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Moodihti nYak'usda (Yahweh Elohim) 'en sgha ininla 'et huwa.”
'Et Isaac, Jacob 'uyulhni, “Njan szih neninyaih 'ink'ez sih nk'unudooznih, sye' 'alha Esau tila 'int'oh.”
'Et Jacob dubá Isaac yuzih neninya 'ink'ez yuk'unudilhni 'ink'ez 'utni, “Nyiz yailhduk, 'et Jacob ooyiz 'utni, 'et hoonts'i ndi nla 'i Esau oola 'unt'oh.”
'Ink'ez 'aw nalhuyóolts'ulh, nyoo oola dughai Esau oola k'un'a, 'inka soo hoonzoo-un be ubulh yalhduk.
Ink'ez 'utni, “'Alha eh sye' Esau 'int'oh?” “A,” yulhni.
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Szih nenin'aih nyoo sye' yanghan-i, 'i sih oos'alh 'ink'ez ndi szul be soo hoonzoo-un ngha hóotalts'ulh sih.” Yuzih neninkai 'ink'ez yan'al 'ink'ez ts'ekoo too' cha yugha nilhdzo 'ink'ez 'i cha yitnai'.
'Et oobá Isaac 'uyulhni, “Sye' szih neninyaih 'ink'ez nasudints'oos.”
'Ink'ez yuzih neninya 'ink'ez naidits'ooz 'ink'ez nyoo naih yunahoolhtsun 'ink'ez soo hoonzoo-un ootl'aookat, 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “'Alha soo ts'ih'un sye' 'aw hukw'un'a oonawhultsun, ndai la Moodihti (Yahweh) tl'o k'ut soo hoonzoo-un whulhtsih.
'Et huwa Yak'usda (Elohim) yak'uz nanaduldzoh-i, 'i ngha yolhdzeh 'ink'ez ndi yun k'ut ndai la nzoo-i ts'iyawh cha, hanuyeh cha 'ink'ez ts'ekoo too' cha lhai 'i ngha yolelh.
Dune cha nyunat ne'hoot'en 'ink'ez didohne cha mba nacha hunooldulh. Nyulhutsinke cha bumoodih onle', 'ink'ez nloo buzkeh, 'enne cha mbut nachahunooldulh. Mbene la nk'ehuyihne 'enne cha buk'ehoodeh, mbene la soo hoonzoo-un nts'un hutizoo', 'enne cha soo hoonzoo-un bugha hóotalts'ulh.”
'Et 'uhooja Isaac, Jacob yuba soo hoonzoo-un za ootl'aookat 'etsul 'udija, 'ink'ez Jacob 'awhuz n'az nalhtusdai, 'et Esau bulhutsin daninya ndai la yuka 'it'en-i bulh.
'En cha ndi t'alh-i nzoo-i 'uyinla 'ink'ez dubá yughu daininkai 'ink'ez dubá 'uyulhni, “Sbá dudoya' 'ink'ez ndi ooye' yuzilhghi-i yoo'alh, 'et la nzul be soo hoonzoo-un sgha hóotalts'ulh.”
'Ink'ez oobá Isaac 'uyulhni, “Mbe inli whe 'int'oh?” 'Et 'uyulhni, “Nye' 'ust'oh. Nye' 'udetso-un Esau.”
'Et Isaac soo tube cho 'et ditlut 'ink'ez 'utni, “Mbe 'uja khuna-i yuzilhghi-i 'ink'ez sghu daininkai? Ts'iyawh us'al dantanyalh whutso 'ink'ez 'en soo hoonzoo-un oots'un uszoo'. 'Ink'ez 'alha 'en soo cho oobulh 'uwhutat'elh.”
'Et Esau dubá ooghuni yudants'o whe soo 'ultus-un intse 'ink'ez dubá 'uyulhni, “Sbá si cha O sbá soo hoonzoo-un sghá holts'it!”
'Et hoonts'i 'uyulhni, “Nyulhutsin whunut'i' 'i be sghu daninya 'ink'ez ndi mba soo hoonzoo-un ngha hóotalts'ulh, 'i yilhchoot.
'Ink'ez Esau 'utni, “'Alha 'i be Jacob 'uyulhni, 'awet nat 'usinla, 'udechoo ndi sts'u oozinzi-i cha sghu yilhchoot 'ink'ez whunilh'en 'andit be soo hoonzoo-un sgha hóotalts'ulh, 'i cha yilhchoot!” 'Ink'ez 'utni, “'Aw eh 'uyoo soo hoonzoo-un sgha hóotalts'ulh sba lhint'ih?”
'Et Isaac 'en Esau 'uyulhni, “A, nyumoodih susi. Bulhutsinke 'enne cha hibut ne'tit'en whuzusi. Hanuyeh cha 'ink'ez ts'ekoo too' cha ts'iyawh 'i oogha inusla. Sye', ndet mba dawhutislelh'?”
'Ink'ez Esau dubá 'uyulhni, “Sbá, 'ilho soo hoonzoo-un za int'i eh? Sbá si cha O sbá soo hoonzoo-un sgha hóotalts'ulh!” 'Ink'ez Esau tube cho whenintse.
'Et Isaac oobá 'uyulhni, “Whunilh'en hoont'i-un ndi yun k'ut nzoo-i whutaleh, 'ink'ez ndo yak'uz naduldzoh-i 'i cha tant'elh.
Nla luzti 'i be hutanalh 'ink'ez nyulhutsin ooba 'utant'elh. 'Ink'ez 'uwhutanelh mba whe' hoont'oh hooloh suli' de, ndai la nts'ilchun ye yoontun-i k'utanyus.”
'Et huwa Esau, Jacob yuts'u dutni ndai la yube soo hoonzoo-un oogha whútilts'ulh, yilhchoot, 'ink'ez Esau dudziyo ts'e 'utni, “Sbá ook'eni whuntidleh-un 'awet nilhdukw, 'et de Jacob sulhutsin tuzisghelh.
'Ink'ez Esau ooghuni 'udetso ooyaz-un Rebekah hidani'. 'Et Rebekah Jacob 'anih yudani' 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “'Alha nyulhutsin Esau nyutuzilhghelh 'et whe hazih k'ena'dunit'ah.
'Et huwa syaz sghuni ook'oh ts'e 'ineh. Dudinyaih 'ink'ez sulhutsin Laban, Haran whut'i-un, 'en oots'ilgih.
'Ink'ez oozih sinda, 'atsulyaz nyulhutsin ye hunilch'e-i gak naoodleh sih.
Nyulhutsin ye hunilch'e-i nch'az na'ootneh, dainla la whunaoodilhnoh de, 'et sih nka nawhutoos'a 'ink'ez whusanaoonja'. 'Et di ha nyun cha nk'eni untisleh 'ilhudzin za?”
Rebekah 'en Isaac 'uyulhni, “'Awet tube be khúsna-un be nenisai, be khúsna-un be nenisai ndunne Heth butse'ke k'uz. Ndunne ndi yun k'ut whut'enne whutse' le'hint'oh. 'Et Jacob, 'en Heth butse' ghusda te, 'et dant'i whe be khúsna-un sba oole' ha?”
'Et Isaac, Jacob 'anih yudani' 'ink'ez soo hoonzoo-un yuba whulhtsi, 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “'Aw Canaan whuts'eke' 'ilhoghun, 'en n'at wheni olhchoot junih.
Dudinyaih 'ink'ez Paddan Aram, Bethuel ooyoh ts'e inyalh, nloo oobá, 'ink'ez 'et ts'eke n'at wheni ilhchoot, Laban buzkeh 'ilhoghun nloo bulhutsin.
Yak'usda 'Uk'enus 'Ultus-un 'Ust'oh (El Shaddai) soo cho-un cha mba hoonzoo-un ngha hóotalts'ulh 'ink'ez lhane hooleh dune huldlaine oohleh.
Abraham ye soo hoonzooo-un whusaínkat, 'i cha nts'un tookat, nyun cha 'ink'ez nts'u hahande nyulh 'uhint'oh 'enne cha. 'Et sih njan yun k'ut nohch'e' oole', 'et 'uts'un hoont'en inli. Njan 'et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en Abraham yugha óoni'ai inle'.”
'Et Isaac, Jacob wheyalh'a 'ink'ez yun k'ut Paddan Aram ts'e whenya, Laban, Bethuel ooye', Syria whut'en, 'en Rebekah bulhutsin Jacob 'ink'ez Esau buloo.
'Et Esau, Isaac, Jacob 'en soo hoonzoo-un ubulhni 'ink'ez wheyalh'a' yun k'ut Paddan Aram, oo'at yutaleh-un yolhchoot ha, 'ink'ez yuba soo hoonzoo-un whulhtsih whe 'et njan 'uyulhni, “Nyun Canaan whut'enne ts'ekoo butoh, 'enne n'at wheni olhchoot junih!”
'Ink'ez Jacob dubá yuk'oh ts'e 'uja, duloo cha yuk'oh ts'e 'uja, 'ink'ez yun k'ut Paddan Aram ts'e whenya.
'Ink'ez cha Esau, Canaan whut'enne whuts'ekoo dubá 'aw hukwa' alhe'nizun.
'Et Esau, Ishmael, Abraham ooye', 'en ts'u whenya, 'ink'ez Ishmael, 'en ootse' Mahalath, 'en du'at wheni yilhchoot. Ishmael ootse' Nabaioth, 'en bulhtus 'unt'oh, Mahalath, 'en cha oo'at yole', 'uyoonne oo'atke tubulh.
'Andit 'et Jacob 'en Beersheba whuz de hanaja 'ink'ez keyoh Haran ts'un whenya.
'Et 'utsun whenya 'ink'ez 'ulhdzis nduwhulhyiz whe 'et inda', sa yo whin'ai 'et huwa, 'ink'ez nyoo tse, 'et diz'ai-i 'ilho 'i yuk'ut tse nilh'ai nantitelh wheni.
'Et nusuti 'ink'ez whunilh'en, kw'ut dughaiti-i ndi yun k'ut whedin'a, ndo yak'uz ts'e whein'a, 'et Yak'usda (Elohim) oolizasne ndo cha whehudulh 'ink'ez nyo cha whenahudulh.
'Ink'ez whunilh'en ndo Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en usyin 'ink'ez 'utni, “Si Moodihti (Yahweh) Abraham ooYak'usda (Elohim) mbá cha 'ink'ez Isaac ooYak'usda (Elohim) cha 'ust'oh. Ndi yun ookw'ut sinti-i 'andit ngha tis'alh nts'u haindene cha.
'Ink'ez cha mbene la nts'u haindene ndi yun k'ut lhez lhe'unt'oh. Lhai whuz un'a hutildlai', noo' cha 'ink'ez nda' cha, whuz netihnelh, no cha, nyan 'ink'ez ntsu hainde-un cha, 'en gha ndi yun k'ut dilhts'ine, 'enne ts'iyawh soo hoonzoo-un bugha hóotalts'ulh.
Whunilh'en nyulh 'ust'oh, ntsoh te ninya te, nyulh 'utistelh 'ink'ez ndi yun k'ut nenyutastelh. 'Et 'awet nghu natisdulh datisnelh la nyudusni-un, 'et 'awhusla whuts'un.”
'Et Jacob ts'enandzut 'ink'ez 'utni, “'Alha la Moodihti (Yahweh) njan 'et usda 'ink'ez 'aw azi t'eoonuzuszun.”
'Ink'ez nuljut 'ink'ez 'utni, “Tube usla njan huwa 'it'en! 'Alha 'et Yak'usda (Elohim) ooyoh 'ink'ez njan 'et azi yak'uz ti ts'e whudatih!”
'Ink'ez Jacob 'uda' dudinya 'ink'ez nyoo tse yuk'utsenalh'a'-i, 'i nyo whedin'a yulhtsi, 'ink'ez khe yuk'eilhdzo.
'Ink'ez nyo 'et boozi' huwadin'ai, Bethel whulhni, 'et keyoh whutso da' 'et Luz huwhutni inle'.
'Et Jacob nahizya whe ndutni, “Yak'usda (Elohim) sulh 'unt'oh de, 'ink'ez ndiz un'a 'usilhdzun, 'ink'ez tisyalh ts'e ut'alh-i cha sgha ti'alh, 'ink'ez naih be dune tisleh-i cha,
'Et de sbá ooyoh ts'e soo ts'ih'un sdzi dizghel whe whuz natoosja', 'et de Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en sih Yak'usda (Elohim) sba oole'.
'Et ndi tse njan nadan'a k'un'a silhtsi, 'i Yak'usda (Elohim) ooyoh hole', 'ink'ez ndai sgha ninla, 'i whunizyai 'on 'un (10%) nts'un na'óotneh.”
'Et Jacob tizya ts'e whenya, nda' keyoh whut'enne bukeyoh ts'e oozya.
'Ink'ez whunalh'en 'ink'ez tl'o k'ut whuniz 'et too diz'ai 'ink'ez whunulh'en tawh didoh-i 'usbai, 'i nus ustez nyo too diz'ai-un 'et whutoo'-i higha huyulhdzoh, nyo too diz'ai-un too k'et whudah 'et ats'o tse diz'ai.
'Ink'ez nyoo 'usbai ts'iyawh nyo 'et 'ilho ulh'us 'ink'ez nyoo tse 'i ts'o sanahidunulhgih, 'ink'ez 'usbai too highalhdzoh, 'ink'ez nyoo tse 'et nenahidu'aih.
'Ink'ez Jacob 'ubulhni, “Sulhutsinke nts'ez de hahdil whe 'uht'oh?” 'Ink'ez 'uhutni, “Haran ts'e hats'andil.”
'Ink'ez 'ubulhni, “Nahor ooye', Laban, t'enuhzun eh?” 'Ink'ez 'uhutni, “T'ezninzun.”
'Et 'ubulhni, “Soo 'unt'oh eh?” 'Ink'ez 'uhutni, “Soo 'unt'oh 'ink'ez whunilh'en ootse' Rachel 'usbai bugha tatilhdzoh ha whuz de uyalh.”
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Whunulh'en 'awhuz dzetniz whenghoh, 'awhuz khuna-i 'ilhunahuyoontayulh 'ink'ez 'usbai cha higha tatilhdzoh 'ink'ez bugha' huti'alh-un cha.”
'Et hoontsi' 'uhutni, “'Aw 'et duts'ooneh ait'oh. 'Usbai tsi'yawh 'ilhunaoolh'az whutso 'ink'ez tse cha too k'et whusanahidunti lhgih, 'et de 'usbai oogha tats'ulhdzoh.”
'Awhuz yalhduk whe Rachel dubá be 'usbai bulh whusainanyoot, 'usbai ghunli-un ts'eke 'et huwa.
'Ink'ez 'uhooja Jacob, Rachel, Laban ootse', ooloo bulhutsin, yutilh'en whe 'ink'ez Laban be 'usbai, ooloo bulhutsin, Jacob 'et nyoo tse whusanaidunalhgai 'ink'ez ooloo bulhutsin Laban be 'usbai 'i yugha tanilhdzo.
'Ink'ez Jacob, Rachel naidits'ooz 'ink'ez tube cho whenintse.
'Ink'ez Jacob, Rachel yulhni, oobá oonadun 'ust'oh, 'ink'ez Rebekah ooyaz 'ust'oh, yulhni. 'Et Rebekah whelgai 'ink'ez dubá yudani'.
'Et 'uhooja Laban ndi khuni yudants'o Jacob, bulhtus ooyaz, whuz oolhgai 'ink'ez shih be' yilchoot, 'ink'ez naidits'ooz. 'Ink'ez duyoh dainilhti. 'Et Jacob Laban ndi ts'iyawh yudani'.
'Ink'ez Laban 'uyulhni, “'Alha syust'e 'ink'ez sts'un cha inli.” 'Ink'ez 'ilhoh sanun yuzih inda'.
'Et Laban, Jacob 'uyulhni, “Snadun inli, 'et huwa 'aw eh 'ants'i 'et sba' tant'elh? Sudini, daltsuk k'elha la 'int'en?”
Laban nane ootse'ke hoonli, 'udetso-un 'en Leah huyulhni, 'ink'ez 'udek'o-un 'en Rachel huyulhni.
Leah oona soo lhe'íltus, 'et hoonts'i Rachel tubeh soo 'ot'en.
'Et Jacob, Rachel yuk'entsi' 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Lhtak'antit whunizyat (7) yus k'ut 'et mba 'oost'en, Rachel 'udek'oh-un 'en k'elha.”
'Ink'ez Laban 'uyutni, “'Uyoon dune gha tistelh whutso, 'et 'onus soo' hoont'oh nyun ngha tistelh. Szih sinda.”
'Et Jacob lhtak'antit yus k'ut 'et Rachel yuk'elha 'it'en. 'Ants'i 'atsulyaz ooba le'hoont'oh, tube yuk'entsi' ket.
'Et Jacob, Laban 'uyulhni, “S'at sgha nilhtih, 'awet dzin lhaoodusla 'ink'ez la oost'e'.”
'Ink'ez Laban dune ts'iyawh oodune'ne 'ilhubozdla 'ink'ez dune ghu nusuya.
'Et 'uhooja 'et hulhgha dutse' Leah yilhchoot 'ink'ez Jacob ghi nilhti, 'en cha oo'at yuzdli'.
'Ink'ez Laban yuba 'ut'en-un, Zilpah huyulhni, 'en dutse' Leah yuba 'oot'en ha yugha inilhti.
'Et 'uhooja bundada' Leah ats'o 'unt'oh, 'ink'ez Laban 'uyulhni, “Dainja whe 'inja, whe' sinla? Rachel iloh lakw mba 'ist'en 'ink'ez di ha nasunan'a?”
'Ink'ez Laban 'utni, “Njan nekeyoh, 'aw 'udek'oh-un, 'en, 'udetso-un ootso dune gha buts'olhtelh ait'oh.
'Andit lisman lhaoodinleh, 'ink'ez ndun 'en cha 'ant'en hukw'elha ngha ts'oolhtelh. 'Ink'ez doo cha 'on 'un lhtak'ant'it yus k'ut, 'et sih sba 'ont'en.”
'Ink'ez Jacob 'et lisman lhaoodinla, 'ink'ez dutse' Rachel 'en cha oo'at yutaleh ha yugha inilhti.
'Ink'ez Laban, yuba 'ut'en-un ts'eke, Bilhah, 'en dutse' Rachel yuba 'oot'en ha yugha inilhti.
'Et Jacob, Rachel 'en cha oo'at yuzdli', 'ink'ez 'en Leah anus yuk'entsi'. 'Ink'ez Laban doo cha lhtak'ant'it (7) yus k'ut 'et yuba 'it'en.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh), Leah 'aw dune yuk'elhitsi' 'inka oochan yudaha'dan'ai, 'ink'ez Rachel 'en 'aw buzkeh hooloh.
'Et Leah ulchan 'ink'ez dune ooyaz suli'. Ruban 'i be yoozi 'ink'ez 'utni, “Moodihti (Yahweh) 'alha njan whe undusda-un whunalh'en, 'et huwa ski sk'eootsi' la.”
'Et doo cha za ulchan 'ink'ez dune ooyaz suli'. 'Ink'ez 'utni, “Dune sk'elhitsi', Moodihti (Yahweh) whudants'o, 'et huwa dune 'en syaz sgha inilhti.” 'Ink'ez 'en Simeon yulhni.
'Et doo cha za ulchan 'ink'ez dune ooyaz suli'. 'Ink'ez 'utni, “'Andit 'et la ski sk'eootsi' oole', 'awet tane ooye' susi 'et huwa.” 'Et huwa duneyaz boozi, Levi, yulhni.
'Ink'ez doo cha za ulchan 'ink'ez dune ooyaz suli'. 'Ink'ez 'utni, “'Andit 'et Moodihti (Yahweh) dutásti'!” 'Et huwa yoozi', Judah, yulhni. 'Et hukw'elh'az 'et 'awet buzkeh hoonli-un 'etsul 'uja.
'Et 'awet Rachel 'aw Jacob ts'oodunne yughalhilel t'eoonanzin, dulhtus 'en hukwa yughe 'oolnih 'ink'ez Jacob 'uyulhni, “Ts'oodunne sgha ninle k'us datisah!”
'Et Jacob, Rachel yulh hunilch'e 'ink'ez 'utni, “Si eh Yak'usda ook'edusda? Si 'unyusla 'aw nyuzkeh hole' ait'oh nyuzusi?”
'Et Rachel 'utni, “Ndun sba 'ut'en-un, Bilhah, 'en oozih sinti 'ink'ez la 'olhtsi, 'ink'ez sgwut k'ut da' ts'oodun 'ink'ez 'enne suzkeh hole', nghu bulhtsine.”
'Ink'ez Bilhah, Jacob gha inilti oo'at yole' ha 'ink'ez Jacob yuchant'inte'.
'Ink'ez Bilhah ulchan 'ink'ez Jacob duneyaz yughu yulhtsi.
'Et Rachel 'utni, “Yak'usda (Elohim) sba nahizya 'ink'ez syiz cha yudants'o 'ink'ez duneyaz, syaz oole' ha sgha inilhti.” 'Et huwa Dan yulhni.
'Ink'ez Rachel yuba 'ut'en-un, Bilhah, 'en doo cha 'ulchan, 'ink'ez Jacob bulh whulh nat-un ooye' ut'i.
'Et Rachel 'utni, “Sulhtus Leah bulh lhch'a 'oldeh hukwa 'it'en, soo 'iltus whe 'ink'ez si whucha' nusde.” 'Ink'ez nyoon ts'oodun Naphtali yulhni.
'Et Leah 'awet buzkeh hoonli-un 'etsul 'uja, 'et yuba 'ut'en-un, Zilpah, 'en Jacob oo'at yole' ha yugha inilhti.
'Ink'ez Leah yuba 'ut'en-un, Zilpah, Jacob duneyaz yughu sulhtsi.
'Et Leah 'utni, “Dune lhuganene 'az de hidulh!” 'Inka nyoon ts'oodun Gad yulhni.
'Ink'ez Leah yuba 'ut'en-un, Zilpah, whulhnat Jacob yughe 'ulhtsi, duneyaz ooyaz suli'.
'Et Leah 'utni, “Hoonúst'i', ts'ekoo 'enne soo hoonzoo-un sgha whults'ut-un sodoni' lah.” 'Ink'ez nyoon duneyaz Asher yulhni.
'Et Reuban ha'nuyeh-un whuz 'ut'en whe 'et nyoo 'ilho hanuyeh-i duchunyoo cha ootoh hoonli-i (nedoh k'oh ts'e mandrakes huyulhni) 'i ngha ininla 'ink'ez duloo Leah yughi ninla. 'Et Rachel, Leah 'uyulhni, “Nyoo nyaz ngha ininla-i, ooloh sgha ninle.”
'Et hoonts'i 'uyulhni, “Tube hoontsool-un 'inja ski ilhchoot ninzun eh? Doo cha syaz ndi mandrake sgha ininla-i, 'i cha sghi talhchulh hukwa' ninzun? 'Ink'ez Rachel 'uyutni, “'Andit 'ulhdzis ndi 'i k'elha, 'andit 'ulhdzis nzih tidalh.”
'Et Jacob hulhgha nus 'ut'en-un ts'e hanaja, Leah yududizya 'ink'ez 'uyutni, “'Andit 'ulhdzis szih onte', ndi syaz naininla-i mandrake, 'i k'elha.” 'Et 'ulhdzis yuchant'inte'.
'Ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) Leah yudants'o 'ink'ez ulchan, 'ink'ez Jacob whulh kwulane dune ooyaz suli'.
Leah 'utni, “Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en sba k'elhla whulhtsi. Sba 'ut'en-un, 'en ski butl'ayalhti 'et huwa.” 'Et 'en boozi' 'i Issachar yulhni.
'Ink'ez Leah doo cha ulchan 'ink'ez Jacob bulh lhk'utan-un ooye' suli'.
'Et Leah 'et 'utni, “Tube Yak'usda (Elohim) hoonzoo-un sgha oonin'ai. 'Awet 'andit ski szih la ooda', lhk'utane dune ooghu susi.” 'Ink'ez nyoon ts'oodun Zebulun yulhni.
Et hukw'elh'az ts'eke ooyaz suli', 'en Dinah yulhni.
'Awet Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en Rachel yunalnih 'et neoodelhdzut 'ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en yoozalhts'ai whe oochan 'ants'i yudaha'dan'ai le'yinla.
'Ink'ez ulchan whe dune ooyaz suli'. 'Et 'utni, “Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en sba yooya 'i n'un na'yinla.”
'Ink'ez 'en Joseph yulhni, 'ink'ez 'utni, “Moodihti (Yahweh) doo cha sih 'uye' sugha oolhtelh.”
'Et 'uhooja Rachel, Joseph sulhtsi hukw'elh'az Jacob, Laban 'uyulhni, “Nasalh'alh, sich'oh whust'i-un skeyoh ts'e whuz si natoosja.
S'atke cha 'ink'ez suzkeke cha buk'elha 'ist'en, 'ink'ez slanaditnih, daja la mba 'ist'en 'et t'eooninzin.”
'Ink'ez Laban 'en 'uyulhni, “'Et sinda, mba uszoo de! T'eooniszin 'awet nyun ngha Moodihti (Yahweh) soo hoonzoo-un sgha oonin'ai.”
'Ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Daltsuk k'elha 'utant'elh-un sudini 'ink'ez la ngha oos'alh.”
'Ink'ez Jacob 'uyulhni, “T'eooninzun nts'en'a la mba 'ist'en 'ink'ez nghuna' 'i cha ghosle'.
Nghu tisyalh whutso tube ntsool-i int'i inle', 'andit ts'iyawh 'onus lhai suli'. Moodihti (Yahweh) soo hoonzoo' mba whulhtsi, si nghu nusya whuts'un 'ink'ez nkede sich'oh syoh dilhts'ine buba' tistelh.”
'Et 'uyulhni, “Di ngha tis'alh?” 'Ink'ez Jacob 'utni, “'Aw hoonli sgha lhtuzan'a. Njan 'et dusinleh, 'et de doo cha sih nghuna' cha ghosle' 'ink'ez oogha 'oos'aih.
'Andit dzin nyoo int'i-i, ts'iyawh ootununoosta'. Ndai la ookw'e'nizdla-i ts'iyawh 'usbai 'i cha 'udun neooslelh, 'ink'ez dulba-i cha 'usbaiyaz toh 'i cha ts'iyawh, 'ink'ez dúbe ootoh 'i cha ookw'e'nizdla-i, 'i ts'iyawh 'udun neooslelh 'i k'elha 'ist'en whutaleh.
'Et de nts'en'a la whe tsih'un 'ust'oh-un, 'et la t'eoonoodzeh. Ndai la ook'elha mba 'ist'en-i, doo cha ooghu yatalduk de, ndai la dúbe ookw'ulhe'niloh-i 'ink'ez 'usbai dulba-i cha 'i ts'iyawh nghu hidunist'i oole' sih, sba whuz un'a 'uhoont'oh.”
'Et Laban 'utni, “'Et whuz un'a ncha nghuni k'un'a 'uhooja.”
'Et dzin Laban 'en dune dúbe ookw'e'nizdla-i 'ink'ez ts'eke dúbe ookw'e'nizdla-i cha, lhyul-i ook'ut ut'en-i 'ink'ez ndai la dulba-i usbaiyaz toh, 'i ts'iyawh duye'ke bugha ininla.
'Et Laban tat dzin 'uwhuldzoh Jacob yuch'a suya 'ink'ez Jacob nyoo Laban ooghuna' ts'iyawh bube ulh'alh.
'Ink'ez Jacob t'ughus duli-i 'ink'ez nyoo duchun almond 'ink'ez chesnut huyulhni, 'i yudilhchoot oot'ooz yuk'eitilhchul 'ink'ez nyo dulyul suli'.
Nyoo duchun yuk'e'tilhchul-i, 'i nyo 'usbai dilhts'i-un yananuyuz sih, ndet la tatnai-un, 'et de sih nyo yuzih nyoo duchun tatnai de oolchan.
'Et nyo yuzih nyoo duchun tatnai te, 'et ulchan ts'iyawh, 'et nyo ts'iyawh 'usbai ook'e'nizdla 'ink'ez lhyul-i bulh 'uts'un 'ot'en.
'Et Jacob nyoo 'usbaiyaz ts'iyawh 'udun nebuninla, 'ink'ez nyoo 'usbai 'on yoghi Laban ooghuna' ts'iyawh lhelhts'un 'ot'en ookw'e'nizdla te 'unt'oh, whuntilh'eh wheni. 'Ink'ez didutch'oh ooghuna' 'i 'udun nebuninla 'aw Laban ooghuna' yutalhuyilel.
'Et 'uhooja ndet la nyoo k'us ulhtus-i khuna-i ulchan te, nyoo duchun 'uyinla-i, 'i nyoo khuna-i yubut neidinla, 'et de nyo duchun ootoh 'et oolchan 'inka.
'Et hoonts'i nyoo khuna-i tetsun de, kwa nyoo duchun yuzih nelhubilel. Ndai la tetsun-i, 'i Laban ooghuna' 'unt'oh, 'ink'ez ndai la lhtus-i, 'i Jacob ooghuna' 'unt'oh.
'Et dune tube hoonzoo' 'unt'oh suli'. Ndai la khuna yut'i-i lhai suli'. Ts'ekoo 'ink'ez dune yuba 'ut'enne cha 'ink'ez nyoo khuna-i camel huyulhni, 'i cha 'ink'ez donkey huyulhni, 'ohwhi cha lhai suli'.
'Et Jacob, nyoonne Laban buzkeh yalhulhduk budants'o, njan nduhutni, “Jacob ndai la 'ubá ooch'e' ts'iyawh yilhchoot 'ink'ez ndai la 'ubá ooch'e' 'i be hoonzoo' 'unt'oh suli'.”
'Ink'ez Jacob, Laban oonin yutilh'en 'aw whutso da' yuts'un unzoo-un k'un'a ilhoh yunilh'en.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) Jacob 'uyulhni, “Mbá ooyun k'ut ts'e naindalh, nyunch'oh nyunatneke butoh ts'e 'ink'ez nyulh 'utist'elh.”
'Et Jacob, Rachel 'ink'ez Leah bulh nus 'ut'en ts'e khuna-i cha 'et dilhts'i whuz buka' dani',
'Ink'ez 'ubulhni, “Mbá oonin nus'en whutsoda' hukw'un'a ilhoh sulhnilh'en, 'et hoonts'i sbá ooYak'usda (Elohim) 'en sulh 'ant'e'.
'Ink'ez t'eoonuhzun ndet 'ust'oh-un 'et nohbá oonat ne'zust'en.
'Et hoonts'i nohbá nasunan'a 'ink'ez kw'elha 'ust'en-i cha 'uts'un un'a na'hoonla, whunizyat at'en 'et hoonts'i Yak'usda (Elohim) 'aw mbá sundolhdah whuch'a sghunli.
Nja dutni de, ‘Ndi ookw'e'nizdla-i ook'elha 'utant'elh,’ 'ink'ez khuna-i uzkehyaz ts'iyawh ookw'e'nizdla. 'Ink'ez nja dutni de, ‘Ndai la lhents'un-un 'ot'en-i ts'iyawh ook'elha 'utant'elh,’ 'ink'ez nyoo khuna-i uzkehyaz ts'iyawh lhents'un 'ot'en.
'Et whe Yak'usda ndai la mbá ooghuna' ts'iyawh yilhchoot 'ink'ez sgha ininla.
'Et 'uhooja ndet la ndi khuna-i ulchan whe ndo yutas'en 'et 'ink'ez nususti 'ink'ez whunulh'en dúbe dune nyoo 'usbai ye k'eilhuk ts'iyawh nyoo ook'e'nizdla 'ink'ez ooka dulgi be nodelhgus.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) oolizas sulh yatilhduk nuste whe 'ink'ez 'utni, ‘Jacob,’ 'et 'udusni, ‘Njan 'ust'oh.’
'Ink'ez 'usulhni, ‘Do yutin'en 'ink'ez nyoo dúbe dune 'usbai yuk'eilhuk ts'iyawh lhelhts'un 'ot'en 'ink'ez ook'e'nizdla cha 'unt'oh. Nus'en Laban danyalh'en la ts'iyawh whunus'en 'et huwa.
Bethel whuYak'usda (El) 'en 'ust'oh. Ndet da' tse whedintsi'-i soo 'inla 'ink'ez sts'un nahuzinya 'awet dudinyaih 'ink'ez njan keyoh whuch'a nasindaih 'ink'ez nyunatneke bukeyoh ts'e naindalh.”’
'Et Rachel 'ink'ez Leah bulh hiyulh yatilhduk 'ink'ez 'uhuyulhni, “'Awhuz tole 'ubá ooch'e' 'ink'ez neba yootazilh-i cha neba hoonli?
Wheni cha 'uts'un keyoh neninzun 'ink'ez neye'onket 'ink'ez nezooniya gak yulhtsi.
Ndai be hoonzoo' hoont'oh-i Yak'usda (Elohim) 'ubá yughu yilhchoot, 'i ts'iyawh nech'e' 'unt'oh neuzkehne ba cha, 'et 'andit Yak'usda (Elohim) daja nyulhni la 'et whuz un'a 'et ndoneh.”
'Et Jacob dudinya 'ink'ez duye'ke 'ink'ez du'atke cha 'enne ts'iyawh nyoo camel k'ebinla.
'Ink'ez ndai la khuna-i yut'i-i 'ink'ez oogha ininkat-i cha, njan keyoh Paddan Aram ndi khuna-i oogha ininkat-i, oobá Isaac, Canaan keyoh ts'e, whuz whe naja.
'Et Laban nus 'usbai hatit'us whe 'et Rachel ndai la nyo yoh ba 'uk'eltsi hits'u tenadudli-i, oobá ooch'e', 'i ts'iyawh yundunist'i.
'Ink'ez Jacob whenanil'i', 'aw Laban t'eoonuszun yuch'a nintanatilgih-un, 'aw lhidinel.
Ndai la yuti-i ts'iyawh bulh dudinya 'ink'ez 'ukoh yaninya nts'e la yun k'ut Gilead whudzulh, whuz whenaja.
Whutat dzin-un 'et 'andit ts'iya Laban hidani' Jacob whenatselya.
'Et dulhutsinke dulh hubutilhdil 'ink'ez huyuntizyoot. Lhtak'ant'it dzin la hidulh 'ink'ez Gilead whudzulh toh 'et yutasuya.
'Et hoonts'i 'uldzis 'et Laban, Syria whut'en-un, nusuti whe Yak'usda (Elohim) be hóodiltsai 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Huwa'oonli Jacob bulh yatalhdih te, hoontsi' te k'us hoonzoo k'un'a te bulh yaoolhduk junih.”
'Et Laban, Jacob yut'asuya nyo Jacob nimbali nenin'ai dzulh toh, 'ink'ez Laban dulhutsinke tubulh nyo 'et nimbali nehunin'ai Gilead whudzulh whutoh.
'Ink'ez Laban Jacob 'uyulhni, “Daint'en whe 'int'en whe nanalh'i'? T'eoonuzuszun whe 'ink'ez stse'ke cha 'ants'i 'ulhnane hubilhchoot saluzti be k'un'a.
Di ha 'inja snanto 'et whenatseilya? Soo hoonust'i' 'ink'ez shun be tubulh da', be ts'ujun-i cha nanyutoos'a' oole'.
'Aw sye'ke 'ink'ez stse'ke cha 'aw nalhubudusts'oos? 'Et whe tube whuzini whe 'inja 'et ndinja!
Soo 'ustus whe 'ust'oh nyunduntasdoh wheni. 'Et hoonts'i mbá ooYak'usda (Elohim) 'ulhdzis da' sulh yailhduk 'ink'ez 'usulhni, ‘Huwinli 'aw ts'ih'un un'a 'uhoont'oh k'us hoonts'i' hukw'un'a te Jacob bulh yaoolhduk junih.’
'Et 'andit 'alha mbá ooyoh kw'eni inli 'inka whenainja. 'Et hoonts'i di ha nyoo 'uk'eltsi ts'u tenadusdli-i, ts'iyawh 'i dunint'i?”
'Et Jacob 'uyulhni, “Whenuzjut 'et huwa 'usja. 'Et 'udusni, ‘Doo ka la ntse'ke nut'i be sgha hanabolyelh,’ dusni.
Ndun nyak'usda bulh nainla, khun hoona' junih. Nyulhutsinke bunalh ndai la nch'e' nusle-i, ts'iyawh nahuyolts'it 'ink'ez nailhchoot!” 'Aw Jacob t'eoonuszun Rachel dubá ooyak'usdane yundunist'i-i.
'Ink'ez Laban, Jacob oonimbali t'ah ts'e whenya, 'ink'ez Leah oonimbali t'ah cha nane yuba 'ut'enne ts'ekoo bunimbali t'ah cha, ts'iyawh nusuya 'ink'ez gak, 'aw nalhe'ileh 'ink'ez Leah oonimbali t'ah tenanja 'ink'ez Rachel oonimbali t'ah daninya.
'Et whutsoda' Rachel nyoo oobá 'uk'eltsi yuts'utenadudli-i yilhchoot, 'ink'ez ndi camel yuk'usda-i, 'i ookw'uyuz'ai-i, 'i ye yanla 'ink'ez yuk'etl'adida'. 'Ink'ez Laban dulcho nimbali t'ah nuniztai 'ink'ez 'aw nalhuyilel.
'Ink'ez dubá 'uyulhni, “Khun te smoodihti whuts'un dooni' junih, 'aw mbut dudosya' ait'oh, whuz un'a ts'ekoo 'et nduhoont'oh nek'un'a 'ink'ez nuniztai.” 'Ink'ez gak 'aw nyoo 'uk'eltsi yuts'u tenadudli-i nalhuyilel.
'Et Jacob hunilch'e 'ink'ez Laban hukwa yidani' 'ink'ez Jacob Laban 'ulyuhni, “Ndet whe tank'us 'usja ha sdabe soo hunilch'e whe suntinyoot?
'Et ndinja, snaih toh whe dulcho nunintai. Dant'i nyoh usla 'i nainla? 'I njan nohbut neninle sih, sulhutsin 'ink'ez nyun, nyulhutsin bunalh! 'Et 'enne sih neba nahooyeh nyun 'ink'ez si bulh!
Nat whunizyat (20) yus k'ut whuts'un nyulh 'ist'en, 'usbai ts'eke 'ink'ez dúbe ts'eke, 'aw 'ilhoh hoonts'i lhuhiyat 'ink'ez 'usbai dune cha 'aw lhus'ulh.
Ndai la khuna-i yayidalhch'ulh-i, 'aw ntl'a lhuslel ts'iyawh ook'elha whuzusi, mba k'elha susi-i slak'et whe ntl'a us'ai, dune yudunist'i tila k'us 'ulhdzis tila hidunist'i ts'iyawh.
'Et 'ust'oh dzenis whunulwus, chan yit cha 'ink'ez 'ulhdzis cha yaootullhuk 'ink'ez 'aw lhustoh.
Nyoh nat whunizyat (20) yus k'ut 'et 'ist'en, whunizyat 'on 'at dit (14) yus k'ut 'et ntse' buk'elha 'ist'en, 'ink'ez lhk'utat (6) yus k'ut cha ndi khuna-i cha ook'elha 'ist'en. Whunizyat (10) 'et ook'elha 'ust'en-un lhelhts'un un'a na'hoonla.
Sbá ooYak'usda (Elohim) 'ink'ez Abraham ooYak'usda (Elohim) 'ink'ez Isaac be nuzjut-un sulh 'uhoont'oh de, 'et de soo ts'ih'un 'aw slak'et hoonli hooloh whuda' nasutolh'a' oole'. Yak'usda (Elohim) ndet la hukw'endusda-un 'ink'ez sla be 'ist'en-un ts'iyawh hon'en 'ink'ez 'ulhdzis da' hukwa' nyudani'!”
'Ink'ez Laban, Jacob 'uyulhni, “Ndunne stse' 'uhint'oh 'ink'ez bubuzkeh cha suzkeh 'uhint'oh, 'ink'ez ndi khuna-i cha sch'e' 'unt'oh. Ndai la nilh'en-i, ts'iyawh sch'e' 'unt'oh, 'et daoosneh subah stse'ke k'us bubuzkeh te?
'Et huwa 'anih khuni 'olneh, nyun si bulh daja datni' lah, 'et t'eoonodzin.”
'Et Jacob tse 'ilho dilhchoot 'ink'ez 'et neidin'ai.
'Et Jacob dulhutsinke 'ubulhni, “Tse nadulhdzooh 'ink'ez tse nahadalhdzoo' 'ink'ez lhk'ehidinla.” 'Ink'ez nyo tse ook'ut 'et na'hit'al.
Laban nyoo tse 'uwhulhni, “Jegar Sahadutha,” 'et hoonts'i Jacob 'en “Galeed,” whulhni.
'Et Laban 'en 'utni, “Ndi tse lhk'udizdla-i, 'i nyun si bulh khuni 'ilya-i, 'i oonalh 'uhoont'oh.” 'Et huwa Galeed hidoni'.
Mizpah 'i cha 'et njan 'uwhulhni, 'et huwa ndutni, “Moodihti (Yahweh) nyun, si bulh ne-eguz nenilh'en lhch'oh 'it'oh te cha.
Stse' dzoh nubilhdzut de, k'us 'uyoonne 'atke te ilhchoot de, 'et hoonts'i Yak'usda 'en nyun, si bulh ne-eguz hoonilh'en whe' hoont'oh.”
'Et Laban, Jacob 'uyulhni, “Ndi tse lhk'udizdla-i, 'i 'ink'ez njan nain'a-i cha nyun, si bulh ne-eguz 'usla-i.
Ndi tse lhk'udizdla-i, 'i t'eooninzun 'ink'ez ndi nain'ai-i cha t'eooninzun ndi 'aw ba n'un toosya' ait'oh 'ink'ez nyun cha ndiz un'a 'on 'un tonya' ait'oh lhunduntaldah hukwa.
Abraham ooYak'usda (Elohim), Nahor ooYak'usda (Elohim) 'ink'ez bubá buYak'usda (Elohim) cha, 'en ne-eguz nahotiyeh.” 'Ink'ez Jacob dubá, k'us mbe ye nuljut-un, 'en 'i be nahizya.
'Et Jacob nyoo dzulh k'ut 'et khuna-iyaz dalhk'un 'ink'ez dulhutsinke 'uhoo'alh hubulhni. Nyoo ut'alh-i han'al 'ink'ez 'ulhdzis dulyiz whe dzulh k'ut 'et hudalts'i'.
'Et bundada' 'et 'uda' Laban dudinya 'ink'ez duchaike, dutse'ke tubulh nabudits'ooz, 'ink'ez soo hoonzoo-i za butl'aookat 'i be soo hoonzoo-un be ubulh yalhduk 'ink'ez whenaja, 'ink'ez duyoh ts'e whenaja.
'Et Jacob whenya nts'e tizya ts'e 'ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) oolizasne hidudizdil.
'Et hubutilh'en whe 'utni, “Njan 'et Yak'usda whut'i-un 'uhoont'oh,” 'ink'ez nyo hoozi' 'et Mahanaim whulhni.
'Et Jacob dutso khuni nu'ane 'enne dulhutsin Esau whuz whe balh'a', yun k'ut Seir huwhutni-un Edom keyoh.
'Ink'ez 'ubulhni, “Smoodih Esau nja dudohni', ‘Nyunatne 'uten-un Jacob nja dutni, “Laban 'en 'oozih hoost'e' 'ink'ez 'et usda 'andit whuts'un.
Khuna-i lhai ust'i, musdoos cha, donkey cha, 'ink'ez dune 'ink'ez ts'ekoo sba 'ut'enne cha, hoonint'i' whe la son'en 'inka nts'un whebis'a'.”’
'Et nyoonne nukhuni nu'ane Jacob highu nandil 'ink'ez 'uhuyulhni, “Nyulhutsin Esau ooghuznindil. Didut cha ndiz nyudutiyalh, dit whunizyat whunizyat (400) 'et 'enne dune hiyulhtidulh.”
'Et Jacob tubeh nilhjoot 'ink'ez huwuni suli', dudune' ts'iyawh nawh hidulh whe lhk'ebanla, ndai la khuna-i 'ink'ez musdoos cha ts'iyawh nyokhi camel 'i cha nawh ukulh whe lhk'eyanla.
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Esau njan 'ilhoh udulhne bughu ninya 'ink'ez whe buninghan de, 'onghuni 'udun ulh'usi 'ila yuch'a nintaoolhghas.”
'Ink'ez Jacob 'utni, “O sbá Abraham ooYak'usda (Elohim), sbá Isaac ooYak'usda Moodihti (Elohim Yahweh) 'usulhni, ‘Nkeyoh ts'e naindalh 'ink'ez nyunatneke buts'un 'et whuz hoonzoo whe 'utanelh mba ootiselh’.
'Aw sgha te'ninzun 'ink'ez ts'ih'un khuni be cha sulh yailduk, 'i aw soo ba lhe'uzdzoo' whe 'ust'oh. Mba 'ut'en-un whunilhtan njan 'ukoh Jordan yanusya ndai la stuz cha nustun 'ink'ez nawh udulhne ts'uzdli'.
Nts'u tenadusdli sulhuts'in Esau, 'en oola 'i ch'a. 'En be nuzjut doo ka sih ndiz sghu ninya 'ink'ez seooya' 'ink'ez suzkeh buloo tubulh.
'Usudini inle', ‘Hoonzoo mba ootiselh sudini inle'. Mbene la nts'u haindene yatooba sai 'et 'uhultsuk, 'aw butsolhto ait'oh butalhtselh.”’
'Et 'ulhdzis nyo 'et hantez 'ink'ez ndai la yula k'eyankat-i, 'i dulhutsin Esau yuts'i yilhdulh.
Nat whunizyai whunizyai (200) ts'eke dúbe, 'ink'ez nat whunizyai (20) dune dúbe, 'ink'ez nat whunizyai whinizyai (200) 'i 'usbai ts'eke, 'ink'ez nat whunizyai (20) 'usbai dune cha.
Tat whunizyai (30) nyoo camel uljas-i ooyazke cha, dit whunizyai (40) musdoos, 'ink'ez whunizyai (10) musdoos dune, nat whunizyai (20) donkey ts'eke, whunizyai (10) buzkeh cha.
'I nyokhi yuba 'ut'enne tl'ayanla dich'oh whe 'ink'ez yuba 'ut'enne 'ubulhni, “Senghoozuhdilh 'ink'ez nilhdza' beguz whuzdla whe ndi whuz nihyulh khunai uh'ulh whe.”
'Ink'ez 'udechoo khuni yutl'ayan'ai 'uyulhni, “Ndet la sulhutsin Esau nohdudizya 'ink'ez nohoodulhkut de, ‘Mbe ch'e' uhli whe 'uht'oh?’ nohulhni de, 'ink'ez, ‘Nts'e tihdil?’ ni de, ‘Mbe ooch'e' 'unt'oh ndi nohtso usdla-i?’
'Et 'udoohni', ‘Mba 'ut'en-un Jacob ooch'e' unt'oh. Oomoodihti Esau ts'otl'ayanla, 'ink'ez whunilh'en 'udek'oh nehuniyalh.”’
'Et 'ulhnane bulh nat, bulh tane cha 'ink'ez khuna-i yunidulhne 'ubulhni, “'Et whuz un'a Esau bulh yatilhduk nalhti de.
'Ink'ez 'et cha ndudoohni', ‘Whunilh'en nyunatne'ut'en Jacob 'en nek'oh uyalh.’ 'Et 'uninzun, “Ndi stso ulh'us, 'i bugha ininla 'ink'ez 'et hukw'elh'az oonin nilh'en de, 'et de sih soo sulh neho'alh.”
'Et huwa ndi yuts'i tilhdil-i yutso 'uja, 'et hoonts'i didut nyo 'et 'ulhdzis 'et nimbali nenin'ai 'ink'ez 'et hantez.
'Ink'ez 'et 'ulhdzis dudinya 'ink'ez du'at nahult'oh cha, buba 'ut'enne cha 'ink'ez whunizyane 'on 'at 'ilhune (11) ooye'ke cha, 'et nyo yahunindil 'ukoh.
'Enne hubilhchoot 'ink'ez 'ukoh whuyaz yahunindil, ndai la yuts'i tilhdulh-i cha.
'Et Jacob dich'oh za 'et nelts'ut 'ink'ez Dune bulh nulhuhulte, 'et 'ulhdzis nduhoolhyiz yukaih whuts'un.
'Et nyoon Dune t'eooninzun 'aw Jacob ch'a lhe'ilhdoh, 'et nyoon Dune Jacob bulh nulhuhulte whe Jacob ook'i lhghu nawhudulhghuz-un, 'et yut'aiznai 'ink'ez 'et nyoo Jacob ook'i 'i k'ulkut.
'Ink'ez ndun Dune, 'en 'et 'utni, “Slanadintnih 'awet hoot'en.” 'Et hoonts'i 'uyulhni, “'Aw nlanadoosnih ait'oh soo hoonzoo-un bulh 'usinla 'andit za.”
'Et 'uyulhni, “Ndai la nyoozi'?” 'Ink'ez 'utni, “Jacob.”
'Et 'utni, “'Aw nyoozi' on 'un Jacob lhunyodutasnel. Israel nyo dutanelh. Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en bulh nulhuzilti', dune cha, ink'ez 'enne buch'a' nilhde.”
'Et Jacob yoodulhkut, “Nts'u tedusdlih, nyoozi' 'i sudini?” 'Ink'ez 'et 'utni, “Di ha soozi 'i ooka 'oodilhkut?” 'Ink'ez 'awet whe soo hoonzoo-un oogha whults'ut.
'Ink'ez Jacob nyoo boozi, “Penuel,” whulhni, “Yak'usda soo oonin ts'e us'en 'ink'ez 'aw dalhusnel,” ni 'et huwa.
'Et soo nyo Penuel yaninya whe 'et sa hain'ai 'ink'ez nunulk'i suli'.
'Andit dzin whuts'un Israel oots'u haindene, 'enne nyoo 'uk'i ts'eh tsung 'aw lhuhayus'al, ndun Dune ook'i yut'aiznai 'et huwa, 'ink'ez nyoo oots'eh sugi suli'.
'Et Jacob ndo yutan'en whe dulhutsin Esau 'az de uyalh yutilh'en, dit whunizyai whunizyat (400) dune 'et 'uhultsuk, 'enne hiyulh udulh whe 'et duduzkeh lhk'ebanla, Leah cha, Rachel cha 'ink'ez nyoonne nane buba 'utenne cha butabuninla.
'Ink'ez ndune ts'ekoo yuba 'utenne 'ink'ez ts'oodunne cha dubut nebuninla 'ink'ez Leah duduzkeh te ooniz de nebuninla.
'Et whe butso neninya 'ink'ez yubut nachaniti, lhtak'ant'it 'et yubut nachaniti 'et dulhutsin yuzih neninya.
'Et hoonts'i Esau 'az de tilhgai, yududilhgai 'ink'ez yilhchoot 'ink'ez yuts'ilchun k'et 'et naidits'ooz 'ink'ez nahult'oh hantse.
'Ink'ez ndo yutan'en, 'et nyoonne t'sek'oo 'ink'ez ts'oodunne te, 'enne butilh'en 'ink'ez utni, “Ndunne 'enne mbene whe' hint'oh?” 'Et 'uyulhni, “Yak'usda (Elohim) ye unzoo-i gha mba 'ut'en-un bugha buninla 'uhint'oh.”
'Et nyoonne ts'ekoo natne'ut'enne 'ink'ez ts'oodunne tubulh nus hutizdil 'ink'ez yubut yo 'untutsulh.
'Ink'ez Leah cha duduzkeh tubulh hibut nenindil 'ink'ez hibut yo 'untutsulh, 'et hukw'elh'az Joseph 'ink'ez Rachel bulh hizih nenin'az, 'enne cha hibut yo untizsel.
'Et Esau 'utni, “Daja ninzun whe ndi lheltsuk-i nyulh 'uhint'oh?” 'Et 'uyulhni, “'I bududisya, 'et de la soo cho sunolh'en smoodih.”
'Et hoonts'i Esau 'utni, “Soo 'ultsuk-i ust'i sulhutsin, ndai la int'i-i nyunch'oh int'i.”
'Et Jacob 'utni, “'Awundooh! Slaineh, 'andit 'awet soo sunalh'en, 'et de ndi nts'u tisdil-i ilhchoot ndet la nyis'en whe 'ants'i Yak'usda (Elohim) oonin nus'en sba le'hoont'oh 'ink'ez tubeh hoonint'i' whe sunilh'en.
Ndi soo hoonzoo-i sgha whults'ut ngha nus'ai-i ilhchoot, Yak'usda (Elohim) tube sts'un nzoo inle' 'ink'ez ts'iyai lhai ust'i.” 'Et doo cha 'uyulhni, 'inka yilhchoot.
'Et Esau 'utni, “Dugwe' 'awet uztoodilh 'ink'ez ntso sih natoosja'.”
'Et hoonts'i Jacob 'en 'uyulhni, “Smoodih t'eooninzun ts'oodunne tehutsun, 'ink'ez ndi khuna-i whulukhi be 'udulhtuk whe 'unt'oh, 'i cha sulh 'unt'oh, 'ink'ez dune tube 'ilhudzin hiniyulh de nyoo khuna-i yaoodlah lah.
Whute smoodih! Stso inyalh, mba 'ut'en-un ootso inyalh, 'ink'ez ndune butso toosya' sih nanilhtsulya, khuna-i cha 'ink'ez ts'oodunne cha, ndet la buba soo' hoont'oh-un 'ink'ez smoodih keyoh Seir 'et la ooghosya'.”
'Ink'ez Esau 'utni, “Ndunne sulh nudilhne, oolohne nzih neboslelh.” 'Et hoonts'i 'utni, “Smoodih, 'awundooh, soo' hoont'oh! Soo cho sunoolh'en sih.”
'Et Esau 'et dzin whenaja keyoh Seir whuts'un.
'Ink'ez Jacob keyoh, Succoth huwhutni, ts'e whuz hoozdil. Yoh 'uhoonla 'ink'ez khuna-i ba cha dilhts'i-un 'uhoonla, 'et huwa nyo 'et 'andit Succoth huwhutni.
'Et Jacob soo dalhinel whe nyo keyoh whuti, Shechem huwhutni, whuz oozya, Canaan yun k'ut 'et whuz'ai Paddan Aram ts'e hainya, 'ink'ez nyo keyoh whuti 'et yoo 'az ts'e dunimbali nenin'ai.
'Ink'ez nyo nimbali nenin'ai-un yun, 'i Hamor buzkeh 'enne bubuyonket. Shechem oobá, whunizyai whunizyat (1000) sooniya 'i k'elha.
'Et nyo loodel 'inla 'ink'ez El Elohe Israel whulhni.
'Et Dinah, Leah ooyats'e, Jacob ghu yulhtsi inle'-un, nyo ts'ekoo nyoh whut'ine, 'oh whut'ine, 'enne buts'u tizya
'Ink'ez Shechem, Hamor ooye', nyo keyoh lerwe ye' unli, yutilh'en whe yilhchoot 'ink'ez yuchant'inte' 'ink'ez ninta' yunilh'en.
Oozul tubeh nyoon Dinah ooba yinzoo, Jacob ootse', 'ink'ez tube yuk'entsi' 'ink'ez soo cho yulh yalhduk.
'Et Shechem dubá Hamor yulh yalduk 'uyulhni, “Ndun ts'ekeyaz 'en s'at tileh wheni sba ilhchoot.”
'Et Jacob whulh 'udants'o yutse' Dinah ninta' yunilh'en, 'et whulh 'udants'o 'et nyoonne ooye'ke nus khuna-i bulh 'uhut'en 'ink'ez Jacob 'aw whusanahidil whuts'un lhubudinel.
'Et Hamor, Shechem oobá, Jacob yughu ninya yulh yatilhduk huba.
'Ink'ez Jacob ooye'ke nus 'uhut'en whe whuz de hanahidil 'ink'ez whulh 'uhudants'o tube buba dzoh suli' 'ink'ez honilch'e. Lhe'hoont'oh whe k'un'a hukwaya hoonli 'uja, Israel ootse' yuchant'inte', 'aw nduhoneh huba lhe'hoot'oh.
'Et hoonts'i Hamor bubulh yalhduk 'ink'ez 'ubulhni, “Sye' Shechem oozul ntse' tube yuk'eni unli oo'at yutaleh wheni oogha inilhtih.
'Ink'ez nebulh lhgho dolhts'i'. Ntse'kene 'enne negha buninle 'ink'ez wheni netse'ke 'enne hubilhchoot.
'Et de sih nezih hooht'e' 'ink'ez nyo yun cha 'et us'ai, 'i k'ut hoont'i 'ink'ez hoohket 'ink'ez 'e'oohket. Te'aht'en 'ink'ez nohnich'oh eni nohgha 'oozit sih.”
'Et Schechem 'en cha Dinah oobá 'ink'ez bulhutsinke 'enne 'ubulhni, “Nohba uszoo oole'. Daja suduhni-un 'et la nohgha ooslelh.
Daltsuk ha'nuhzun 'ink'ez nohts'u tisdulh-i. Daja duhni daltsuk-i 'ink'ez ndun ts'ekeyaz s'at tileh huba sgha nulhtih.”
'Et hoonts'i Jacob ooye'ke Shechem 'ink'ez Hamor bulh 'ubuhutni 'ink'ez whunut'ih 'i be bubulh yahulhduk, nyoon dudulhtus Dinah ninta' inilh'en 'inka.
'Ink'ez 'ubuhutni, “'Aw 'et duts'ooneh ait'oh, 'aw neulhtus 'aw yuka dune lhitus-un gha ts'oolhtelh ait'oh. Wheni neba hukwaya hoonli whe' hoont'oh.
'Et njan 'ilhughun huwa 'et de a'ah usdutinelh nek'un'a 'utant'elh, dune ts'iyawh yuka dune unli-un hubotitus.
'Et de la netse'ke nohgha buts'olelh 'ink'ez nohtse'ke hubuts'italhchulh 'ink'ez nohzih ts'otitelh 'ink'ez 'ilhoghun yinka dune'ne uztileh.
'Et 'aw lhunedahts'il de, 'ink'ez nohka dune uhli-i nohuzt'us de, 'et de ndun neulhtus nats'italhchulh 'ink'ez naztidulh.”
'Et ndi khuni 'i tube buba yinzoo Hamor 'ink'ez ooye' Shechem 'en cha.
'Et nyoon chilh 'ahoh 'et duja nyoon Jacob ootse' ooba yinzoo 'inka 'onus huwa 'it'en-un 'uja oobá ooyoh dilhts'ine buba nus.
'Ink'ez Hamor 'ink'ez Shechem ooye' te nyo keyoh whudatih 'et nehunindil 'ink'ez nyo keyoh whudune'ne bubulh yahulhduk.
“Ndunne dune nebulh soo dune hinli whe' hint'oh, 'et huwa njan yun k'ut huhoot'e' 'ink'ez 'uhooket te'hoot'en, ndi yun soo 'ulcho whe 'unt'oh. Butse'ke 'enne buts'olhchoot ne'atke wheni, 'ink'ez wheni netse'ke bugha buts'olelh.
Njan 'ilhoghun 'et za nduts'uja te, 'andit za dune neulh dune hutileh, whe 'ilho ts'utileh. 'Et ndun nedune 'enne ts'iyawh hika dune unli 'i ook'ut ts'oot'us, 'et didut ts'iyawh nduhint'oh.
Ndi bughuna' huyut'i-i cha 'ink'ez khuna-i ts'iyawh nech'e' tileh? 'Ants'i a'ah uzdoonih 'et de la nebulh dune hoole'.”
'Et nyo keyoh whuti tenindilne ts'iyawh Hamor, Shechem bulh ooye', hubodants'o, dune ts'iyawh yuka dune unli-i bubuhuzt'us, nyo keyoh tenindilne.
'Et 'uhooja whulh tat dzin ts'iyawh bubulh 'ults'ulh, nane Jacob ooye'ke Simeon 'ink'ez Levi bulh Dinah bulhutsin, saluzti huyilhchoot 'ink'ez soo ts'et 'et nyo keyoh whuti dune ts'iyawh hubuhanghan.
'Ink'ez Hamor 'ink'ez Shechem ooye', 'enne cha saluzti be bubozilhghi 'ink'ez Dinah Shechem ooyoh 'et tenahinilhti 'ink'ez tenahundil.
Jacob ooye'ke ndunne huba hanghanne buzih nehunindil 'ink'ez nyo keyoh cha ts'iyai hilhchoot, bubulhtus ninta' hinilh'en 'et hukwa.
'Et nyoo dude'usbai, musdoos dune cha 'ink'ez khuna-i donkey cha, 'ink'ez nyo keyoh usla-i cha nus yun k'ut usla-i cha ts'iyawh huyilhchoot.
'Ink'ez huye hoonzoo' 'unt'oh-i cha ts'iyawh huyilhchoot. Ntsoolneyaz 'ink'ez bu'atke cha hubuhilhchoot, 'ink'ez ndai la yoh usla-i cha ts'iyawh huyilhchoot
'Et Jacob 'en Simeon 'ink'ez Levi 'en ndo 'ubulhni, “Tube sba dzoh 'uhja! Ndunne dune ndoh whut'ine buba skalh'ehunizun suli'. Canaan whut'enne 'ink'ez Perizz whut'enne, tube wheni ts'intsool whe' ts'int'oh, ts'iyawh 'ilhohozdil 'ink'ez la sch'az nehudindil 'ink'ez la sozoolhghelh. Gak sotilhtselh syoh whut'ine cha, si cha.”
'Et hoonts'i 'uhutni, “Neulhtus 'ants'i 'ul'enne k'un'a ne'uztilh'en?”
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en Jacob 'uyulhni, “Dudinyaih 'ink'ez Bethel ts'e inyalh 'ink'ez 'et hont'e' sih. 'Ink'ez Yak'usda (El) nyunalh hainya inle', 'en ts'un loodel 'onleh, nyulhutsin Esau ooch'a tse tilya whe.”
'Et Jacob, yulh dune unline yulh whut'ine, 'et 'ubulhni, “Nyo 'udun keyoh lhelhyoo 'uyak'usdane buts'u tenaduhdli, 'udun nenuhle, nohtsun hooloh nadudulhtsih 'ink'ez nohnaih cha lhk'enaduhle.
'Ink'ez duzdodilh, 'ink'ez Bethel ts'e uztoodilh. 'Et Yak'usda (El) ts'un loodel 'oosleh sih, mbe la dzin dzoh nuzut-un sulh 'ut'en whe whesya.”
'Ink'ez nyoo 'uts'un keyoh whut'enne, dant'i 'uk'eltsi yak'usda hitsun tenadudli-i nuhuyule-i, 'i ts'iyawh Jacob tl'ahuyanla, 'ink'ez dudzo gwul cha ts'iyawh 'ink'ez Jacob nyo duchun, oak huyulhni, 'i yucheh 'ahuyanla.
'Ink'ez nahutisdil 'ink'ez Yak'usda oonujut-i, 'i ts'iyawh nyo keyoh whuti bukeidilts'ut, 'aw Jacob ooye'ke lhubontiyulh.
'Et Jacob 'et Luz (Bethel huwhutni-un) whuz oozya, Canaan yun k'ut mbene la yulh nudilhne cha ts'iyawh.
'Ink'ez 'et loodel 'inla, 'ink'ez nyo 'et El Bethel whulhni, 'et Yak'usda nghu ninya inle', bulhutsin ch'a tse tilhya whe.
'Et Deborah, Rebekah yuba ne'ut'en-un, dazsai. Nyo Bethel 'on yo nyoo duchun oak ndi 'i hicheh 'ahuyalhti. 'Et Allon Bacuth huwhutni.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) Jacob doo cha yunalhts'et hainya, whutso da' Padan Aram ts'e hainya whe soo hoonzoo-un oogha whults'ut.
'Ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) 'uyulhni, “Nyoozi' Jacob ts'utni, 'aw 'on 'un Jacob be nts'iyozi' ait'oh, Israel 'i nyoozi' tileh.” 'Et whe boozi' 'i Israel yulhni.
'Ink'ez 'et cha Yak'usda (Elohim) 'uyulhni, “Si Yak'usda 'Uk'enus 'Ultus-un (El Shaddai) 'en 'ust'oh. Lhai cho nts'u haookat 'ink'ez lhai cho oole' didohne 'ink'ez dune didohne ts'iyawh 'enne nts'u hahutidoh, 'ink'ez lerwene 'enne nyust'e ts'u hahutidulh.
Yun Abraham 'ink'ez Isaac bulh bugha inus'ai-i, 'i ngha nus'ai. Nts'u haindene nk'elh'azne, ndi yun nohgha nus'ai.”
'Et whe Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en ndo yuch'a whenaja, nts'e yulh yailhduk inle' 'et.
'Et Jacob tse whedintsi Yak'usda (Elohim) bulh yailduk-un, tse lhk'eidinla-i 'i nayantsi. 'Ink'ez ts'utnai-i 'i ook'ut 'i yuk'eyilhdzo 'ink'ez khe cha yuk'eyilhdzo.
'Ink'ez nyo 'et Yak'usda yulh yailhduk-un, Bethel whulhni.
'Et hutizdil Bethel whuch'a usdil 'ink'ez Ephrath 'awet nilhdukwyaz, 'et Rachel 'awet ooyaz whutaleh bulh 'utilhtsul 'ink'ez tube ooba hoontsi'.
'Et 'uhooja bulh 'ults'ulh whe nyoon yughunli-un 'uyulhni, “Wheniljut ilhoh, ndun 'en cha dune nyaz tileh.”
'Et 'uhooja 'awet dawhenintsai whe 'et ndun duneyaz Ben-Oni yulhni, 'et hoonts'i oobá 'en Benjamin yulhni.
'Et Rachel dazsai 'ink'ez Ephrath ts'u wheti-un ('et Bethlehem 'uhoont'oh), 'et 'ahuyalhti.
'Ink'ez tse lhk'edinla nyo yunts'un k'ut, 'et 'andit dzin whuts'un Rachel oots'un k'ut huwhutni.
'Et Israel tizya 'ink'ez Eder whuzih nain'a zih, 'et dunimbali neinin'ai.
'Et 'uhooja Israel nyo yun k'ut hoot'e' whe Reuban 'en Bilhah nyoon oobá oo'at 'en yugha nyus 'unt'oh, 'en yuchant'inte' 'ink'ez Israel whulh 'udants'o. 'Ink'ez Jacob ooye'ke ts'iyawh whunizyane 'on 'at nane hinli.
Leah ooye'ke, 'enne Reuben, Jacob 'udechoo ooye', 'ink'ez Simeon, Levi cha, Judah, Isaachar 'ink'ez Zebulun.
Rachel ooye'ke, 'enne Joseph 'ink'ez Benjamin.
Bilhah ooye'ke, Rachel yuba 'ut'en-un, Dan 'ink'ez Naphtali.
Zilpah, Leah yuba 'ut'en-un, ooye'ke dune Gad 'ink'ez Asher hubuhutni. 'Enne ts'iyawh Jacob ooye'ke, Paddan Aram whut'i whe.
'Et Jacob, dubá Isaac, yughu ninya. Mamre k'ut Kirjath Arba huwhutni, (Hebron 'uhoont'oh), ndet la Abraham 'ink'ez Isaac bulh huhoot'en-un.
'Et Isaac 'en 180 yus k'ut yinka inda'.
'Et Isaac 'udek'ez hanaji 'ink'ez dazsai, 'ink'ez whutsoda' hubulh 'ant'e'ne, 'enne buts'un whenya. Tube duneti 'ink'ez lhat dzin cha be yus k'ut. 'Ink'ez ooye'ke Esau 'ink'ez Jacob bulh 'ahuyalhti.
Ndi 'i Esau ts'u haindene ghun, Edom huyulhni.
Esau ts'ekoo Canaan whut'enne but'oh 'enne du'at eni hubilhchoot. Adah 'en Elon ootse', Hitt whut'en-un 'unt'oh, Aholibamah, Anah ootse' Zebeon, Hiv whut'en-un 'en ootse',
'ink'ez Basemath, Ishmael ootse', Nabajoth bulhtus.
'Et Adah, Eliphaz yulhtsi, Esau ghu yulhtsi 'ink'ez Basemath, Reuel sulhtsi.
'Ink'ez Aholibamah, Jeush sulhtsi, Jalam 'ink'ez Korah cha, 'en Esau ooye'ke, Canaan yun k'ut whut'i whe.
'Et Esau du'atke, duye'ke, dutse'ke 'enne mbene la yuyoh whut'ine, ts'iyawh musdoos cha 'ink'ez khuna-i, ndai la yut'i-i oogha ininde-i Canaan okhi yilhchoot 'ink'ez dulhutsin Jacob yughu whenya.
Ndai la huyut'i-i sdabe 'onus lhai suli', 'aw lhzih huhoot'e' ait'oh 'ink'ez nyo yun t'ehonuszun-un huwhut'i-un 'et cha 'aw nahult'oh hik'uhuna-i 'uhoolh'en ait'oh, khuna-i lhai huti k'et.
'Inka Esau 'en Mt Seir 'et whut'i, Esau 'en Edom 'unt'oh.
'Ink'ez ndi 'i Esau ts'u haindene Edom whut'enne bubá, Mount Seir huwhut'i.
Ndi 'i Esau ooye'ke buboozi', Eliphaz, Adah ooyaz Esau oo'at 'ink'ez Reuel, Basemath, Esau oo'at cha.
'Ink'ez Eliphaz ooye'ke, 'enne Teman, Omar, Zepho, Gatam 'ink'ez Kenaz.
'Et Timna 'en Eliphaz oo'at 'en yugha nyus 'unt'oh, 'en Esau ooye', 'ink'ez 'en Amelek yughu sulhtsi, 'enne Adah, Esau oo'at buzkeh.
Ndunne 'enne Reuel ooye'ke: Nehath, Zerah, Shammah 'ink'ez Mizzah. 'Enne Basemath Esau oo'at buzkeh.
Ndunne 'enne Aholibamah ooye'ke, Esau oo'at, Anah ootse', Zibeon ootse'. 'En Esau, Jeush, Jalam 'ink'ez Korah 'en yughu bulhtsi.
Ndunne 'enne Esau ooye'ke moodih hubuhilh'i, Eliphaz ooye'ke, Esau 'udechoo ooye' inle', 'en dayi Teman, dayi Omar, dayi Zepho 'ink'ez dayi Kenaz,
dayi Korah, dayi Gatam 'ink'ez dayi Amalek. 'Enne Eliphaz oodayi hinli, Edom yun k'ut. 'Enne Adah oots'u hainzutne 'uhint'oh.
Ndunne 'enne Reuel ooye'ke, Esau ooye': dayi Nahath, dayi Zerah, dayi Shammah ink'ez dayi Mizzah. 'Enne Reuel oodayi Edom yun k'ut ndunne 'enne Basemath Esau oo'at buzkeh.
Ndunne 'enne Aholibamah Esau oo'at buzkeh: dayi Jeush, dayi Jalam 'ink'ez dayi Korah 'enne Aholibamah ts'u hahande Esau oo'at, Anah ootse'.
Ndunne 'enne Esau ooye'ke Edom 'unt'oh, 'ink'ez ndunne 'enne budayi hanle'.
Ndunne 'enne Seir, Hor whut'i-un ooye'ke 'enne ndi yun k'ut huwhut'i: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon 'ink'ez Anah,
Dishon, Ezar 'ink'ez Dishan. 'Enne Hor whut'enne budayi, Seir ooye'ke Edom yun k'ut.
'Ink'ez Lotan ooye'ke: 'enne Hori 'ink'ez Heman, Lotan bulhtus 'en Timna huyulhni.
Ndunne 'enne Shobal ooye'ke: Alvan, Manahath, Ebal, Shepho 'ink'ez Onam.
Ndune 'enne Zibeon ooye'ke: Aiah 'ink'ez Anah bulh, ndun Anah 'en 'uja chunt'oh duba donkey nulhyeh whe too k'et nahoon'ai.
Ndunne Anah buzkeh: Dishon 'ink'ez Aholibamah, Anah ootse'.
Ndunne 'enne Dishon ooye'ke: Hemdan, Eshban, Ithran 'ink'ez Cheran.
Ndunne 'enne Ezer ooye'ke: Bilhan, Zaavan 'ink'ez Akan.
Ndune 'enne Dishan ooye'ke: Uz 'ink'ez Aran.
Ndune 'enne Hor whut'enne whudayi: dayi Lotan, dayi Shobal, dayi Zibeon, dayi Anah,
dayi Dishon, dayi Ezer, 'ink'ez Dishan, 'enne Hor whut'enne whudayi hinli, Seir yun k'ut 'et.
'Et ndunne 'enne lerwene Edom yun k'ut 'et hudalts'i', 'aw Israel buzkeh whutsoda'ne bulerwe hooloh.
Bela, Beor ooye' Edom 'et whulerwe inle', 'et nyo keyoh whuti 'et Dinhabah huwhutni.
'Ink'ez Bela dazsai whe Jobab, Zerah, Bozrah whut'en-un ooye', 'en lerwe inle' yuk'edanya.
'Et Jobab dazsai whe Teman whut'enne bulerwe Husham huyulhni, 'en yuk'edanya.
'Et Hasham dazsai whe Hadad, Bedad ooye' 'en la Midian neninya whe whelhonigan Moab yun k'ut, ha'nuyeh-un, whe hubuch'a' nilhde, 'en yuk'edanya nyo 'et keyoh Avith huwhutni.
'Et Hadad dazsai whe Samlah, Masrekah whut'en-un, 'en yuk'edanya.
'Ink'ez Samlah dazsai whe Saul, Rehoboth-'Ukoh-Taba whut'en-un, 'en yuk'edanya.
'Et Saul dazsai whe Baal-Hanaan, Achbor ooye' 'en yuk'edanya.
'Et Baal-Hanaan, 'Achbar ooye', dazsai whe Hadar 'en yuk'edanya. Nyo 'et keyoh 'et Pau huwhutni. Oo'at boozi' 'i Mehetabal, Matred ootse' 'en Mezahab ootse' 'unt'oh.
Ndi 'i Esau oodayine buboozi' nts'en'a lah didohne 'ink'ez huwhut'ine buboozi': dayi Timnah, dayi Alvah, dayi Jetheth.
dayi Aholibamah, dayi Elah, dayi Pinon,
dayi Kenaz, dayi Teman, dayi Mibzar,
dayi Magdiel, 'ink'ez Iram. 'Enne Edom whudayi 'ink'ez nyo yun k'ut huwhut'ine 'ink'ez buch'e' cha, Esau 'en Edom whut'enne bubá 'unt'oh.
'Et Jacob nyo Canaan yun k'ut 'et whut'i 'et 'aw oobá t'enuszun.
Jacob nts'oh tune'ust'en: Joseph 'en whunizyat 'on 'at lhtak'ant'it be yus k'ut (17) 'et nus khuna-i gha' un'aih dulhutsinke tubulh, bubulh 'ut'en nyoonne bulhutsinke 'enne Bilhah buzkeh 'ink'ez Zilpah buzkeh cha, oobá oo'atke, 'enne bubulh 'ut'en 'ink'ez Joseph dubá 'en yulh nahoolnuk tank'us ne'hut'en huwun.
'Et Israel, Joseph 'onghunne duzkeh buba nus yuk'entsi'. 'Udek'oh ooye' 'ink'ez duneti whe ooye' yuzdli' 'et huwa, 'ink'ez dzoot yuba 'inla, lhelhts'un 'ot'en-i 'i dzoot yuba' yinla.
'Et bulhutsinke dalcho-i be la bubá Joseph yuk'entsi' huwhunilh'en, 'inka hits'u dutni 'ink'ez 'aw soo cho hiyulh yalhulhduk.
'Et Joseph nusuti 'ink'ez dulhutsinke bubulh nahoolnuk. 'Et 'onus hits'u dutni suli'.
'Et 'ubulhni, “Ndi oowanususti-i oozulhts'ai.
'Et ats'o nus lhes hananyai-i, 'aw lhdunilt'o whe be ne'ts'udulhch'uz 'ink'ez ndi lhadusla-i 'i ats'o do 'uja 'ink'ez ants'i usyin le'unt'oh, 'ink'ez be ne'dilhchus-i nohch'e' 'i ndi lhadusla-i 'i hinadilhya 'ink'ez hibut yo untutsulh.”
'Ink'ez bulhutsinke 'et 'uhuyulhni, “Nelerwe tanleh whe 'udini 'ink'ez nemoodih tanleh whe 'udini?” 'Et ts'o 'onus hits'u dutni nute-un huwa 'ink'ez ooghuni cha huwa ts'iyawh hits'u dutni.
'Et doo cha 'udun huwunusuti 'ink'ez dulhutsinke hubudani' 'ink'ez 'utni, “Whunulh'en doo cha 'udun huwunususti. 'Andit ndi dzenis ooza' 'ink'ez 'ulhdzis ooza' cha 'ink'ez whunizyai 'on 'at 'ilho sum, 'i cha sbut yo 'uhuntutsulh.”
'Et dubá yudani' 'ink'ez dulhutsinke cha budani' 'ink'ez oobá hukwa' yundani' 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Dainja whe 'inja? Ndiz un'a nusinti nloo 'ink'ez si cha 'ink'ez nyulhutsinke ts'iyawh mbut yo untitsulh whe' dini?”
'Ink'ez bulhutsinke highe 'oolnih 'ink'ez oobá 'en 'ants'i huwu nuninuzut za 'unt'oh.
'Et bulhutsinke bubá ooghuna' Shechem ts'e higha' ti'alh ha whuz whehandil.
'Ink'ez Israel, Joseph 'ulhni, “Nyulhutsinke Shechem ts'e whuz khuna-i gha' hu'aih. 'Anih whuz nyutoos'a sih!” 'Et 'uyulhni, “A, njan susda.”
'Et whe Israel 'uyulhni, “Sla 'ineh whe, inyalh nyulhutsinke soo 'uhint'oh whe, khuna-i cha soo 'unt'oh whe, 'ink'ez khuni 'i whuz sba naton'alh.” 'Et whe njan Hebron whenkoh 'et wheyalh'a' 'ink'ez Shechem ts'e whenya.
'Et 'uyoon dune Joseph nayilhti 'ants'i nus 'et ats'o nus lhelhts'oyalh 'ink'ez dune 'uyulhni, “Di huninta whe 'int'en?”
'Et utni, “Sulhutsinke bukunusta whe 'ust'en. Sudini nts'e suba khuna-i gha' hun'aih.”
'Et dune 'utni, “'Utsun whehandil whe' hint'oh. ‘Dothan nts'ez uztoodilh,’ hutni whe 'et hubudasts'o.” 'Et Joseph whuz buba whenanya 'ink'ez Dothan 'et nabinla
'Et 'az de uyalh hitilh'en whe lhahodinla hituzilhghelh-un.
'Et 'ulhodutni, “Nyoon nute-un 'az de uyalh.
'Et huwa 'andit ts'uzoolhghelh 'ink'ez tsak'et 'ats'ooneh! 'Ink'ez la 'uzdooni', ‘Khuna-i yellhoh,’ uzdooni' la, huwunute-un dahoneh subah!”
'Et hoonts'i Reuban budants'o 'ink'ez bula k'ehayalhti 'ink'ez 'utni, “'Aw lhts'uzoolhghelh.”
'Ink'ez Reuban 'ubulhni, “'Aw buzkaih hoolhtselh junih! 'Ants'i njan tsak'et 'et 'atsoolhtelh, chunt'oh 'uhoont'oh, 'aw ootalhizohnal.” 'Et de la yoolhyih 'ink'ez dubá ts'un naitoolhtelh, 'inka 'utni.
'Et 'uhooja Joseph dulhutsinke bugha ninya whe nyoo dzoot huye hayalhti, nyoo dzoot lhelhtsun 'ot'en-i.
'Et huyilhchoot 'ink'ez nyo tsak'et 'et 'ahuyano, nyo tsak'et 'aw too hooloh.
'Ink'ez natl'ahudilts'i' 'uhuti'ulh wheni, 'et do hitan'en whe 'az de Ishmael whut'enne 'az de hidulh, Gilead ts'e hahandil. Camel dunt'i-i khuna-i cha ts'iyawh bulh, bulh buta'whut'en-i, lhai cha huyilelh, 'ink'ez balm 'ink'ez myrrh huyulhni, ndunt'i-i cha Egypt ts'e huyutizdla.
'Et Judah dulhutsinke 'ubulhni, “Di suba negha ookat neulhutsin ts'uzilhghi 'ink'ez buzkai' ts'untilh'i de?
'Anih nyoonne Ismael whut'enne 'az de udulhne, 'enne be buts'e' ts'oket, 'aw kw'elhts'udolhni, neulhutsin 'unt'oh, 'ink'ez neyust'e cha unli.” 'Et bulhutsinke huyoozalhts'ai'.
'Et ndunne Medianne 'ooketne 'owhuya hidulh, 'et bulhutsinke Joseph nyo tsak'et hanahuyalhti 'ink'ez nyoonne Ismail whut'enne, 'enne nat whunizyai (20) silver, 'i k'elha huye 'onket 'ink'ez nyoonne Joseph huyilhchoot 'ink'ez Egypt ts'e whehuyalhti.
'Et Reuban nyo tsak'et whuz naoosja 'ink'ez Joseph 'aw nyo tsak'et hooloh, 'et dunaih yayidalhch'ul.
'Ink'ez dulhutsinke bughu nanja 'ink'ez 'utni, “Duneyaz 'awet hooloh suli'! Nts'e subah toosya?”
'Et nyoo Joseph oodzoot huyilhchoot 'ink'ez dúbe ntsool-iyaz, 'i hizilhghi 'ink'ez nyoo dzoot 'i buzkaih hiye tunahuyulhchooz.
'Et ndi dzoot lhelhts'un 'ot'en-i, 'i bubá hits'u nahuyoolhchooz 'ink'ez 'uhutni, “Ndi nats'ilhchooz nye' oodzoot tila 'unt'oh k'us 'awundooh tilah?”
'Et nayoolhts'it 'ink'ez 'utni, “Sye' oodzoot 'unt'oh! Khuna-i 'ants'i yellhoh, 'aw nawh lhe'hoot'oh Joseph yabe' yidalhch'ul.”
'Et Jacob dunaih yayidalhch'ul 'ink'ez doso 'i duts'itoh nayuzguz, 'ink'ez duye' lhatdzin whe yuk'eninudleh.
'Et ooye'ke 'ink'ez ootse'ke cha ts'iyawh k'enahino'ah kwa' hut'en. 'Et hoonts'i 'aw k'enahino'ah ait'oh 'ink'ez 'utni, “Nyo sts'un k'ut ts'e tisyalh, sye' ook'eni untislelh.” 'Ink'ez oobá yuk'etso.
'Et nyoonne Median whut'enne, yun k'ut Egypt ts'e, nyoon Potiphar huyulhni, 'en ts'un huye 'onket. 'En Pharaoh lhuganne moodih, nyo huwunline bumoodih cha unli.
'Et owhuya whudizulh whe Judah dudulhutsin bughu tizya 'ink'ez dune Adullam whut'en-un, Hirah huyulhni, 'en yughu hato ts'e whenya.
'Et nyo Judah Canaan whut'en-un, 'ilhoghun ootse', 'en yunilh'en, Shua huyulhni, 'ink'ez yughusda 'ink'ez yuchant'inte'.
'Et ulchan 'ink'ez duneyaz sulhtsi 'ink'ez boozi' Er yulhni.
Doo cha za ulchan 'ink'ez doo cha za dune ooyaz suli'. 'Et boozi' Onan yulhni.
'Et doo cha za ulchan 'ink'ez duneyaz ooyaz suli'. 'En boozi' Shelah yulhni. Chezib keyoh huwhutni-un, 'et nyoon ooba 'et 'ut'en whe yulhtsi.
'Et Judah duyaz 'udetso-un, 'en ba ts'eke yughu tidalh ha yilhchoot. Ndun ts'eke boozi' Tamar huyulhni.
'Et hoonts'i Judah ooye' 'udetso Er, 'en Moodihti (Yahweh) bunalh whe ninta' 'ut'ih, 'ink'ez Moodihti (Yahweh) 'en Er yuzilhghi.
'Ink'ez Judah 'en Onan 'uyulhni, “Nyulhutsin oo'at ilhchoot 'ink'ez ooghu sinda, 'ink'ez nyulhutsin yuk'edutiyalh-un oole' sih.”
'Et Onan t'eooninzun 'et ndun-un ts'oodun hotileh de, 'en 'aw didut ooyaz lhiloh. 'Ink'ez Er ndai yut'i 'i 'aw oogha ílhtaskulh. 'Et huwa 'et njan duhooja whe hukw'elh'az dulhutsin oo'at ts'un daninya whe yuchantinte'. 'Ink'ez ooch'a 'uhooja, 'i yun k'uz ts'e whenluz, dulhutsin yuba ts'oodun tit'elh whuch'a.
'Ink'ez njan 'et duja-un, Moodihti (Yahweh) tube whuts'u dutni 'inka 'en cha yuzilhghi.
'Et Judah duyas'at Tamar 'uyulhni, “Mbá ooyoh 'et sinda 'ink'ez tsandilh za inli, ndun sye' Shelah untiyeh whuts'un.” 'Ink'ez 'utni, “Doo ka sih dulhutsinke k'un'a daootsah.” 'Ink'ez Tamar dubá ooyoh ts'e whuz whutitelh ha whenya.
'Et whe nduhooja hukw'elh'az Shua ootse', 'en Judah oo'at, 'en dazsai 'ink'ez Judah k'enahinu'ah. 'Ink'ez be 'usbai hat'asne buts'un keyoh Timnah 'et, didut 'ink'ez yulh dune Hirah, 'en Adullam whut'en, 'en bulh, ndo whuz whe han'az.
'Et Tamar hiyulh nahoolnuk, 'uhuyulhni, “Whunilh'en nzaz, Timnah ts'e tiyalh 'usbai hatit'us wheni.”
'Et nyoo tsandilh naih ye dune unli-i, ye hanaja 'ink'ez ne'dilbal, 'ink'ez kha'osduz. 'Ink'ez ts'et, Timnah ts'uwhuti-un, 'et usda. Shelah 'awet nizyai yunilh'en 'ink'ez 'awhuz oo'at tileh wheni yugha lhiyulhti 'inka.
'Et Judah yutilh'en, 'ul'en-un 'unt'oh yuninzun, dunin k'e'nilhbal 'et huwa.
'Et yughu ninya 'ink'ez 'utni, “Nzih ooste'.” 'Aw nyoon duyas'at 'unt'oh 'aw t'eoonuszun. 'Et ts'eke 'utni, “Di sgha tan'alh 'et de szih tantelh?”
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Dúbe ntsool-i 'ilho 'i nts'o tl'atistelh.” 'Ink'ez ts'eke 'utni, “Sts'u nahitanyeh eh, sts'otl'atalhtelh whuts'un?”
'Et Judah 'utni, “Di suba 'et ngha oos'alh be nts'un nahitasyeh-i?” 'Et nyoon ts'eke 'utni, “Nyoo latult'o nyoozi' be, 'ink'ez nyoo tuz nintun-i cha.” 'I ts'iyawh yugha ininla 'ink'ez yuzih inte' 'ink'ez ulchan.
'Et dudinya 'ink'ez 'uts'un whenya. Dunin k'einizbal-i cha k'unaitilhbalh, 'ink'ez doo cha tsandilh unli-i naih ye naja.
'Ink'ez Judah dúbe ntsool-i dut'eke Adallam whut'en-un, 'en whuz yuts'u wheyalhti ts'eke 'ink'ez ye yuts'u nahizya-i cha 'et hoonts'i 'aw nayolhtelh ait'oh.
'Et nyoonne 'et whudune'ne buboodulhkut, “Nyoon 'ul'en-un, nyoo ti whuzih usda-un, nts'e whenya?” 'Et 'uhuyulhni, “'Aw njan 'aw 'ul'enne hooloh whe' hoont'oh.”
'Ink'ez Judah ts'un naoosja 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “'Aw naoostelh ait'oh 'ink'ez nyo 'et whut'enne 'enne 'uhutni, ‘'Aw nyo 'ul'enne hooloh,’ hutni.”
'Et Judah 'utni, “Whute, duba yoolhchoot, ndi doo ka sih yooya ts'oole'. Ndi dúbe oots'otl'ayisti 'ink'ez 'aw nalhilhtel.”
'Et whudizulh whutoh ta sanun inle' at'en, 'et Judah hiyulh nawhulnuk, “Tamar nyas'at 'ul'en-un na'dudalhtsi 'ink'ez 'ul'en whe ulchan.” 'Et Judah 'utni, “Tenulhtih 'ink'ez hidolhk'un!”
'Et tenhinilhti whe 'et duzaz yuts'o tl'ahunin'ai, “Ndi mbe dune oowuzchan-un, 'en ooch'e' 'unt'oh, ndi latult'oh, boozi' be tl'oolhyaz 'ink'ez tuz cha.”
'Et Judah 'utni, “A, sch'e' 'unt'oh. Sanus ts'ih'un ne'ut'en, 'aw sye' Shelah oogha lhuyustel 'et huwa.” 'Ink'ez 'on 'at 'aw t'enalhinidzil.
'Et 'awet whudizulh whe 'awet 'ulhtsi whe nane ts'oodunne bulhtsi.
'Et nyo 'awet whe bulh utiltsut whe ilhoghun 'en oola cho iltsai. 'I nyoo ts'eke yughunli-un 'ugha batse' dulk'un-i, 'i yulasga ye yulchuz 'ink'ez 'utni, “Ndun 'en 'udechoo whuzdli.”
'Et 'uhooja dulayaz 'udun nenadilni whe bulhutsin ookwatselhuhoodli whe 'en cha whuzdli. 'Et nyoon ts'eke 'utni, “Dainja whe 'inja! Whuzinli nyunch'oh za mba 'uhoont'oh!” 'Et huwa 'en boozi' Perez huyulhni.
Hukw'elh'az bulhutsin whuzdli, 'et nyoon gha batse' dulk'un-i oolasga be yulchuz, 'en Zerah huyulhni.
'Andit whe Joseph ntsun Egypt ts'e whehiyalhti, 'ink'ez Potiphar, 'en budayi cho Pharaoh lhuganne 'en huba ne'duni', 'en 'ilhoghun bumoodih unli, 'en Egypt whut'en 'en yonket. Ishmael whut'enne ts'un 'en nts'un whehuyalhti.
'Et Moodihti (Yahweh) Joseph yulh 'unt'oh 'ink'ez tube soo din'a suli'. Nyoon Egypt whut'en oomoodih yinli-un 'en ooyoh usda.
'Ink'ez oomoodih yunilh'en 'ahoolhyiz Moodihti (Yahweh) yulh 'unt'oh 'ink'ez oolak'ez ts'iyawh be unzoo yulhtsi.
'Ink'ez Joseph tube ooba yinzoo 'ink'ez yuba 'ut'en. 'Et ooyoh dulcho whumoodih unli yulhtsi, 'ink'ez ndai la yut'i-i cha ts'iyawh yula k'enyanla.
'Et yoh moodih yulhtsi 'et whuts'un 'ink'ez ndai la yuti'-i cha ts'iyawh yutl'ayanla. 'Et huwa Moodihti (Yahweh) nyoo Egypt whut'en ooyoh dilhts'ine soo hoonzoo-un bugha whults'ut. 'Ink'ez ndai la yuti-i cha, yoh yut'i-i cha 'ink'ez ootl'o k'uz cha yut'i-i, ts'iyawh Moodihti (Yahweh) soo hoonzoo-un oogha whults'ut.
'Et ndai la yut'i-i, ts'iyawh Joseph yula k'eyanla, 'aw didut t'eoonuszun di ut'i, ut'alh-i yu'alh-i, 'i yu'alh. 'Ink'ez Joseph dunezoo', ooyust'e dulcho whe unzoo, soo 'ot'en cha 'unt'oh.
