'Et hukw'elh'az whudizulh, 'et nyoon oomoodih oo'at, Joseph 'en yuka' ninzun hukw'un'a yunilh'en 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Schan t'esinti.”
'Et hoonts'i yuch'a tse disnih, 'ink'ez nyoon oomoodih oo'at 'uyulhni, “Whunilh'en smoodih 'aw njan yoh dast'en 'et t'eoonuszun. Ndai la yut'i-i cha ts'iyawh sla k'eyanla. 'Et 'ink'ez ndi yut'i, 'i ts'iyawh stl'ahonla slak'ez ts'e.
'Aw njan yoh 'aw sanus 'ulchone hooloh. 'Aw hoonli cha sch'a nulhonulh'i'. 'Et 'andit nyun 'en oo'at inli, 'et huwa nts'en'a utisnelh lhe'whulcho-un, lhe'whultsi'-un 'et 'utisnelh 'ink'ez Yak'usda ooch'az lubeshi nedutasdalh?”
'Et dzin totsuk yulh yalhduk, 'et hoontsi 'aw lhidusts'o, yuchan t'eoote' yulhni.
'Et 'uhooja 'oh whuya whudizulh at'en, 'et Joseph yoh ts'e whenaja 'utit'elh huba, dune cha yoh hooloh.
Ts'eke yunaih yilhchoot 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Schan t'esinti!” Ndi naih yoontun-i, 'i yoontun whe yuch'a tilhgai 'ink'ez 'az telgai.
'Et ndi oonaih oolak'et yulhchooz, nyoon ts'eke yunilh'en, 'en cha 'az whelgai.
Nyoonne dune 'enne whuyoh dunene buts'ahanyih 'ink'ez 'ubulhni, “Whunulh'en, ndun Hebrew whut'en-un 'en neghi nilhti neghodloh ha, 'ink'ez yoh daninya 'ink'ez duchan t'eooste' sulhni, 'ink'ez tube cho 'asuzdzul!
'Et 'awet hisyih 'et sudants'o whe 'et 'ink'ez uso, ndi oonaih 'i ndi slak'ez yula ditni 'ink'ez 'az whelgai!”
'Et ndi naih yoontun, Joseph oomoodih dananja whuts'un yoontun, 'ink'ez yulh yatilhduk.
'Ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Nyoon Hebrew dune ba 'ut'en-un njan danilhti-un, szih neninya 'ink'ez sghudloh.
'Et ooch'a 'azdzul whe ndi oonaih 'i szih yula ditni 'ink'ez 'az whelgai.”
'Et Joseph oomoodih whulh 'udants'o ndi khuni yudants'o oo'at daja yulhni la, “Mba 'ut'en-un njan 'et dusinla,” 'et hunilch'e.
'Et Joseph oomoodih yilhchoot 'ink'ez dune 'ahudin'ai-un, ndet lerwe be 'ulhnane 'adinlane, 'et 'ayan'ai, 'ink'ez nyo tsak'et 'et 'adin'ai.
'Et hoonts'i Moodihti (Yahweh) Joseph yulh 'unt'oh, 'ink'ez yugha te'ninzun, nyo 'adin'ai-un humoodih 'en yuba unzoo suli'.
'Ink'ez nyo tsak'et 'ahudinla-un humoodih, nyo 'adinlane ts'iyawh Joseph tl'abanla. Nts'oh dahut'en-un 'et Joseph ba 'uhoont'oh.
'Et nyo 'ahudinla-un whumoodih, Joseph ndai la yughana-i 'aw lhinilh'en, Moodihti (Yahweh) yulh 'unt'oh 'et huwa. 'Ink'ez ntsoh dat'en ndai la yughana ts'iyawh Moodihti (Yahweh) dizti' yulhtsi.
'Et hukw'elh'az 'et nduhooja whe ndunne Egypt whutenne lerwe ooyoh 'uhut'en, dayi ne'ut'en, 'ink'ez nyo yoh lhes ulht'es-un cha, bumoodih lerwe hiba dzoh 'uja.
'Ink'ez lerwe Pharaoh 'en ndunne nane yuba ne'ut'enne, 'enne dayi ne'ut'en 'ink'ez dayi 'ulht'es, 'enne tube whe bubulh hunilch'e.
'Ink'ez nahult'oh 'aban'ai, nyoon Pharaoh lhuganne oodayi cho ooyoh, 'en tl'abalhti, Joseph 'adin'ai-un 'et.
'Ink'ez nyo Pharaoh lhuganne oodayi cho, Joseph 'en tl'abalhti 'ink'ez buba ne'ut'en. 'Ink'ez 'atsul 'et 'ahudan'a'.
'Et nyoon yoh 'ut'en moodih 'ink'ez nyoon lhes ulht'es-un lerwe ba 'ut'enne nyo 'ahudin'ai, nahult'oh nuhuztez, 'ilhe 'ulhdzis za, lhelhts'un un'a nuhuztez.
'Ink'ez Joseph bugha daninya bundada', 'ink'ez bunilh'en, 'ink'ez nahult'oh ni hinli.
'Et Pharaoh oomoodihne hubulh 'uhut'enne 'ubulhni, “Di ha 'uht'oh nohdzi unduda 'andit dzin?”
'Ink'ez 'uhuyulhni, “Nanílt'oh 'andit 'ulhdzis nusítez 'ink'ez daja ni whe 'utni-un, 'aw nedoni'ne hooloh.” 'Ink'ez Joseph 'ubulhni, “Ndet huwa 'et nusuhtez-un, Yak'usda 'en za iloh lakw ba 'uhoont'oh. T'ewhuntihzeh hukwa' nuzun de, sudúhni.”
'Et nyoon yoh 'ut'en moodih, Joseph daja la nusuti 'et yadani' 'ink'ez 'utni, “Whunilh'en njan nuste-un 'ants'i duchun 'i sbut nadan'a.
'Et ndi duchun 'i ta oozooschum hoonli 'ink'ez oots'u ha'nulhyeh. Oots'aha' nalhyai 'ink'ez mai ts'ekoo too' huyilh'i, 'i mai 'i oots'aha inalhyai.
'Ink'ez Pharaoh oolubot 'i sla k'es'ai 'ink'ez nyoo mai uschoot 'ink'ez nyo Pharaoh oolubot 'et dunisni 'ink'ez Pharaoh oola k'eyiskai.”
'Ink'ez Joseph 'uyulhni, “Daja ni whe 'utni nyudutasnelh. Ndi ta 'uzooschum 'i tat dzin 'unt'oh.
Tat dzin inle' de, Pharaoh whutso da' daint'en la, 'et nenyanutalhtelh, ntsi ndo 'uyutilelh ink'ez oolubot 'i ootl'aitankalh, whutso da' dailh'en lah ba 'int'en da'.
'Et hoonts'i snaoolnih 'awet mba soo' hooja de, 'ink'ez sts'un onzoo', Pharaoh sba oobulh yaoolhduk 'ink'ez njan tenaoosja'.
'Alha Hebrew whut'enne bukeyoh 'et whuts'un sgho ndunist'i whe 'ust'oh. 'Aw hoonli lhe'usnel whe njan 'aw 'asuhoo'alh huba lhe'hoot'oh.”
'Et nyoon lerwe ba lhes ulht'es-un, nyoon 'onghun-un huwu nusuti-un hoonzoo, 'et Joseph 'uyulhni, “Si cha whuz un'a nususti 'ink'ez njan 'et ta lhyul lhests'ai, 'i stsi k'usla.
'Udedo telh 'i lhelhdoh-i lhes sut'e-i te, 'i Pharaoh ba 'unt'oh, 'ink'ez dut'aiyaz ndo stsi k'uskai whe ts'iyawh huyan'al.”
'Et Joseph 'uyulhni, “Daja ni whe 'utni nyudutasnelh. Ta telh, 'i tat dzin 'unt'oh.
Tat dzin inle', 'et Pharaoh ntsi 'i nch'a ndo 'itilelh, 'ink'ez duchun k'ez 'et nze'tigus 'ink'ez dut'ai 'i nyust'e hiti'ulh.”
'Et 'uhooja whulh tat dzin inle' whe, 'et Pharaoh whuzdli dzin 'ink'ez dune ghu nusuya duba 'ut'enne ba, 'ink'ez nyoon yoh huwunli, 'ut'en ghunli-un whumoodih, 'ink'ez nyoon lhes ulht'es-un bulh, 'enne butsi do 'uyinla.
'Et ndun 'ut'en moodih yilh'i-un, cha za 'et nenainilhti 'ink'ez lubot 'i Pharaoh oola k'eyan'ai.
'Et hoonts'i nyoon lhes ulht'es-un, 'en yuze'uzguz, Joseph daja yulhni la whuz 'un'a.
'Et hoonts'i nyoon 'ut'en moodih-un, 'aw Joseph yunaoodilhnoh.
'Et 'uhooja soo nat yus k'ut inle' whe Pharaoh nusuti, 'ink'ez whunilh'en, 'ukoh taba usyin 'et huwun nusuti.
Khuntsul 'et nyo 'ukoh lhtak'ant'i musdoos 'i too halghaz, nilhk'a 'unt'oh unzoo 'ink'ez nyo tl'o k'ut 'et 'u'alh.
'Et whunulh'en, 'uyoo musdoos lhtak'ant'i 'i cha yunilh'us, 'ukoh ts'e hailh'az. Ntsi' 'ink'ez oodanusugi 'ink'ez nyo 'uyoo musdoos 'i yuzih taba nudilhya.
'Ink'ez nyoo musdoos ntsi'-i oodanusagi-i, nyoo lhtak'ant'i musdoos nilhk'a nzoo-i, 'i ts'iyawh yan'alh. 'Et Pharaoh ts'enandzut.
'Et doo cha nanisti 'et whulhnat nusuti. Khuntsul lhtak'ant'i nyoo hunuyeh, lhes te, ooghu hoonli-i, 'i 'ilho hanalhyai-i, 'i yuts'u hanalhyai ncha 'ink'ez nzoo.
'Et 'ink'ez lhtak'ant'i dindot-iyaz ndaz nilhts'i be 'utsi' suli', 'i hukw'elh'az hanalhyai.
'Ink'ez nyoo lhtak'ant'i hanalhyai-i, 'i nyo lhtak'ant'i nzoo cha 'unt'oh 'ink'ez ncha, 'i yan'alh. 'Et Pharaoh ts'eninzut 'ink'ez 'alha nusuti.
'Et 'uhooja bundada' ndi ooyughi tube 'uts'un un'a ooba 'uhooja, 'ink'ez Egypt whut'en keyoh-un mbene ne'dulhdeh cha 'ink'ez mbene la whunihne cha, 'enne buka' dani' 'ink'ez Pharaoh daja la nusuti-un 'et hubudani'. 'Ink'ez ts'iyawh 'aw gak ndet 'uhoont'oh-un 'et 'aw lhuhidusnih, t'ehonuszun.
'Et nyoon yoh 'ut'en moodih-un, 'en Pharaoh yulh yailhduk 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “'Andit dzin whe tank'us 'ust'oh-un 'et whunaznih.
'Et Pharaoh yuba 'ut'enne bubulh hunilch'e' 'ink'ez si 'ink'ez lhes ulht'es-un moodih cho bulh nanilt'oh whe nyo Pharaoh lhuganne budayi cho ooyoh, 'en zih 'anean'ai.
Nanilt'oh nusítez 'ilhe 'ulhdzis 'ink'ez whenich'oh nek'un'a 'et nusitez nanilt'oh.
'Et nyo 'ilhoghun Hebrew chilhyaz, 'en nebulh 'adin'ai nyo Pharaoh lhuganne budayi cho, 'en ba ne'ut'en-un, 'ink'ez 'en datni' 'ink'ez nedani' nusitez-un, ts'iyawh nedani'.
'Ink'ez 'et 'uhooja nts'en'a lah nedani' nusitez-un, whuz un'a 'uhooja. Si njan se'ut'en 'et nenasunilhti 'ink'ez nyoon yuze'uzguz.”
'Et Pharaoh, Joseph yuka' dani' 'ink'ez 'ahoh yughu dahinilhti. Na'dunidzo cha 'uja 'ink'ez dunaih cha lhk'enaidanla, 'ink'ez Pharaoh yughu ninya.
'Et Pharaoh 'en Joseph 'uyulhni, “Nususti 'ink'ez 'aw dune sudoni'ne hooloh. Dasja whe 'ust'en nyun nyulh 'udasts'o t'eooninzun, dune nutes-un 'ink'ez hubudini.”
'Et Joseph 'en Pharaoh 'uyulhni, “'Aw si syo ts'e 'ilho 'uhoont'oh. Yak'usda 'en la Pharaoh hoonzoo hukw'un'a yudoni'.”
'Et Pharaoh 'en Joseph 'uyulhni, “Whunilh'en, nuste whe 'ukoh taba susyin 'et huwun nususti.
Khuntsul lhtak'ant'i musdoos 'i tooz hail'az. Nzoo cha 'unt'oh 'ink'ez nilhk'a cha 'unt'oh, 'ink'ez nyo tl'ok'et 'et 'u'alh.
'Et whunilh'en, 'uyoo musdoos 'i yunilh'us. Tel'en 'ink'ez 'utsi' 'ink'ez oodanusugi, 'aw whutsoda' ndultsi'-un lhuzis'en Egypt whukeyoh 'et.
'Ink'ez nyoo danusugi 'ink'ez 'utsi'-i musdoos, 'i nyoo lhtak'ant'i 'udechoo hailh'az-i nilhk'a-i ts'iyawh yan'alh.
'Et nyoo musdoos ts'iyawh yan'al, 'aw dune t'eooninzunne hooloh nts'en'a ts'iyawh yan'al. Whutsoda' dant'oh la, 'utsi' 'et za 'edunt'oh. 'Et ts'enuszut.
'Ink'ez cha nuste-un, khuntsul lhtak'ant'i lhes k'ut, 'ilho hanuye'-i, 'i nyus de haki tube nzoo 'ink'ez dincha cha 'unt'oh.
'Et whunilh'en, lhtak'ant'i nyoo mai hunuyeh-i dindat 'ink'ez ndaz nilhts'i-i be ninta 'unt'en, 'i hukwelh'az 'i haki.
Nyoo lhtak'ant'i 'utsi'-i dindat-iyaz, 'i nyoo 'udechoo lhtak'ant'i dincha-i ts'iyawh yan'al. 'Ink'ez ne'dulhdehne budasni', 'et hoonts'i 'aw daja ni whe 'utni 'aw sulhodinel.”
'Et Joseph 'en Pharaoh 'uyulhni, “Ndi Pharaoh ooghun nusinti-i, 'ilho za unli whe 'unt'oh, Yak'usda (Elohim) Pharaoh 'en wheinilhtan datinelh lah.
Nyoo musdoos lhtak'ant'i nzoo-i, 'i lhtak'ant'it yus k'ut 'unt'oh. 'Ink'ez nyoo hanalhyeh-i lhtak'ant'i nzoo-i, 'i cha lhtak'ant'it yus k'ut 'unt'oh. 'I 'ilho be nusinti whe 'int'oh.
'Ink'ez lhtak'ant'i musdoos daningi 'ink'ez 'utsi'-i, nyoo musdoos unzoo-i yuk'elh'az too hailh'az-i, 'i cha lhtak'antit yus k'ut 'unt'oh. 'Ink'ez ndi hananyai-i lhtak'ant'i ndaz nilhtsi whe 'utsi' suli'-i, 'i cha lhtak'ant'i yus k'ut dai whutaleh-i, 'i 'unt'oh.
Ndi 'i Pharaoh ooghun bulh yasduk, Yak'usda (Elohim) Pharaoh wheinilhtan datit'elh-un.
Tube lhtak'ant'it yus k'ut soo ts'iyaitsuk lhai hoonli whe 'et Egypt yun k'ut whutaleh.
'Et hoonts'i, hukw'elh'az lhtak'ant'it yus k'ut 'et dai whutaleh 'ink'ez daltsuk iloh hoonli inle', Egypt 'et dune whunaoodutilnoh 'ink'ez nyoo dai yun dulcho gak yutilhtselh.
Lhai hoonli-un nyo yun k'ut whunaoodutitnoh nyoo dai niz de dutizulh tube hoontsi' whutaleh.
'Ink'ez Pharaoh oonusute nat 'et hidani', Yak'usda (Elohim) 'uhoonla 'et huwa. 'Ink'ez 'atsulyaz inle' de, 'et de Yak'usda (Elohim) 'et nduwhutalelh.
“'Et huwa Pharaoh soo dune 'unt'oh-un, whunih-un, 'en 'uhutayoolhtelh 'ink'ez Egypt yun k'ut ndulcho whe whumoodih yoolhtselh.
'Et Pharaoh 'et doneh dune moodihne ndulcho whe yun k'ut 'et 'utahaboolelh. Ndai la 'uhuyulh'en-i, ts'iyawh ilhoh kwulai' (⅕) 'ul'en-i ts'iyawh 'ilhunahuyolelh lhtak'ant'it yus k'ut whuts'un.
'Ink'ez ndai la ut'alh-i 'i cha nyo ho hoonzoo'-un 'ulya-i, 'i ts'iyawh 'udun nehuyolelh. Pharaoh 'en whumoodih hoole', 'ink'ez ndi t'alh-i nyo ho lhelhdoh keyoh whuti, 'et az oola'.
'Et de ndi ut'alh-i 'i ts'iyawh 'et tilalh, ndet la lhtak'ant'it yus k'ut dai whutalelh, 'et wheni Egypt 'et za tilalh. Doo ka la nyo dai whuzdli' de, dune yaoodlah 'et whuch'a.”
'Et ndi khuni Pharaoh 'en ooba hoonzoo 'ink'ez yuba 'ut'enne cha buba hoonzoo.
'Ink'ez Pharaoh duba 'ut'enne 'ubulhni, “'Aw njan ndunt'oh-un dune naoots'olhtelh ait'oh, Yak'usda (Elohim) ooyughi bulh 'unt'oh-un?”
'Et Pharaoh, Joseph 'uyulhni, “'Et 'alha Yak'usda ts'iyawh njan whunyunilhtan. 'Aw nyun dult'ohne whunihne hooloh.
Syoh 'et ndulcho whumoodih tanleh. Nyun daja dini, whuz un'a sdune'ne cha ne'hutit'en. Njan lerwe kw'uts'uzda cho k'ususda-un, 'et 'awet za nyando 'utist'elh.”
'Ink'ez Pharaoh Joseph 'uyulhni, “Whunilh'en, Egypt yun k'ut nduwhulcho-un 'et whumoodih tanleh nyuzusi.”
'Et Pharaoh dulasgayaz latult'o nidil'ai-i, 'i ts'ahayit'ai 'ink'ez Joseph oola 'i yuneidan'ai. 'Ink'ez soo naih dizti'-i nzoo-i be dune yulhtsi 'ink'ez gold 'unt'oh-i ulh'ool-i, 'i yuts'ilchun neidanla.
'Ink'ez bulh nanki nyoo luwagin huyilh-i, chariot huyulhni, ndai la yut'i-i, 'i ye noya' yulhni, 'ink'ez ntso uyalh-un 'en dugwut nyo yuntootsih yubut 'ink'ez Egypt yun k'ut nduwhulcho whe whumoodih unli yulhtsi.
'Ink'ez cha Pharaoh, Joseph 'uyulhni, “Pharaoh 'ust'oh. 'Aw nyun a'ah lhduzinih de, 'aw dune dula cha do huyolhchoot 'ink'ez duke cha do 'uhuyooleh-un hooloh.”
'Ink'ez Pharaoh, Joseph yoozi' yugha din'ai, Zaphnath-Paaneah yulhni. 'Ink'ez oo'at yole' ha Asenath, Poti-Phera, On whulubret ootse', 'en yugha inilhti. 'Et Joseph nyo Egypt yun k'ut ndulcho whe nuya.
Joseph tat whunizyat (30) be yus k'ut Pharaoh Egypt whulerwe but inyin whe 'ink'ez Joseph nyo tenanja 'ink'ez Egypt keyoh ndulcho whe nuya.
'Et nyo lhtak'ant'it lhai hoonli, ts'iyai lhai hoonli-un 'owhuya whudizulh whe.
Ndai la ut'alh-i Egypt yun k'ut hoonli-i, ts'iyawh nayalhdzoo, 'ink'ez keyoh whuti totsuk neininla. Ndai la hanuyeh-i cha ts'iyawh keyoh whuti totsuk 'et neininla.
Joseph hanuyeh-i ut'alh-i lhai yulhtsi, yatoo taba sai k'un'a 'et 'ultsuk-i, 'udek'ez 'awet 'ulhto-un cha 'etsul 'udija 'aw yoolhto ait'oh 'et huwa.
'Ink'ez Joseph nyo dai whutaleh whutso, 'et nane duneyaz ooye' suli'. Nyoon ts'eke Asenath, Poti-Phera ootse', On bulubret, 'en yughu bulhtsi.
Joseph 'en 'udetsoh whuzdli-un, 'en Manasseh yulhni: “Yak'usda (Elohim) nts'en'a la te'iz'en 'ink'ez sba ooyoh cha whunaoodiznoh 'inka.”
'Ink'ez whulh nat ooye', 'en Ephraim yulhni: “Njan yun k'ut dzoh nusuzut inle', 'andit whe Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en sba whulai whulhtsi 'et huwa.”
'Et lhtak'ant'it yus k'ut ts'iyai tsuk lhai dai hooloh-un, Egypt yun k'ut 'et etsul 'uhooja.
'Ink'ez lhtak'ant'it yus k'ut dai hoonli-un whe' whudit'en. Joseph daja ni la whuz un'a, ndulcho whe dai whuzdli'. 'Et hoonts'i Egypt yun k'ut 'et ut'alh-i hoonli.
'Et tube 'awet Egypt dai whuzdli' whe Pharaoh 'en dune hits'un tedudlih ut'alh-i ha. 'Et Pharaoh hubulhni, “Joseph ootsohdulh. Daja nohulhni la 'et nduht'en.”
Ndi yun k'ut ndulcho whe dai whuzdli' 'ink'ez Joseph 'uzdla bayoh Egypt 'et daha'danla. 'Ink'ez Egypt whut'en ye buts'e 'ooket. Tube dai be oonujut suli' Egypt yun k'ut.
Yun k'ut totsuk whut'enne 'enne Egypt yun k'ut whuz Joseph hits'un lhgha dindel, hanuyeh hootakulh ha. Dai cho 'i yun k'ut nduhoolhcho whe be 'uhooja 'et huwa.
'Et Jacob yun k'ut Egypt 'et lhes mai' hoonli whunilh'en 'et duye' 'ubulhni, “Di ha 'ants'i lhunulh'en?”
'Ink'ez 'et 'utni, “Egypt 'et lhes mai' hoonli 'et whulh 'udasts'o, whuz uhdulh 'ink'ez 'et neba 'oohk'et 'et de sih ts'uhoona' 'ink'ez yats'ilhosdla.”
'Et Joseph bulhutsinke whunizyane, Egypt ts'e whenandil lhes mai' hootakulh ha.
'Et hoonts'i Jacob 'aw Joseph bulhutsin Benjamin, 'en 'aw bubulh whelhuyilh'alh, “Doo ka sih hoontsi'-un bulh 'uhoneh,” ni 'inka.
'Et Israel ooye'ke whuz lhes mai' hootakulh ha whuz whehandil, Canaan 'et cha dai hoonli 'et huwa.
'Et Joseph nyo usda-un dulcho whe bumoodih unli. 'En za ndi lhes mai' ye 'ooket keyoh whudune'ne ts'un. 'Et Joseph bulhutsinke whusahandil 'ink'ez hibut soo yooyo cho yo 'uhuntutsulh 'ankw'us yun nonut'a whe.
'Et Joseph dulhutsinke bunilh'en 'ink'ez naboolhts'it, 'et hoonts'i t'ebunuzun hukw'un'a ne'ut'en 'ink'ez khuni ulhtus 'i be bubulh yalhduk 'ink'ez 'ubulhni, “Nts'ez de hahdil?” 'Et 'uhutni, “Canaan yun k'ut ts'e hats'andil t'alh-i ts'ootakulh ha.”
'Et Joseph dulhutsinke naboolhts'it 'ink'ez didut 'aw nalhuhuyoolts'ulh.
'Et Joseph nts'en'a la bughu nusuti-un 'et whunalnih 'ink'ez 'ubulhni, “Nunut'i'ne 'uht'oh! Dats'int'oh la tets'ul'en neuntilh'elh ha 'uhja, ndiz tihdil.!”
'Et 'uhuyulhni, “'Awundooh nemoodih, mba 'ut'enne njan ut'alh-i hootakulh ha 'uhuja whusahandil.
Ts'iyawh 'ilhoghun dune ooye'ke za 'uts'int'oh, 'aw dune 'undunut'ihne lhts'iloh. Mba 'ut'enne 'aw nulhdulh'enne iloh 'uhint'oh.”
'Et hoonts'i 'ubulhni, “'Awundooh! 'Et hoonts'i njan dats'int'oh la tets'ul'en, 'et whuntilh'elh ha 'uhja!”
'Et 'uhuyulhni, “Mba 'ut'enne 'enne whunizyane 'on 'at nane lhulhutsinke hinli. 'Ilhoghun dune za ooye' Canaan whut'en-un, 'udekoh-un 'en 'ubá yuzih netl'adida', 'ink'ez 'ilhoghun cha hooloh suli' inle'.”
'Et hoonts'i Joseph 'ubulhni, “Daja dusni la, 'et 'alha 'udusni, nulhdulh'enne unli whe 'uht'oh!
Ndiz un'a 'et ootalhdzih. Pharaoh ye khuna-i njan 'aw whuch'a nalhtuzihdulh, 'udek'oh-un nohulhutsin whusainya de za.
'Ilhoghun whuz nalh'alh 'ink'ez 'udek'oh-un nohulhutsin whusayoolhtelh. 'Ink'ez nohni 'adutilalh, 'et de nohghun ootalhdzih ts'ih'un un'a 'uduhni tilah. Pharaoh ye khuna-i be nulhdulh'enne uhli tilah 'uht'oh!”
'Et ts'iyawh 'abanla tat dzin whuts'un.
'Et Joseph 'ubulhni whulhtat dzin-un, “'Et nduhneh 'ink'ez hoohna', Yak'usda (Elohim) be nuzjut 'et huwa.
Ts'ih'un dunene uhli de, nohni nohtoh 'ilhoghun 'en 'adoo'a' 'ink'ez nohni lhes mai' bulh whuz nohyoh ts'e nahdulh.
'Ink'ez 'udek'oh-un nohulhuts'in, 'en sba whusalhtih. Nohghuni ootalhdzih 'et huwa 'ink'ez 'aw yaoohdlah ait'oh.” 'Inka 'et nduhuja.
'Et 'ulhodutni, “'Alha nek'ehoonkatne ts'inli. Neulhutsin oozul nets'utedudlih inle' 'ink'ez 'aw lhts'udits'il, 'et huwa njan nek'ehoolts'ut.”
'Ink'ez Reuben bubulh yatilduk 'ink'ez 'ubulhni, “'Aw lakw lhunodusnel inle'! ‘Ndun duneyaz oots'un ninta 'ooht'en junih!’ nohdusni, 'ink'ez 'aw lhusoozulhts'ai. 'Et huwa whunulh'en buzkaih 'awet nets'un hukwa' whutni.”
'Et hoonts'i 'aw t'ehonuszun Joseph t'ewhuninzun, yuba yalhduk-un 'en yuba yalhduk whe bubulh yalhduk 'et huwa.
'Ink'ez buch'az nalh'a 'ink'ez intse. 'Et doo cha buts'un nalh'a bubulh yalhduk 'ink'ez Simeon yilhchoot 'ink'ez bubut 'et yulhghel
'Et Joseph 'ubulhni, 'uyoonne dune ndi 'e'uzdla-i ts'iyawh lhes mai' be buba idulhbun 'ink'ez ndai la hik'elha hitilhtselh-i, 'i ts'iyawh sooniya 'e'uzdla-i be nayuhdzai' 'ink'ez nahidutilyelh-i cha butl'ahle. 'Et whuz un'a 'ubinla.
'Et nyoo budonkey cha ts'iyawh hit'una'uzdla lhes mai' be 'ink'ez whenahidil.
'Et nahunina 'ilhoghun nyoo 'e'uzdla-i k'unayan'uk, nyoon dughuna' yugha' ti'alh ha, nehunina-un soo 'udedo nyoo sooniya 'et usdzai yutilh'en.
'Et dulhutsinke 'ubulhni, “Szooniya stl'anahuyan'ai, njan 'et 'unt'oh, s'ezdla-i bet! 'Et budzin soo ts'ih'un yo 'uja 'ink'ez hunilhjoot 'ink'ez 'ilhodutni “Dahoont'oh-un 'et Yak'usda (Elohim) negha oonin'ai?”
'Et Jacob dubá 'en hits'u naoosdil Canaan yun k'ut, 'ink'ez hiyulh nahoolnuk nts'oh te bubulh dahoot'en-un 'uhuyulhni,
“Mbene la nyo yun whumoodih unli-un, tubeh khuni duts'un 'i be nebulh yalhduk, 'ink'ez nulhdulh'enne keyoh honilh'en ooba le'ts'int'oh.
'Et hoonts'i 'uts'utni, ‘Ts'ih'un dunene ts'inli, 'aw nulhdulh'enne lhts'iloh.
Whunizyane 'on 'at nane lhulhutsinke ts'inli, 'ubá ooye'ke 'uts'int'oh. 'Ilhoghun hooloh suli', 'ink'ez 'udek'oh-un 'en 'ubá yuzih usda, Canaan yun k'ut 'et,’ ts'utni.
'Et dune nyo keyoh whumoodih unli neulhni, ‘Njan whe la tsih'un dune uhli t'eoonoohzeh, 'ilhoghun nohulhutsin njan nenulhtih, 'ink'ez ut'alh-i nohyoh ts'e t'alh-i hooloh ts'e nahlelh 'ink'ez nahdulh.
'Ink'ez 'udek'oh-un nohulhutsin, ndiz toolhte'. 'Et de la t'eoonooszin 'aw nulhdulh'enne lhuhloh, ts'ih'un dune uhli 'ink'ez ndun nohulhutsin nohtl'anatistelh 'ink'ez njan 'et sih 'ohket.”’
'Et 'uhooja, du'ezdla-i huye ha'alhkat whe 'ilhoghun dune buzooniya yuk'elha yulhtsi-i, 'i be 'uzdla-i be yuzdzai 'et hitilh'en. Bubá cha yunilh'en. Tube hunilhjoot.
'Ink'ez Jacob bubá 'ubulhni, “Tube ts'odi suzulhtsi nohtoh. Joseph 'en hooloh suli', Simeon cha hooloh suli', 'ink'ez 'andit Benjamin 'en natilhtelh hukwa' nuhzun. 'I ts'iyawh sdach'e 'uhoont'oh.”
'Et Reuben dubá yulh yatilhduk 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Sye'ke nahult'oh bubuzolhghelh 'aw Simeon nts'u nalhtustel de. Sla k'elhtih 'ink'ez whusunaoostelh lah.”
'Et hoonts'i 'uyulhni, “'Aw sye' nohbulh too'as ait'oh. Ndun nohulhutsin 'en dazsai. Dich'oh 'et ndun sye' hoonli bulh 'uhooja de uhdulh whe, 'et de stsi dulgi-i ts'odi bulh nyo ts'un k'ut ts'e tisyalh.”
Tubeh nyo yun k'ut dai be oonisjoot.
'Et 'uhooja ndi lhes mai' gak huyulhtsi whe Egypt huyonket-i, bubá 'ubulhni, “Whuz nahdulh 'ink'ez 'ut'alh-iyaz oohket.”
'Et hoonts'i Judah 'en 'uyulhni, “Nyoon dune soo tsih'un negha dani' njan dune neulhni, ‘'Aw snin doo cha noolh'en ait'oh nohulhutsin nohbulh e'ust'en de.’
Neulhutsin nebulh whelh'a' de, 'et de za whuz uztidulh 'ink'ez ut'alh-i mba ts'ootakulh.
'Et 'aw ndun nebulh tolh'a' ait'oh de, 'aw whuz uztoodilh ait'oh. Nyoon dune njan dune neulhni, ‘'Aw snin ooh'en ait'oh noulhutsin nohbulh whusalhiyal de.”’
'Ink'ez Israel 'utni, “'Et dahoont'oh huwa sdabe tank'us un'a 'usuhla nyoon dune dahni', 'awhuz 'uyoon cha nohulhutsin 'et dahni'?”
'Et 'uhutni, “Dune soo ts'ih'un neoodalhkut, wheni 'ink'ez nenatneke cha 'ink'ez 'utni, ‘Nohbá khuna eh? 'Uyoon cha eh nohulhutsin?’ 'Ink'ez 'et ts'udani'. Nts'en'a t'ets'ontazin, ‘Nyulhutsin ookwa nahdulh,’ nedutanelh?”
'Et Judah, oobá Israel 'uyulhni, “Nyoon duneyaz, si stl'ailhtih 'ink'ez sih whuz naztoodilh 'ink'ez ts'uhoona'. 'Aw yats'odlah ait'oh, wheni cha 'ink'ez nyun cha 'ink'ez neuzkehkeyaz cha.
Si sich'oh 'et ndun ookw'edutisyalh, soo sla k'ez 'et oola dutanih. 'Et 'aw mba whusanalhustel 'ink'ez mbut nenalhustel de, 'ilhiz wheni si sk'eholts'it.
'Et 'aw sa' nulhe'ts'it'el de, 'andit 'awet whulhnat da' whusanats'idil oole'.”
'Ink'ez bubá Israel hubulhni, “Whuz un'a sih 'uhot'e'. 'Ink'ez nja duhneh, ndoho hanuyeh-i, mai 'uk'enus unzoo-i buba deyulhle, 'ink'ez dune oots'itilhdulh 'i cha bahlelh. Be 'uzdudultlo-i na'ulhyeh-i, ntsool-iyaz cha, 'ink'ez ts'ihna tl'uz ntsool-iyaz cha bulh buta'whut'en-i cha 'ink'ez myrr huyulhni, 'i cha, 'ink'ez duchun k'ut hanuyeh-i pistachio 'ink'ez almond huyulhni, 'i cha ooba yihlelh.
Sooniya nawh 'uniltsuk-i, 'i toohdzaih 'ink'ez nyoo sooniya nohba denahuyandzai inle'-i, 'i cha toohdzaih, nahunit'a whutilah 'uhuja.
Nohulhutsin cha nohbulh too'as. Dugw'e' duduhdilh 'ink'ez dune oots'u nahdulh.
'Ink'ez Yak'usda 'Uk'enus 'Ultus-un 'unt'oh (El Shaddai), 'en nohgha te'nozeh nyoon oobut. 'Ink'ez si 'ilhoghun nohulhutsin 'en cha yuladootnih 'ink'ez Benjamin. 'Et 'awet ts'odi susli' de, 'awet ts'odi susli'.”
'Et nyoonne dune nyoo hits'u hitilhdulh-i cha 'ink'ez Benjamin cha, 'en cha hubulh tiz'az, sooniya nawh 'uniltsuk-i cha, 'ink'ez Egypt ts'e whehandil. 'Ink'ez Joseph hibut nenindil.
'Et Joseph, Benjamin bubulh nu'as yutilh'en whe nyoon ooyoh huwunli-un 'uyulhni, “Ndunne dune syoh ts'e hubulh in'us, 'ink'ez khuna-i nasilghe 'ink'ez lhadinleh. Dzetniz 'et ndunne dune sulh na'hutit'ulh.”
'Et dune Joseph daja yulhni la whuz un'a 'uja. 'Ink'ez nyoonne dune Joseph ooyoh ts'e dabuninla.
'Et nyoonne dune whehunuljut, Joseph ooyoh ts'e dabunila, 'ink'ez uhutni, “Nyoo sooniya 'i k'a la ne'inla ne'uzdla-i be nahuyandzai-i 'udechoo njan daneuninla. Nech'az nedutadalh-un 'et hukwunuta 'ulhnane k'un'a neutalhchulh nyoo ghuna', donkey cha.”
'Et nyoon Joseph buyoh whumoodih yuzih nenindil nyo dati 'et hiyulh yailhduk.
'Et 'uhiyulhni, “O dune ncha-un, 'alha 'udecho whusats'andil whe ut'alh-i ts'ootakulh ha' ts'uja.
'Et 'uhooja, nenats'untatus naztisdil whe ndi 'e'uzdla-i ookw'unats'un'uk 'ink'ez 'ilhoghun ts'inli whe nezoonuya' nyo 'ezdla-i be yuzdzai whe, 'inka ndi sooniya whusanats'andzai.
'Ink'ez 'uyoo sooniya cha whusats'an'ai, 'ut'alh-i be ts'ootakulh ha. 'Aw t'ets'onuszun mbe subah nyoo sooniya ne'ezdla-i be nayandzai.”
'Et hoonts'i 'utni, “Nohbulh whudoghel. 'Aw whenulhjut iloh. NohYak'usda (Elohim) 'en nohbá ooYak'usda (Elohim) ndi 'en noh'ezdla-i ye yan'ai whe 'unt'oh. Nohzooniya nus'a whe.” 'Ink'ez Simeon butl'anayalhti.
'Et ndun dune Joseph ooyoh dabuninla, 'ink'ez too bugha nilhdzo 'i be duke tanahuzguz 'ink'ez bughuna' cha yutl'a'dantsut.
'Ink'ez nyoo Joseph hits'u hitilhdulh-i lhahidinla, dzetniz wheni nyo 'et ut'alh-i nahutit'ulh 'et t'ehonanzin.
'Et Joseph duyoh dananja whe nyoo hits'u hitilhdulh-i hitl'ahuyanla, 'ink'ez hibut yo huntizsel soo yun whuts'un.
'Et dahint'oh lah 'et hukwa boodulhkut 'ink'ez 'utni, “Nohbá soo 'unt'oh eh, duneti ooghu yalhduk-un, 'awhuz eh khuna?”
'Et 'uhuyulhni, “Mba 'ut'en-un nebá tube soo 'unt'oh. 'Awhuz khuna.” 'Ink'ez yubut yo 'untizsel 'ink'ez nyo na'hududilhdil.
'Et ndo yutan'en 'ink'ez dudulhutsin Benjamin yutilh'en, ooloo ooye', 'ink'ez 'utni, “Ndun 'en 'udek'oh nohbulhutsin, ooghun sulh yalhduk inle'?” 'Ink'ez 'utni, “Yak'usda (Elohim) soo cho nts'un oozoo' sye'.”
'Et oodzi tubeh dulhutsin yuk'eni unli 'ink'ez 'uts'un whenaja soo 'a cho. 'Ink'ez 'et whenintse, 'ink'ez usti ts'e whuz dananja 'ink'ez 'et utso.
'Et nena'nilde 'ink'ez tenanja 'ink'ez k'oh 'ududootun 'ink'ez 'utni, “Ut'alh-i 'et nenuhle bubut neinuhle.”
'Et didutch'oh 'uti'ulh-un hiba ne'ninla, 'ink'ez nyoonne cha didutch'oh 'et 'uhuti'ulh-un buba ne'ninla. 'Ink'ez Egypt whut'enne 'enne cha didutch'oh duba ne'huninla. 'Aw Egypt whut'enne, Hebrew whut'enne 'aw bubulhe'hus'al, Egypt whut'enne buba hoontsi'.
'Et hibut natl'adilts'i'. 'Udetso whuzdli-un, 'udechoo 'ink'ez 'udek'oh whuzdli-un, 'en 'udek'ez, 'ink'ez nyoonne dune tube buba hooncha lhonul'en.
'Et ts'iyawh bubut ne'ninkai, 'et hoonts'i Benjamin yuba deyanla, 'i kwulat 'i be 'onus 'ultsuk, 'i yugha inin'ai. 'Ink'ez too hitnai' 'ink'ez hiyulh whunalhni.
'Ink'ez nyoon duyoh whumoodih unli-un 'en 'uyulhni, “Dune ts'iyawh 'ezdla-i ut'alh-i buba idilhbun, soo nahitilelh-un 'et 'uldaz-i, 'ink'ez sooniya huye huyonket, 'i cha 'ezdla-i buba denayin'aih.
'Ink'ez slubot silver 'unt'oh-i, 'i 'udek'oh-un 'en 'ezdla-i ooba deyin'aih, 'ink'ez lhes mai' huye onket-i cha buba denayin'aih.” 'Et daja Joseph yulhni la, whuz un'a 'uja.
Soo bundada' yulhkai 'et 'awet dune whenabuhalh'a' dudonkey tucha.
'Et nyo keyoh whuti 'awet whan'unyaz hanahidil, 'et Joseph nyoon yuba 'ut'en-un 'uyulhni, “Dudinyai', nyoonne buba nanyalh 'ink'ez but'asinya de, 'et 'ubudini, ‘'Et di ha hoonzoo-un 'et hoontsi' hukw'un'a kw'elha whuzulhtsi?
Ndi lubot 'i iloh eh smoodih ye 'utnai-i 'ink'ez 'i be nus whunilh'en yutnai te? Hoontsi' hukw'un'a uhja 'et dahja.”’
'Et butasuya 'ink'ez ndi khuni 'i be bubulh yailhduk.
'Ink'ez 'uhuyulhni, “'Et di ha smoodih ndi khuni 'i be nebulh yailhduk? 'Aw mba 'utenne 'aw whuz un'a ndulhuts'ut'en whe' hoont'oh.
Nilh'en ndi sooniya yun k'ut Canaan ts'e ha nats'andzai, ne'ezdlai-i bet nats'in'ai'-i. Nts'en'a silver k'us gold bulh 'i nemoodih ooyoh 'et ts'uduntit'ih?
Mbe la mba 'uten-un ooghu nayinla-un de, 'en daootsah 'ink'ez wheni cha nemoodih be 'ulhna ts'ooleh sih.”
'Ink'ez 'utni, “'Et daja duhni la, mbe ooch'e' toh nats'inla de, 'en si se'ulhna tileh 'ink'ez nohni 'aw nohk'elhoowhutalts'ulh.”
'Et soo 'a cho 'et 'ilhone hinli ndai la be 'uzdla-i yun nahuyanla 'ink'ez hik'una'an'uk.
'Et nyoon dune 'udetso whudilhdzulh-un, 'en ooch'e' 'i cho yet nuniztai, 'udek'oh-un whuts'un, 'ink'ez nyoo lubot 'i Benjamin oo'ezdla-i bet nayin'ai.
'Et dunaih ye yidalhch'ul 'ink'ez nyoo dudonkey hik'ena 'inla, 'ink'ez keyoh whuti ts'e nahoosdil.
'Et Judah 'ink'ez dulhutsinke Joseph ooyoh ts'u nahoosdil, 'awhuz 'et 'ut'en, hibut 'et yun nachaniti.
'Ink'ez Joseph 'ubulhni, “Dant'i 'ut'en i' 'uhla? 'Aw eh t'eoonuzuhzun dant'oh-un 'ust'oh, 'en dune nus whunilh'en whe 'unt'oh t'eooninzin!”
'Et Judah 'utni, “Nemoodih daja uzdutanelh? K'us nts'en'a 'aw nek'elhuholhts'it hukw'un'a na'ts'uhooleh? Yak'usda (Elohim) mba 'ut'enne 'ut'en nts'ih-i bulh nabinla. Njan nuzdilhya, moodihti be 'ulhna wheni cha 'ink'ez mbe ndi lubot oo'ezdlai-i be yuz'ai 'en cha.”
'Et hoonts'i 'utni, “'Aw 'et ndosneh ait'oh. 'Et hoonts'i mbe slubot nuyu'a-un, 'en se'ulhna tileh. 'Et nohni, nohdzi whudooghel whe nohbá oots'u nahdulh.”
'Et Judah yuzih neninya 'ink'ez 'utni, “'Aw smoodihti si mbut yatisduk 'et sgha oonin'aih, 'ink'ez be hunilch'e-i mba 'ut'en-un bulh hunolch'eh junih. Pharaoh dilt'oh whe 'int'oh.
Smoodih mba 'ut'enne budini, ‘Nohbá hoonli k'us nohulhutsin?’
'Et nemoodih 'uts'utni, ‘Nebá hoonli, duneti 'ink'ez duneti suli' whe ooyaz whuzdli', ts'oodun unli, 'en bulhutsin dazsai, 'ink'ez ndun ts'oodun ooloo buzkeh 'enne didutch'oh gaih 'unli, 'ink'ez oobá yuk'entsi.’
'Et mba 'ut'enne 'ubudini, ‘Ndiz sts'olhtelh. Noos'en sih.’
'Et smoodihti 'uts'utni, ‘'Aw ndun duneyaz dubá yuch'a ooya' ait'oh. Dubá yuch'a suya de, oobá datitsah.’
'Et hoonts'i mba ut'enne 'ubudini, “Ndun 'udek'oh-un nohulhutsin, 'aw ndiz lhtulhtel de, 'aw snin 'aw naooht'en ait'oh.’
'Et whuz un'a mba 'ut'en-un oozih neznindil, 'ubá 'ink'ez daja dini la, nemoodih inli uzdani'.
'Ink'ez 'ubá 'une'ulhni, ‘Whuz nahdulh 'ink'ez ut'alh-iyaz oohket.’
'Et hoonts'i 'uts'utni, ‘'Aw whuz naztoodilh ait'oh, 'udek'oh-un neulhutsin nebulh 'ut'en de, 'et de za whuz naztidulh. 'En ooyit de 'aw nyoon dune oonin nalhts'utist'el.’
'Et mba 'ut'en-un, 'ubá 'une'ulhni, ‘T'eoonuhzun s'at nane dune sghu sulhtsi.
'Ink'ez 'ilhoghun 'en sgho whenya 'ink'ez 'udusni, “'Alha la yabe' yudalhch'ul.” 'Et whuts'un 'aw nalhuzist'en.
'Et hoonts'i ndun 'en cha sghulhchoot de, 'ink'ez hoonli hoonts'i-un bulh 'uhooja de, ndi sts'egha' dulgi-i ts'odi be nyo ts'un k'ut ts'e tisyalh.’
'Et huwa mba 'ut'en-un, hukwa ndun ts'oodun 'aw nebulh lhe'ust'en, tube nzih utitelh-un hukwa' ninzun 'et huwa.
'Et 'uwhutanelh, ndun dune-un nebulh lhe'ust'en de, datitsah. 'Et mba 'ut'enne, wheni gha, mba 'ut'en-un nebá, 'en ootsigha' dulgi suli' k'et ts'un k'ut ts'e tiyalh.
'Et ndun mba 'ut'en-un, ndun duneyaz yuk'edanya whe 'unt'oh. ‘'Aw whusanalhustel de, 'en sbá ghun 'ilhiz sk'ewhutalts'ulh whe' hoont'oh,’ dasni'.
'Et huwa si nyo ndun duneyaz 'en ook'et nye'usna oosle', 'ink'ez nyoon duneyaz dudulhutsinke bubulh natoot'as.
'Et huwa nts'en'a suba, sbá oots'u toosya' ndun duneyaz sulh lhe'ust'en de, 'et sih ntis'elh dawhultsi' lah sbá ook'ewhutalts'ulh 'et huwa?”
'Et Joseph 'aw 'on 'un 'oodudotun ait'oh, nyoonne yunat nudilhyane bunalh, 'ink'ez 'udija, “Ts'iyanne n'az nahutoodilh!” 'Et Joseph nyoonne dudulhutsin mbe 'unt'oh-un hubudani'.
'Ink'ez soo 'ultus-un intse 'ink'ez nyoonne Egypt whut'enne 'ink'ez Pharaoh ooyoh cha ts'iyawh whulh hidants'o.
'Et Joseph bubulhtsinke 'enne 'ubulhni, “Si Joseph 'ust'oh. Sbá 'awhuz eh khuna?” 'Et hoonts'i bulhutsinke 'aw hiyulh yatoolhdih ait'oh. Whuz tube buba nek'e'hoonil k'et.
'Et Joseph dudulhutsinke 'ubulhni, “'Anih szih nenuhdilh. 'Ink'ez hizih nenindil 'ink'ez 'utni, “Joseph 'ust'oh! Nohulhutsin Egypt ts'e be 'ohk'et inle'-un.
'Ink'ez 'andit nohdzi undooda' k'us dulh nahunolhch'eh junih. Njan se'ohket 'et huwa, Yak'usda 'en ndiz sutilh'a' dune yalhosdla ha.
Nat yus k'ut whuts'un njan dai hone'. 'Awhuz kwulat yus k'ut 'et 'aw dune 'a' noolelh cha ait'oh, ha' hunoolelh cha ait'oh tileh.
'Ink'ez Yak'usda (Elohim) nohtso ndiz whe salh'a', Ndi yun k'ut nohts'u haindene huhoona, 'aw dalhuhoosa. Hooncha whe bula'tinelh.
'Et 'andit nohni iloh ndiz whe silh'a'. Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en Pharaoh cha oobá sulhtsi 'ink'ez ooyoh cha whumoodih usli. 'Ink'ez Egypt yun k'ut ndulcho whucha whumoodih usli.
Soo 'a 'ink'ez 'ubá oots'un nahdulh 'ink'ez 'uduhni, ‘Nye' Joseph 'utni, “Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en Egypt whumoodih sulhtsi. Ndiz sts'inyalh, sa' 'ont'en junih!
Njan Goshen yun k'ut 'et sih hont'e'. Soo szih 'utant'elh, nyun cha 'ink'ez nyuzkeh cha, nyuzkeh bubuzkeh cha, nghuna', 'usbai bulh cha 'ink'ez ndai int'i ts'iyawh.
'Et njan ookw'ut yinka dutalhts'ilh-i 'i nohgha tis'aih doo ka sih nyun cha 'ink'ez nyoh dilhts'ine cha, ndai int'i-i cha telh'en oole' 'awhuz kwulat yus k'ut dai whutaleh whe' hoont'oh.’
'Ink'ez whunilh'en nohna cha 'ink'ez sulhutsin Benjamin oona be nanulht'oh sze 'uwhutni, nohbulh yasduk.
'Et de sih 'ubá dast'oh la njan Egypt dust'i', ndet hooh'en-un cha 'ink'ez soo 'a 'ubá ndiz ulhtelh.”
'Et dulhutsin Benjamin yuts'ilchun k'et yilhchoot 'ink'ez intse 'ink'ez Benjamin cha yuts'ilchun k'ut 'et intse.
'Et 'on 'un cha dulhutsinke ts'iyawh nabuditsooz 'ink'ez bughintse. 'Et hukw'elh'az bulhutsinke yulh yahalhduk.
'Et ts'iyawh dawhudani' lah Pharaoh ooyoh bulh 'uhudantso 'ink'ez 'uhutni, “Joseph bulhutsinke whusahandil,” 'ink'ez Pharaoh cha 'ink'ez yuba 'ut'enne cha ts'iyawh huhoont'i.
'Ink'ez Pharaoh Joseph 'ulhni, “Nyulhutsinke budini, ‘Nohghuna' buna'ilhghelh 'ink'ez nahdulh Canaan yun ts'e.
Nohbá ndiz ulhtelh 'ink'ez nohyoh whut'ine cha, ts'iyawh ndiz sts'un uhdulh. Ndai la k'us unzoo-i njan yun Egypt 'i si nohgha ooslelh 'ink'ez njan yun k'ut whuk'o, 'i sih ooh'alh.
'Et whuz un'a khuni mba 'ulya, 'et dineh, ‘Njan Egypt yun k'ut mbene 'ulgoo-i ts'iyawh ilhchoot. Nohuzkehyaz 'ink'ez noh'atke cha 'ink'ez nohbá cha 'ink'ez whusahdilh.
'Ink'ez ndai la njan uht'i-i ooghuni oohle' junih. Ndai la Egypt yun k'ut 'uk'enus nzoo-i, 'i nohch'e 'unt'oh.”’
'Et Israel ooye'ke 'et nduhuja, 'ink'ez Joseph be ne'ulgoo-i cha ts'iyawh butl'ayanla. Daja Pharaoh daja yulhni la hukw'un'a 'ink'ez nuhudilh-un hiti'ulh-i cha butl'anayanla.
Ts'iyawh 'ilhoghun hinli whe naih lhk'enahidutilelh-i cha 'ink'ez Benjamin 'en tat whunizyai tat 'ultsuk-i (300) 'i silver yugha inindzai, 'ink'ez kwulat k'enaidutilelh-i naih, 'i cha yugha ininla.
'Ink'ez dubá 'en ndi donkey 'i yuts'otl'ayanla, whunizyai donkey, Egypt ndai la unzoo-i ts'yawh 'i hik'enahuyinla, 'ink'ez whunizyai ts'eke donkey, 'i cha lhes mai' cha, lhes cha 'ink'ez ut'alh-i cha, oobá yuti'ulh ha cha, ndiz nahatidulh huba, 'i hik'enahuyinla.
'Et dudulhutsinke whenabalh'a 'ink'ez whenahidil 'ink'ez 'ubulhni, “Khun te nyo nuhdil whute dzoh nohdeh junih.”
'Et Egypt whenahidil 'ink'ez Canaan yun k'enahidil, dubá Jacob 'en oots'un.
'Ink'ez hidani', “Joseph 'awhuz khuna 'ink'ez Egypt yun k'ut ndulcho whe moodih unli.” 'Et Jacob oodzi 'ankw'us 'etsul 'uja, 'aw hiba 'alha lhe'dusnih 'et huwa.
'Et Joseph daja hubulhni la hidani', 'ink'ez nyoo be ne'ulgoo-i cha hinilh'en Joseph buts'o tl'ayanla-i, 'et Jacob ooyughi ndo na'uja.
'Et Israel 'utni, “'Awet soo' hooja. Sye' Joseph 'awhuz khuna, whuz toosya ink'ez sih naoost'en datisah whutso.”
'Et Israel ndai la yut'i-i tubulh tizya, Beersheba keyoh ts'e oozya 'ink'ez oobá Isaac ooYak'usda (Elohim) ts'un khuna-i dalhk'un.
'Et Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en Israel 'ulhdzis yunalhts'et hainya 'ink'ez 'utni, “Jacob, Jacob” ni, 'et 'uyulhni, “Njan 'ust'oh”.
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Yak'usda (El) 'ust'oh, mbá ooYak'usda (Elohim). 'Aw wheniljut whe Egypt ts'e tonya' junih, nyun tube didoh-un ncha-un 'et nyutiselh.
Egypt ts'e nyulh 'utisnelh 'ink'ez ndo na'nyutislelh. 'Ink'ez 'alha Joseph 'en nyuna k'edutalni.”
'Et whe Jacob 'en Beersheba 'et dudinya, 'ink'ez Israel whuye'ke 'en hube 'ubá whuz hitilhti, bubuzkehyaz cha, 'ink'ez bu'atke cha, 'en ndi nulbas be buhanla, 'i Pharoaoh hubuts'otl'ayanla.
'Ink'ez khuna-i cha 'ink'ez ndai la huyut'i-i cha, Canaan bugha ininkat-i, 'i tubulh Egypt ts'e whehandil, Jacob 'ink'ez ts'u haindene bubulh.
Ooye'ke 'ink'ez ooye'ke 'on 'un ooye'ke, ootse'ke 'ink'ez buye'ke butse'ke, ts'iyawh Egypt ts'e boozdla.
'Et ndi Israel buzkeh buboozi': Jacob ooye'ke, 'ink'ez Egypt ts'e whendilne, Reuben 'en 'udetso ooye', Jacob ooye'.
Reuben ooye'ke 'enne: Hanock, Pallu, Hezron 'ink'ez Carmi.
Simeon ooye'ke 'enne: Jemuel, Jamin, Ohad, Jachin, Zohar 'ink'ez Shaul, Canaan whut'en-un ts'eke ooye'.
Levi ooye'ke 'enne: Gershon, Kohath 'ink'ez Merari.
Judah ooye'ke 'enne: Er, Onan, Shelah, Perez 'ink'ez Zerah ('et hoonts'i Er 'ink'ez Onan bulh 'enne Canaan keyoh dahuzsai). Perez ooye'ke 'enne: Hezron 'ink'ez Hamul bulh.
Issachar ooye'ke 'enne: Tola, Puvvah, Iob 'ink'ez Shimron.
Zebulun ooye'ke 'enne: Sered, Elon 'ink'ez Jahleel.
Ndunne Leah ooye'ke, 'enne Jacob ghu bulhts'i Paddan Aram ts'e. Ootse' Dinah, 'en cha. Mbene la ooye'ke 'ink'ez oots'eke cha tat whunizyai 'on 'at tane (33) hinli.
Gad ooye'ke 'enne: Zipheon, Haggi, Shuni, Ezbon, Eri, Arodi 'ink'ez Areli.
Asher ooye'ke 'enne: Imnah, Ishvah, Ishvi, Beriah 'ink'ez Serah bubulhtus. 'Ink'ez Beriah ooye'ke 'enne: Heber 'ink'ez Malchiel.
Ndunne 'enne Zilpah ooye'ke: Laban, Leah dutse' gha inilhti, 'en Jacob ghu bulhtsine whunizyane 'on 'at lhk'utane (16) hinli.
Rachel ooye'ke, Jacob oo'at: Joseph 'ink'ez Benjamin.
'Et Joseph oots'un keyoh Egypt hooni, 'enne Manasseh 'ink'ez Ephraim. 'Enne Asenath Poti-Pherah whutse', keyoh On lubret, 'en buzkeh.
Benjamin buzkeh 'enne: Bela, Becher, Ashbel, Bera, Naaman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppin, Huppim 'ink'ez Ard.
Ndunne 'enne Rachel ooye'ke, 'alhgoh whunizyane 'on 'at dine (14), 'en Jacob ghu bulhtsi.
Dan ooye' 'en Hushim huyulhni.
Naphtali ooye'ke 'enne: Jahzeel, Guni, Jezer 'ink'ez Shillem.
Ndunne 'enne Bilhah ooye'ke, 'en Laban ootse', Rachel, gha inilhti, 'en ndunne Jacob ghu bulhtsi lhtak'ant'ine hinli.
'Et Jacob yulh whendilne Egypt ts'e, ts'iyawh hits'u hainde, Jacob ooye'ke, bu'atke, 'aw 'enne iloh, 'alhgoh lhk'utat whunizyai 'on 'at lhk'utane (66) hinli
'Ink'ez Joseph ooye'ke, Egypt 'enne nane hinli, Jacob bulh whusahandilne Egypt ts'e hoozdil whe lhtak'ant'it whunizyane (70) hinli.
'Et Judah 'en butso yutilh'a' Joseph ts'un nts'e la Goshen ts'e whuz'ai 'ink'ez Goshen yun k'uz ts'e hoozdil.
'Et Joseph nyoo ye nuya-i, 'i lhaidinla, 'ink'ez Goshen ts'e whenya, dubá Israel yudutizya 'ink'ez yubut neninya. 'Ink'ez yuts'ilchun k'et yuk'ilhts'ut 'ink'ez sa' whe 'et yuts'ilchun k'et intse.
'Ink'ez Israel, 'en Joseph 'uyulhni, “'Awet whute daoosah-un sgha oonin'aih, nyunin us'en 'awhuz khina 'et huwa.”
'Et Joseph dulhutsinke 'ink'ez dubá ooyoh dilhts'ine cha 'ubulhni, “Toozya' 'ink'ez Pharaoh dosni', njan dudoosni' sih, ‘Sulhutsinke 'ink'ez sbá ooyoh dilhts'ine cha, Canaan huwhut'ine sgho nindil.
'Ink'ez dune 'enne 'usbai ghunline, whuz un'a khuna-i gha 'aihne hinli, 'ink'ez dughuna' cha ts'iyawh ndai la huyut'i-i cha ts'iyawh sahuyanla.’
'Et 'uhoneh Pharaoh nohkahizya 'ink'ez 'utni de, ‘Dahoont'oh-un la huwahna?’
'Et 'udoohni', ‘Mba 'ut'enne bube 'ut'en dak'ez whuts'un, khuna-i gha hana ts'oodunne ts'inli whuts'un 'andit whuts'un, wheni cha 'ink'ez netsoda' nebáke 'enne cha.’ 'Et de sih ndi yun k'ut Goshen yun k'ut hooht'e', 'usbai ghunline ts'iyawh 'ilhoghun hinli whe Egypt whut'enne buba' huninzun 'et huwa.”
'Et Joseph Pharaoh ts'u whenya 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “Sbá 'ink'ez sulhutsinke, bughuna' te 'ink'ez ts'iyai huyut'i-i cha, Canaan ts'e hahandil 'andit Goshen yun k'ut 'uhint'oh.”
'Ink'ez kwulane dudulhutsinke 'enne butizdla 'ink'ez Pharaoh ghu buninla.
'Et Pharaoh bulhutsinke 'ubulhni, “Ndet la huwahna?” 'Et 'uhuyulhni, “Mba 'ut'enne, 'usbai ghunline ts'inli, wheni cha 'ink'ez nebákene cha.”
'Ink'ez cha Pharaoh 'ubulhni, “Ndi yun k'ut ts'otit'elh ha whusats'andil. Mba 'ut'enne 'aw bughuna' yoo'alh-i hooloh Canaan yun k'ut dai tube 'uja, 'et huwa mba 'ut'enne Goshen yun k'ut huhoot'en-un 'et negha oonin'aih.”
'Et Pharaoh, Joseph bulh yalhduk 'ink'ez 'utni, “Mbá 'ink'ez nyulhutsinke ngho nindil.
Egypt yun k'ut mbut whuz'ai, mbá 'ink'ez nyulhutsinke 'uk'enus ndi yun unzoo-i Goshen yun k'ut, 'et huwhutit'elh. 'Et 'enne butoh soo 'uk'enus ts'ih'un ne'ut'en-i 'ink'ez 'uyoo unline, 'enne butoh hoonli de, 'enne ndi sghuna', ts'iyawh himoodih oole'.”
'Et Joseph dubá Jacob sayalhti 'ink'ez Pharaoh yubut neinilhti, 'ink'ez Jacob Pharaoh soo hoonzoo-un oots'un tizoo' yuba tenadidli.
Pharaoh Jacob yoodulhkut, “Dawhultsuk nyeyus k'ut?”
'Et Jacob 'en Pharaoh 'uyulhni, “Sunawhudizut whe dzin whe lhususya, 'et 130 nawhudizut. 'Aw whulai iloh 'ink'ez hoontsi' whe nawhudizut whudzin whe syust'e 'ant'e'. 'Et hoontsi 'aw sbáke ndi yun k'ut nuhuzdil-un ndoh whulhdzoh ilhoh 'et khisna'.”
'Et Jacob, Pharaoh 'uk'enus soo hoonzoo-un ubulh yalhduk 'ink'ez yughu tenanja.
'Ink'ez Joseph, dubá 'ink'ez dulhutsinke Egypt yun ooloh 'i bugha inin'ai, soo 'uk'enus hoonzoo-un, Rameses whuyun k'ut 'et, Pharaoh daja yulhni la, whuz un'a.
'Et Joseph dubá 'ink'ez dulhutsinke 'ink'ez mbene la buyoh whut'ine cha, lhes dawhultsuk huwa 'i bugha ininla.
'Et 'aw njan yun k'ut ut'alh-i hooloh, tube dai be oonisjoot 'et huwa. Egypt yun k'ut cha 'ink'ez Canaan yun k'ut cha tube tehul'en ndi dai 'i gha.
'Ink'ez Joseph ndai la Egypt sooniya, ts'iyawh nayalhdzoo. Canaan yun k'ut cha ndai la lhes hanuyeh-i huyonket-i, 'ink'ez ndi Joseph, Pharaoh ooyoh ts'e wheyan'ai.
'Et Egypt yun k'ut cha sooniya hooloh Canaan yun k'ut cha sooniya hoolel. 'Et Egypt whut'enne ts'iyawh Joseph highu nindil 'ink'ez 'uhutni, “Lhes negha nin'aih. Diha 'et nyunalh yats'itadlah? Sooniya gak suli' 'et huwa.”
'Et Joseph 'utni, “Nohghuna' 'et nenuhle 'ink'ez 'i k'elha sih ut'alh-i nohgha ooslelh, sooniya hooloh suli' de.”
'Et dughuna' ts'iyawh Joseph highu hininla 'ink'ez Joseph ut'alh-i bugha ninla ndi yeztli khuna-i te, budonkey te, ts'iyawh, 'i k'elha lhes huyu'alh-i bugha ininla, ndi khuna-i ts'iyawh 'et nawhudizut whe.
'Et nawhudizut whe 'on 'at yus k'ut 'et 'uhuyulhni, “'Aw nemoodih nch'a nuznoot'i' ait'oh, nezooniya' gak whuzdli'. Ndai la khuna-i ts'ut'i-i ts'iyawh nemoodih nyun za int'i suli', 'aw neyun k'ut 'aw hoonli ngha ts'oolelh-i hooloh, neyust'e' 'ink'ez neyun bulh za 'et neninkat.
'Et di ha nenilh'en whe yats'itadlah, wheni 'ink'ez neyun bulh cha neoonk'et 'ink'ez neyun cha oonk'et lhes k'elha. 'Ink'ez wheni 'ink'ez neyun bulh 'et sih Pharaoh ba 'ut'enne ts'oole'. 'Ats'untilelh-i negha ninle, 'et de la ts'ukhoona' 'ink'ez yalhits'osdla, 'et de ndi yun 'aw gak uztisle.”
'Et Joseph Egypt whuyun ts'iyawh ndulcho whe Pharaoh ba yonk'et. Egypt whut'enne dune ndai la yun huyut'i, ts'iyawh huye 'onket tubeh dai be oonujut huba suli'. 'Et huwa 'et ndi yun ts'iyawh Pharaoh ooch'e' suli'.
'Et nyoonne dune 'enne ts'iyawh keyoh whuti ts'e nebuninla, Egypt keyoh nduwhulcho whe.
Mbene la lubret unline, 'enne buyun 'i za 'aw lhuyookulh. Pharaoh 'uda' butl'a'dantsut, 'et huwa nyoo butl'aidantsut-i, 'i huyu'alh, 'et huwa duyun 'aw huye lhe'ookulh.
'Et Joseph dune 'ubulhni, “Nohyun ts'iyawh osket. 'Andit dzin Pharaoh ba whunulh'en ndi 'antilelh-i nohba hooni, 'i sih yun k'ut 'anoolelh.
'Et de si ha'nule de (⅕) ndai la 'anihla-i, 'i Pharaoh oogha yohlelh. (⅘) 'i nohch'e' tileh, 'antilelh wheni 'ink'ez tih'ulh-i wheni cha, mbene la nohyoh whut'ine 'ink'ez nohuzkehkeyaz ba cha.”
'Et 'uhutni, “Be ts'ukhuna-i silhyih. Nemoodih ba soo ts'inzoo ts'oole' 'ink'ez ba 'ut'enne ts'oole'.”
'Ink'ez Joseph 'i khuni yulhtsi, Egypt yun k'ut wheni 'andit dzin whuts'un Pharaoh 'en (⅕) 'i ooch'e' yutaleh, lubretne buyun 'i ooyit, 'i 'aw Pharaoh ooch'e' lhilelh.
'Et Israel, Egypt yun k'ut 'et hit'e', keyoh Goshen huwhutni-un 'et hoot'e', lhai huyut'i-i 'ut'i suli'.
'Ink'ez Jacob Egypt yun k'ut 'et whut'i, whunizyai 'on 'at lhtak'ant'it (17) yus k'ut. Jacob ndi yun k'ut inda', 'et 147 yus k'ut 'et hoot'e'.
'Et 'awet Israel datitsah whenghoh neooninzut, duye' Joseph 'anih yudani' 'ink'ez 'uyulhni, “'Alha mba uszoo nahoon'ai de, nla swuz t'oh nedilnih 'ink'ez soo cho ne'solh'en, 'aw Egypt 'et 'asolhtelh junih.
'Ants'i sbáke 'enne bubulh 'oost'e'. Egypt whuch'a nasolhtelh 'ink'ez la 'ahudinla-un 'et 'asoltelh.” 'Et 'uyulhni, “Daja dini-un 'et si ndosneh.”
'Ink'ez 'utni, “Sts'u nahinyeh.” 'Ink'ez yuts'u nahizya. 'Et Israel tse nilh'al-un hukw'ut 'et yo nenint'ai.
'Et hukw'elh'az njan duhooja whe Joseph 'uhuyulhni, “Mbá nduda,” 'ink'ez duye'ke nane Manasseh 'ink'ez Ephraim 'enne hubilhchoot.
'Ink'ez Jacob huyulhni, “Whunilh'en nye' Joseph nts'un tizya.” 'Ink'ez Israel do 'uja 'ink'ez lili k'ut ndo netl'adinda'.
'Et Jacob, Joseph 'uyulhni, “Yak'usda 'Uk'enus 'Ultus-un 'ust'oh (El Shaddai) snalhts'et hainya Canaan whu yun k'ut Luz whe 'ink'ez soo hoonzoo-un sts'un tizoo'.
'Ink'ez 'usulhni, “Whunilh'en lhane nts'u hatidoh dune lhane whe nts'u hahutidoh, 'ink'ez ndi yun 'i nts'u haindene nk'elh'az de 'ilhiz wheni bugha itas'alh.’
'Andit 'et nane nye'ke Ephraim 'ink'ez Manesseh, Egypt 'et nyuzkeh huzdli', nghu tisyalh whutso 'enne sch'e 'uhint'oh. Reuben 'ink'ez Simeon bulh buk'un'a sch'e' hutileh.
Nyuzkeh njan hukw'elh'az nyuzkeh hutilehne, 'enne ndunne dudulhutsin be nabootanzi, ndai la buch'e' yutaleh-i 'inka.
'Et si keyoh Padden ts'e hasya, Rachel szih 'et Canaan yun k'ut dazsai, ts'idulh whe keyoh Ephrath 'awet nilhduk suli' whe 'et, 'ink'ez Ephrath ts'u ti (Bethlehem ts'uwhutni-un) 'et 'asti.”
'Et Israel, Joseph ooye'ke bunilh'en 'ink'ez 'utni, “Ndunne 'enne mbene whe' hint'oh?”
'Ink'ez Joseph dubá 'ulhni, “Sye'ke 'uhint'oh. Njan yun k'ut Yak'usda (Elohim) sgha bunilhtine.” 'Ink'ez 'utni, “De' ndiz sts'u bilhtelh 'ink'ez si soo hoonzoo-un buts'un tiszoo'.”
'Ink'ez Israel oona 'awet njan be tetsun suli' tube hoonyan 'et huwa 'aw soo cho lhubis'en. 'Et Joseph hizih nebunilhti 'ink'ez nabudits'ooz 'ink'ez bubontun.
'Ink'ez Israel, Joseph 'ulhni, “'Aw nyunin ntis'elh 'aw huwuni lhnuzuszut, 'et hoonts'i 'alha Yak'usda (Elohim) nyuzkeh bubusunilhtan.”
'Et Joseph dugwut zih uzyin whuz de habalhti 'ink'ez soo yun ts'e nenint'ai yubut nachaninti.
'Ink'ez Joseph nahult'oh hubilhchoot, Ephraim 'en nailhnih ts'unk'us yilhchoot, Israel 'intl'us ts'e oola ts'un 'ink'ez Manesseh 'en 'intl'us ts'e dula be Israel nailhnih ts'unkus hubilhchoot 'ink'ez hizih nebunilhti.
'Ink'ez Israel dula nailhnih be Ephraim ootsi k'ut nedilni, 'en 'udek'oh-un 'unt'oh, 'ink'ez 'intl'us ts'e 'et Manesseh ootsi k'ut 'et nedilni, 'ink'ez yuk'unudulnih-un Manesseh 'en 'udetso-un whuzdli.
'Ink'ez Joseph soo hoonzoo-un be ubulh yalhduk 'ink'ez 'utni, “Yak'usda (Elohim) mbe la sbáke Abraham 'ink'ez Isaac bulh hitso nusu'azne, Yak'usda (Elohim) mbe la 'andit dzin whuts'un yinka susda nduwhulhyiz whe sgha 'an'aih,
Ndun Lizas mbe la hoonts'i'-un whuch'a nasonket-un, 'en ndunne duneyaz soo hoonzoo-i be za tl'aookat. Ndai soozi' 'i be bubohozi, 'ink'ez sbáke Abraham 'ink'ez Isaac buboozi' be cha, 'ink'ez soo ndi yun k'ut 'et lhane cho hoole'.”
'Et Joseph dubá nailhnih ts'unk'us 'et Ephraim k'edilni 'et whunilh'en, 'et whuts'udutni 'ink'ez dubá oola yilhchoot Ephraim ootsi k'udilhni whe 'ink'ez Manesseh ootsi k'edilhni.
'Ink'ez Joseph dubá 'ulhni, “'Awundooh sbá, ndun 'en 'udetso-un whuzdli whe 'unt'oh, nailhnih ts'unk'us 'et ootsi k'edilni.”
'Et hoonts'i oobá hukwa lhe'nizun 'ink'ez 'utni, “T'eoonuszun sye', t'eoonuszun 'en cha ndi yun k'ut dune tileh 'ink'ez ncha tileh. 'Et hoonts'i ndun ook'oh-un, 'en yanus 'ulcho tileh 'ink'ez soo keyoh whudizbun whe yuts'u hayandene hutileh.”
'Et nahult'oh soo hoonzoo-un be ubulh yalhduk whe 'utni, “Nohni nohbá Israel soo hoonzoo-un be nohbulh yalhduk 'ink'ez 'udutinelh, ‘Yak'usda (Elohim), Ephraim 'ink'ez Manesseh buk'un'a 'ooht'e'’.” 'Et whuz un'a Ephraim 'en Manesseh tso nenilhti.
'Et Israel, Joseph 'uyulhni, “Whunilh'en 'awet dassah whe 'ust'oh, 'et hoonts'i Yak'usda (Elohim) nyulh 'utit'elh mbáke bukeyoh ts'e whuz nanyutilhtelh.
'On 'un cha ndai la nyulhutsinke bugha inusla-i, yun 'ilhoh 'ultsuk 'i be nyun ngha nusla. 'I Amor whut'enne ooghu yuschoot inle', saluzti be 'ink'ez sk'aza be.”
'Ink'ez Jacob duye'ke buka'dani 'ink'ez 'utni, “'Ilhoozahdilh 'et de sih nohbulh dawhutanelh la 'udek'ez dzin nohudutasnelh.
'Ilhozahdilh 'ink'ez oozulhts'ai Jacob ooye'ke 'ink'ez nohbá Israel oozulhts'ai.
Reuben nyun 'udetso sye' whuzdli-un inli. Ndai la be ustus-i 'ink'ez 'udechoo be ustus suli'-i, ndai la ilhoh tune' zust'en-un 'ink'ez dalcho-i be be ustus-i cha.
Too nudutunne oot'aniuznootan ait'oh. 'Aw hoonzoo lhotuzan'el mbá oolili k'ut 'et inte' 'ink'ez whudutsun whuzilhtsi. Ndai la ook'oste'-i 'i ookw'ut inte' 'et huwa.
Simeon 'ink'ez Levi bulh lhulhutsinke hudli. Be dzoh ne'udzut-i bubulh 'unt'oh, ndet la huwhut'i-un.
'Aw szul buzih neooya' junih. Be dasti'-i, ndet la huwhut'i-un bubulh 'uyot'e' junih. Huhunilch'e whe dune huzilhghi 'et huwa, 'ink'ez k'une' hut'en whe musdoos dune kechun dugha hininguz.
Bube huske-i ookw'ehoodeh, tube be oonujut 'et huwa. Huye huske-i tube ookw'ehunduda. Jacob 'et lhk'e butistelh 'ink'ez Israel 'et lhelhdun nebutastelh.
Judah nyun 'utant'elh, nyulhutsinke nyuhudutalhti'. Nla 'i mbene la nch'az ditnine buk'udutalni, mbá buzkeh 'enne mbut yo 'uhuntitsulh.
Judah 'i khuna-iti lion huyulhni, 'i ooyaz 'unt'oh. Ndai la inghan-i sye', 'i bulh ndo 'inja. Yo untut'aih 'ink'ez khuna-iti lion huyulhni, 'i k'un'a usti 'ink'ez khuna-iti lion unli de, mbe suba hinolhch'eh?
Ndai la lerwene tuz nuhidutun-i, 'i Judah yuyit lhe'tist'el. 'Ink'ez keyoh huwuni ook'une' whut'en-i, 'i 'aw ooke eguz whuch'a naoodzit ait'oh, Shiloh whusainya 'et whuts'un. 'Ink'ez dunene 'en buk'oh ts'e hik'une' oot'en ha.
Oodonkey 'i nyoo duchun nudunulhye 'idutaguz, 'ink'ez donkey ooyaz 'i duchun nudunulhye 'i soo 'uk'enus unzoo yuzih neitalhtelh. Dunaih 'i ts'ekoo too' be tunayuzguz, 'ink'ez dunaih 'i mai ts'ekoo too' huyilh-i, i ootoo' 'i be tunayuzguz.
Oona 'i ts'ekoo too' anus dunulhgus, 'ink'ez ooghoo lilet anus 'ulhyul
Zebulun 'en yatooba hoonzoo-un 'et whutit'elh. Ndai la ts'i yanakuk-i, 'i ba, 'ink'ez keyoh Sidon 'et whuzih whutit'elh.
Issachar 'en donkey ulhtus-i 'unt'oh. Ndai ndaz-i yeguz nanki, 'i 'et tit'elh.
Nats'ulyiz-un hoonzoo-un 'et hon'en 'ink'ez yun k'ut hoonzoo 'utighelh wheni yo 'utinelh. 'Ink'ez 'ulhna didohne huzdli'.
Dan 'en dudune'ne buba nahutiyeh. Israel 'ilhoh didohne oots'u haindene 'enne 'uhint'oh.
Dan 'en ti whuzih tl'ughus, viper, tileh. Tl'ughus 'oolch'oolh-i ti whuzih, 'ink'ez yeztl'i k'ents'ul cha oolhch'oolh. 'Ink'ez mbe la yuk'usda-un 'en k'oh un'a yuk'udutildus.
O Moodihti (Yahweh) ndet la whesutalhyih-un hubas'e'!
Gad 'en lhuganne didohne 'enne hik'ut nutidulh, 'et hoonts'i 'udek'oh 'et whuch'a' tilhdoh.
Asher ut'alh-i oots'u hayults'uk-i, 'i tube dutati', 'ink'ez nzoo-i oots'u hatikulh.
Naphtali 'en yezts'e oolazditni-i le'unt'oh, khuni nzoo-i za huwa'aih.
Joseph 'en duchun zooschum cho oots'a ha'ukat-i unli. Too k'et whuzih 'et oots'a hakat-i 'uzooschum unli. 'Ink'ez be 'uzoozchum nyo sih hukw'ut ndulcho whe hoonli.
Mbene la k'aza be lhuganne tube hidzi undalhda'. Nuhinulhtso 'ink'ez huts'uditni.
'Et hoonts'i ook'aza ulhtus-un 'et za 'unt'oh inle'. 'Ink'ez oogan 'i cha 'onus oonut'i lhtus suli'. Jacob ooYak'usda (Elohim) be oonujut-un ulhtus-un, oola 'i be 'unt'oh ('en 'Usbai Ghunli-un unli, Israel Whutse' 'unt'oh).
Mbá ooYak'usda (El), 'en nla'utinelh. 'Ink'ez 'Uk'enus 'Ultus-un (EL Shaddai), 'en soo hoonzoo-i za ntl'aookat. Yak'uz ts'e hakat-i, 'i be mba soo hoonzoo-i ntl'aookat. Yatoo t'ah ts'e hoonli 'i be cha mba soo hoonzoo-i whutaleh. Ts'ekoo buts'oo' ts'oodunne huye 'ulhtuk-i be 'ink'ez ts'ekoo buchan cha mba soo hoonzoo-i ntl'aookat whutaleh.
Mbá soo hoonzoo-i nohtl'aookat, 'i stsoda'ne 'onus soo hoonzoo-i za butl'ayilts'ut, whanus unzoo suli'. Ndo yak'uz 'ilhiz wheni nodist'ai-un soo 'uk'enus nilhdza'-un 'et whuts'un, 'i Joseph ootsi k'ut 'utit'elh 'ink'ez ootsit'ah hukw'ut, 'i bulhutsinke anus 'utit'elh.
Benjamin 'en yus tube ooye'ilts'ul-i unli, bundada' 'et si yuzilhghi-i yoo'alh, 'ink'ez 'ulhdzis 'et ndai la yughan-i, oogha yunkat-i lhk'eyulih.
Ndunne 'enne ts'iyawh Israel ts'u haindene whunizyane 'on 'at nane didohne, 'et ndi khuni 'i be buba hubulh yailhduk 'ink'ez soo hoonzoo-i buts'un tizoo', lhoghun hinli whe nts'en'a la didutch'oh soo hoonzoo-i be ubulh yalhduk.
'Et 'ink'ez 'ubulhni, “'Awet sulh dune'ne, ubulh 'ist'e'ne 'enne 'awet buts'un tisyalh. Ndet la tse'an Ephron yun k'ut 'i Hitt whut'en-un 'unt'oh, 'en ootse'an 'et sbákene bubulh 'asoolhtelh,
tse'an 'et Machpelah yun k'ut 'et 'uhoont'oh, Mamre whutso Canaan yun k'ut 'i Abraham, Ephron, Hitt whut'en-un unli-un, 'en ooyun, ts'unk'ut wheni 'et honket.
'Et Abraham 'ink'ez Sarah oo'at bulh cha 'abuhalhti, 'et Isaac 'ink'ez oo'at Rebekah bulh cha 'abuhalhti, 'ink'ez si cha 'et Leah 'asti.
Ndai la yun 'ink'ez tse'an ook'uwhuz'ai-i, 'i Heth ooye'kene ts'un huyonket.”
'Ink'ez Jacob 'awet buzkeh hubulh yalhduk-un 'etsul 'udija whe, lili k'enadil'ez 'ink'ez 'udek'ez hanajiz. 'Ink'ez whutsoda' oonatneke bubulh 'unt'ohne 'enne buts'un whenya.
'Et Joseph dubá yunin k'echaniti 'ink'ez yuk'ut intse 'ink'ez naidits'ooz.
'Ink'ez Joseph yuba 'ut'enne, yoo be duyunne, 'enne dubá oozi lhahidooleh hubulhni. 'Et yoo be duyunne, 'enne Israel oozi yesa' soo' tit'elh-i, 'i be highaizna.
Dit whunizyat dzin (40) 'et whuz un'a huba' hoont'oh ts'et ubuhulhti, 'ink'ez buk'enihunudleh. Whuz un'a buzih lhadulyanne, 'ink'ez Egypt whut'enne, 'enne lhtak'ant'it whunizyat dzin (70) 'et hik'enudleh whe inle'.
'Et 'awet ndi dzin lhaoodinla 'et Joseph, Pharaoh ooyoh whut'ine hubulhni, “'Andit nohna soo ts'ih'un sulh newhuna'ai de, 'et Pharaoh soo nehoozulhts'ai, 'en dudoohni',
‘'Ubá oots'un nahizusya whe njan dudusni, “Whunilh'en 'awet datisah. Ndet la sts'un k'ut, Canaan yun k'ut 'uwhusla-un 'et 'asolhtelh,” sulhni. 'Et huwa sladinih, 'ubá 'atistelh 'ink'ez la whusanaoosja.”’
'Ink'ez Pharaoh 'utni, “Whuz inyalh 'ink'ez mbá 'ailhtih, khuni daja dini la oots'u nahizinya-i k'un'a.”
'Et Joseph whuz dubá whenayalhti 'aitilhtelh ha, mbene la Pharaoh yuba 'ut'enne cha ts'iyawh hiyulh whendil. Ooyoh 'udetso whudilhdzulhne, 'enne cha 'ink'ez Egypt yun k'ut 'udetso whudilhdzulhne, 'enne cha hiyulh whendil.
Joseph ooyoh whut'ine, bulhutsinke 'ink'ez oobá ooyoh dilhts'ine cha ts'iyawh hiyulh whendil. Ts'oodunne 'ink'ez bughuna' cha, musdoos cha, 'ink'ez ts'iyawh nyo Goshen whuyun k'ut 'et neboninla.
'Et yeztl'i 'ink'ez nyowhi huye nudilh-i huye 'uzdla-i cha tubeh lhane dune 'ilhozdil
'Et nyo Atad ooch'e' lhes mai' dunuldus-un, 'et nehunindil, Jordan whanoo' 'uhoont'oh, 'ink'ez soo tube 'et hik'eniudle. 'Et Joseph 'en lhtak'ant'it dzin 'et dubá yuk'enudleh whe inle'.
'Et nyo Canaan whut'enne dune nyo lhes mai' dunuldus-un 'et hik'enudleh whunilh'en, 'et huwhuhunilh'en 'ink'ez 'uhutni, “Njan 'et tube Egypt whut'enne hukw'ehunduda whe hik'enudleh.” 'Et huwa ooboozih Abel Mizraim, Jordan whanoo' whuz'aih 'i hoozi' huyulhtsi.
'Et duye'ke daja hubulhni la, whuz un'a 'uhuyinla.
Ooye'ke Canaan keyoh ts'e nahuyoolhti 'ink'ez nyo Machpelah yun 'et tse'an 'et 'ahayalhti, Mamre whutso 'et Abraham nyoo yun Ephron, Hitt whut'en-un, 'en ts'un yonket ts'unk'ut wheni.
'Et Joseph dubá 'ayalhti whe 'et Egypt ts'u naoosja, bulhutsinke cha, yulh nusudilne 'enne cha ts'iyawh whuz nahoosdil.
'Et Joseph bulhutsinke bubá 'awet dazsai 'et 'uhutni, “Joseph nets'u dootni tilah, dats'inla la hoonts'i hukw'un'a 'uts'inla 'et tilah neba k'elha hoolhtselh.”
'Et Joseph hits'otl'a khuni in'ai 'uhuyulhni, “Mbá datitsah whutso njan ndutni,
‘'Et Joseph dohni',’ “Nts'u tezdudlih, nyulhutsinke buba whunahodolnoh 'ink'ez wheninta' hunt'en cha tube hoonts'i k'un'a 'unyuhinla, 'et huwa mbá ooYak'usda (Elohim) ba 'ut'enne, 'enne buba whunahoodolnoh.” 'Ink'ez Joseph intse hiyulh yailhduk whe.
'Et bulhutsinke 'enne cha hinin ts'e 'et hibut nahankat 'ink'ez 'uhutni, “Whunilh'en mba 'ut'enne ts'inli.”
Joseph 'ubulhni, “Whenulhjut iloh. Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en la ook'edusda whe' duhni?
'Et nohni tube hoontsi' hukw'un'a 'usutilelh k'un'a 'usuhla, 'et hoonts'i Yak'usda (Elohim) 'en ooba hoonzoo hukw'una 'uhoonla, 'andit dzin wheni dune lhane hubutisyih ha.
'Et huwa whenulhjut iloh, nohuzkehyaz cha nohni cha ts'iyai be lhanohdutisleh.” 'Ink'ez k'enabunin'a 'ink'ez soo cho khuni nzoo-i be bubulh yailhduk.
'Et Joseph Egypt yun k'ut 'et hoot'e', dich'oh cha 'ink'ez oobá ooyoh whut'ine inle'ne, 'enne cha 'ink'ez Joseph whunizyat whunizyai 'on 'at whunizyai (110) yus k'ut 'et khana.
Joseph 'et Ephraim buzkeh tawh whudidoh whuts'un bunalh'en, Machir buzkeh Manasseh ooye', 'enne cha Joseph oogw'ut k'ut 'et hunizyai.
'Ink'ez Joseph dulhutsinke 'ubulhni, “'Awet datisah, 'et hoonts'i Yak'usda (Elohim) 'alha nohts'un nutiyalh 'ink'ez ndi yun ch'a nanohtalelh, 'ink'ez Abraham, Isaac 'ink'ez Jacob cha yun buts'i yoozi'-i, whuz nanohtilelh.”
'Et Joseph, Israel buzkeh hits'u nahizya 'et 'ubulhni, “'Alha Yak'usda (Elohim) nohts'un nutiyalh 'ink'ez usts'un 'i njan whuch'a naoolelh.”
'Et Joseph dazsai, 110 be yus k'ut 'ink'ez hizi sa' soo' tit'elh huba lhahidinla 'ink'ez Egypt 'et chunkelh 'et hitalhtelh ha.
















































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































































Ndi 'udustl'us 'uk'eguz-un 'et dutni, 'i be Sizi Gri 'en ubé dinzutne 'uhínt'oh, 'i Sizi David ts'u hainzut-un 'unt'oh. David 'en Abraham ts'u hainzut-un 'unt'oh.
Abraham 'en Isaac oobá 'unt'oh. Isaac 'en Jacob oobá 'unt'oh. Jacob 'en Judah 'ink'ez bulhutsinke bubá 'unt'oh.
Judah 'en nyoon ts'eke Tamar 'en be Perez 'ink'ez Zerah bubá 'unt'oh. Perez Hezron oobá 'ink'ez Hezron Ram oobá 'unt'oh.
Ram 'en Amminadab oobá. Amminadab Nashon oobá, 'ink'ez Nashon Salmon oobá 'unt'oh.
Salmon oo'at Rahab 'en be Boaz oobá. Boaz Ruth 'en be Obed oobá. 'Ink'ez Obed Jesse oobá 'unt'oh.
Jesse lerwe David oobá. 'Et lerwe David, mbe la Uriah oo'at inle'-un, 'en be Solomon oobá 'unt'oh.
Solomon Rehoboam oobá. Rehoboam Abijah oobá, 'ink'ez Abijah Asa oobá 'unt'oh.
Asa Jehoshaphat oobá. Jehoshaphat Joram oobá, 'ink'ez Joram Uzziah oobá 'unt'oh.
Uzziah Jotham oobá. Jotham Ahaz oobá, 'ink'ez Ahaz Hezekiah oobá 'unt'oh.
Hezekiah Manasseh oobá. Manasseh Amon oobá, 'ink'ez Amon Josiah oobá 'unt'oh.
'Oh da' 'oh whuya whudizulh whe ts'iyanne dune keyoh whuti Babylon ts'e whebuhanla, 'et Josiah 'en Jeconiah 'ink'ez bulhutsinke 'enne bubá 'unt'oh.
Keyoh whuti Babylon whuz whebuhanla hukw'elh'az 'et Jaconiah Shealtiel oobá 'unt'oh. Shealtiel Zurubbabel oobá 'unt'oh.
Zerubbabel Abiud oobá. Abiud Eliakim oobá, 'ink'ez Eliakim Azor oobá 'unt'oh.
Azor Zadok oobá. Zadok Achim oobá, 'ink'ez Achim Eliud oobá 'unt'oh.
Eliud Eleazor oobá. Eleazor Matthan oobá, 'ink'ez Matthan Jacob oobá 'unt'oh.
Jacob Joseph oobá 'unt'oh. 'En Mary ooki 'ink'ez Mary 'en be Sizi whuzdli. 'En Christ huyulhni.
'Inka Abraham David whuts'un, 'enne ts'iyawh whunizyat 'on 'at dit-un bubé dindene 'uhint'oh. 'Ink'ez David 'oh da' whudizulh whe ts'iyanne keyoh whut'enne Babylon ts'e whebuhanla whuts'un, 'enne ts'iyawh whunizyat 'on 'at dit-un bubé dindene hinli. 'Ink'ez 'oh da' whudizulh whe ts'iyanne keyoh Babylon ts'e whebuhanla 'et hukw'elh'uz dich'oh dukeyoh yun k'ut Judah, whuz whenáhidil, Christ 'et whuts'un, 'enne ts'iyawh whunizyat 'on 'at dit-un bubé dindene hinli whe hint'oh.
'Et 'awet Sizi Gri whuzdli-un, ndiz un'a 'uhooja. Ooloo Mary 'en Joseph 'en yughu tidalh ha lhahódinla, 'ink'ez yughu tidalh whutso whe 'et nahoon'ai 'uda' ts'oodun ba 'unt'oh. Ndoni, 'i be 'uja.
'Et ndun Joseph 'en ts'ih'un dune unli, 'et huwa lhgho tikelh ts'iyanne toh yooya yoolhtselh whuch'a dudeni lhaidinla. 'Ink'ez whu'iz yuch'a natidalh hukwa' ninzun.
'Et howu nuni nuzut whe 'et huwu nusúti whe neMoodihti oolizas 'en yulhni, “Joseph David oots'u hainzut-un inli whe' 'int'oh. Wheniljut iloh whe Mary n'at tileh. Ndun ts'oodun Ndoni be chainya whe 'unt'oh.
'Et 'awet ooyaz, duneyaz tileh. Nyunch'oh boozi' oogha ídon'alh. Sizi dóni'. 'En 'utinelh ts'iyanne lubeshi ch'a ubutilhyih.”
'Et ndiz un'a 'uhooja, neMoodihti nyoon nus hoo'en-un, 'en be daja ni la, whunilhchoh 'oh túne'whust'en. 'Et nyoon nus hoo'en-un ndiz un'a nja dutni,
“Soo zulhts'ai ndun ts'eke 'aw dune t'enuszun-un 'et hoonts'i khunsul ts'oodun ba 'uja, 'ink'ez ooyaz dune tileh, boozi' Emmanuel hidutánelh, Yak'usda nebulh 'únt'oh, ni whe utni.”
'Inka Joseph ts'enanzut whe neMoodihti oolizas daja yulhni la, 'oh tune' 'ust'en 'ink'ez 'awet Mary yilhchoot oo'at yutáleh ha.
'Udechoo ooyaz whutileh t'eoonanzin 'et whuts'un 'aw yut'álhasnai. 'Et 'awet ooye' whuzdli, 'et 'andit za soo yughusda. 'Inka boozi' yugha ídin'ai Sizi yulhni.
'Et 'awet yun k'ut Judea, keyoh Bethlehem whuz'ai-un, 'et Sizi whuzdli. 'Oh da' whuz un'a Herod lerwe unli whe 'et 'uhooja. 'Et 'awet whuzdli hukw'elh'az khunsul nda' whut'enne keyoh Jerusalem ts'e hoozdil. 'Enne whunihne Majine hubuhútnine, 'enne 'uhint'oh.
